column2: Perfectly. On time, excellent skills, pricing. Accommodating. Listens, suggests, written estimate. Courteous. This company will be our "go to" repairmen/installer/renovator. You cannot find more honest workmen. Call them first!

They did a great job. They rebuilt my closet, hung curtain rods, fixed a kitchen cabinet and drawers as well as a few other small projects. It was very reasonably priced and done quickly. I would definitely hire again.
Very poorly. Owner shows up and says his worker was going to be late. I didn’t want to wait and he says he would go get the worker. They never came back.
Al & A.J. are two of the nicest & hardest workers I have ever hired. Will use them again!
C and H performed their tasks in an excellent manner very professional they did great work. I really recommend C and H for jobs around the house.

Al and his team have been fantastic in both service and workmanship. We needed a shower replaced in our rental home. He not only provided a number of options, but recommended ways to save money as well. The work project itself, Al made sure if there were any concerns we had, he addressed it promptly. We plan to use C&H for a number of other smaller handyman projects we need done both immediately a...
Read more

Absolutely outstanding -- your search for a handyperson is over. The team arrived always promptly, did outstanding work, and were extremely kind. They always had professional, creative, and sound solutions to our variety of tasks we needed, and did a great job describing their rationale. Prices were great. We will absolutely have them again for any further work....don't hesitate to work with them.
Al was prompt, and he and his worker, did a nice job. Another party suggested pulling up part of a cement walkway, and this route was not so major.
Great! No issues. Small job. They offer other services as well.
Showed up on time and completed all requested work professionally and quickly. Have now signed up for bi-weekly services.
The installation was done in a timely manner and done well.

The job foreman and cleaning person, Rosa, arrived at the advised time. We went over the work to be done. After all the details were worked out, Rosa went to work. The results met my expectations. All interactions were professional. The work was completed on time. I would definitely use C&H’s services again.
The whole experience was great! The team members are extremely professional and we are thankful they showed up to help us.

My relative has been living in the same condo for over 50 years and finally agreed to have the junk acquired hauled away. During this process mold was found in a bedroom and kitchen wall. Al, the owner/manager, had given me a reasonable estimate in the beginning, and after finding the mold, another reasonable estimate was given. All work done was professional and on time. Not sure if this company is in business. I've not received a return call as yet.
Rosa was prompt, professional, and did a wonderful job!!
Fantastic! The two people who came really worked hard.....scrub bathroom tile floor, tons of dusting, and cleaning from top to bottom.
This was my first general cleaning after my deep cleaning last month. I am very happy with the quality of work performed. A great job. I will be setting up future monthly cleaning with C&H.

Al and his crew do an outstanding job! We have used them for both housecleaning and handyman services. Highly recommend. They have done a spring/deep cleaning which made the house look sparkly clean again, as well well as bi weekly cleaning to keep it maintained. In additon, we needed two doors replaced and they were able to handle this in just a few hours and at a reasonable price.

When I moved into my house I was disappointed in the condition it was in. I had Al come and provide a estimate to get it cleaned properly. I was very happy with the work performed. Friendly professional team that I will invite back help me deep clean the parts of my condo that are hard for me.
The servicer was polite and on time. The cleaner was thorough and very friendly. Excellent Job!
they showed up with 4 men and really turned to. great job. the moved, and cleaned under and around every thing, window tracks etc.. great job.

If you want a clean house with people who are consistent and responsible, this is the company for you. They may cost more, but they are more than worth it. Al is great and Rosa is awesome.
Wonderful company to work with. Al is very nice and communicative. I was very happy with their attention to detail.

very well, will rehire for further services

BOB AND JIM TREATED US VERY WELL, ENSURING THAT THE LEAK WAS FIXED BEFORE THEY DID THE REPAIR JOB. ONCE THE LEAK WAS FIXED, THEY PUT US AT THE TOP OF THEIR LIST AND THE JOB WAS PROMPTLY COMPLETED.
$300 PER SESSION, WHICH WAS ABOUT FOUR HOURS PER EACH VISIT.
BOB VECCHIO IS EXTREMELY PROFESSIONAL AND COURTEOUS.

THEY COULD NOT DO THE WORK DUE TO MY GEOGRAPHICAL LOCATION BUT TREATED ME WITH CLASS AND PROFESSIONALISM. THEY TRIED TO LOCATE OTHER CONTRACTORS WHO COULD DO THE WORK AND GAVE ME SOME OTHER PRACTICAL ADVICE. THEY WERE VERY RESPONSIVE. IF HOW THEY TREATED ME IS ANY EVIDENCE OF THE QUALITY OF THEIR WORK, THEY MUST BE EXCELLENT CONTRACTORS.
THEIR PRICE SEEMED HIGH, BUT THEY WERE AT MY HOUSE FOR 4 1/2 HOURS AND I DON''T HAVE ANYBODY TO COMPARE THEM WITH.
VERY THOROUGH. OWNER KEPT CHECKING TO MAKE SURE EVERYTHING WAS GOING OKAY. THE WORK WAS COMPLETE IN LESS THAN A WEEK.
WE HAD ARRANGED FOR THE WORK TO BE DONE BY ANOTHER CONTRACTOR WHO BECAME GRAVELY ILL. WE HIRED THE HOUSE DOCTORS AT THE LAST MINUTE AND THEY WERE ABLE TO GET THE WORK DONE.
VERY TRUSTWORTHY. TRUST THEM TO ENTER HOME EVEN WHEN CLIENT NOT PRESENT.

JIM CAME TO OUR HOUSE TO DO THE WORK. HE WAS EXTREMELY PLEASANT TO WORK WITH. HE SUGGESTED SEVERAL DIFFERENT OPTIONS FOR FIXING SOMETHING, GAVE THE PROS AND CONS OF EACH OPTION, THEN LET ME DECIDE ON THE BEST SOLUTION. WILL DEFINITELY USE AGAIN! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
NOT ONLY WERE THEY NEAT , EFFICIENT AND THOROUGH, THE HOUSE DOCTOR WAS ALSO VERY NICE PERSON TO HAVE AROUND. EVEN TOOK OUT THE DOG.

American Home Improvement gave me a beautiful kitchen and bathroom. Everything from plumping, electric, and asbestos removal was performed professional and timely. The price was fully discussed and agreed on, there were no surprises. My project manager Shawn walked me through each step, keeping me up to date on everything. Great experience!

They did my kitchen last month. David was the one that did the design, based on my instructions. I put quartz in the kitchen and at the bar. Amazingly cut and finished. They are a bit pricey but the quality is great. I have an open concept design and I've received a lot of compliments for my kitchen. I would recommend them to anyone that has the budget to invest in quality cabinets. They also did my bar.

American Home Improvement is a very good remodeling company. They fixed my issue with the kitchen in no time at all. The people from there was very nice and polite when working and did everything with caution as to not cause any problems when working. I liked their work ethics and I recommend them to you too!

AHI did a phenomenal remodel of my kitchen. They were professional throughout the whole project and answered all questions I had. End result was just as I expected and nothing less than what they had promised. Really happy and impressed with their work. Thanks a lot! I highly recommend this company!

My kitchen design is much better than before thanks to team AHI. Their team is very professional and able to imply the design I had told them at a great accuracy! Super friendly people and very good customer service. It was a pleasure doing business with them!

I had American Home Improvement Inc to renovate my washroom. From the beginning of the job we felt completely comfortable with AHI crew. They were on time, courteous and professional. I will definitely use them soon for my next reno!

We are very pleased with how our kitchen has turned out. David had great ideas and suggestions on design, and helped us pull the whole look together. All the work was done in a very professional manner, and has a high quality, and clean look. All the contractors involved in our reno were extremely hard working and friendly. American Home Improvement Inc installed our cabinets, and worked long hours, and were happy to help with any of our requests. They took care of every little detail.

We just completed a bathroom remodel with Jack Mair of American Home Improvement. From start to finish, the entire experience was fantastic. Jack communicated with us consistently and was very patient when there were COVID shipping delays. Every specialist that came to our home was excellent, and they were especially responsive in fixing final details like slightly crooked shelves and grout.  I would definitely work with the company again, especially Jack.

I had the pleasure of working with Ben at AHI for a bathroom renovation and change of bedroom flooring in my condo.  My unit was built in 2001, and it was screaming, "Outdated!"  Ben presented some ideas that upgraded my unit to present time.  He worked around my budget and was able to improvise when needed.  The team that Ben put together for my projects was AMAZING!!  Felix's team handled my flooring, and I absolutely love it!!  Jose and Romeo created the bathroom of my dreams.  Julian completed my dream bathroom with a custom shower door.  The quality and beauty of a custom shower door from Julian will make you frown upon any other kind of shower door... it's a game changer.  All teams were respectful of my unit by being extra clean and noise-conscious when removing the prior flooring and demolishing the bathroom.  Everyone working on my projects was detail-oriented, diligent and stayed on track with the projected date of completion.  Ben visited my unit regularly to monitor the progress of the projects.  He also assisted with answering any questions that the HOA had.  All in all, my experience with AHI was extremely positive.  Everything is beautiful - the outcome exceeds my expectations!  In addition, everything was completed within budget and on time.  Looking forward to reaching out to Ben again for my next project.

We renovated our whole kitchen with AHI. It turned out very good and looks great! They had to come back and fix a few things which they did willingly and quickly. We're really pleased with it and would definitely recommend.

I have had a kitchen designed and installed and recently had a bathroom designed and installed by American Home Improvement. This company comes highly recommended, as they are professional and provide high quality products with reasonable pricing. What sets them apart in my opinion is the after sales service. Once your project is complete they don't disappear, as if you have deficiencies they will go above and beyond to make it right. I have dealt with Sam on both projects and he was great, not pushy and provided great insight into the designs. I recently recommended AHI to friends and they got their kitchen installed and were pleased with the entire process. First class company and a delight to deal with!

American Home Improvement Inc came highly recommended from a friend & they did not disappoint. It was such a pleasure dealing with David & the whole staff at AHI. They went above and beyond & provided amazing customer service regardless of how small the detail was. AHI is one of a kind & we will definitely work with them in the future. Thanks again! We love our home away from home kitchen,

We are absolutely thrilled with our new kitchen!! David was amazing with the design, planning and implementation of the project. All their staff beginning with Shawn and his team in the construction phase right through to all of the installers were prompt and professional and addressed everything we asked of them. I have heard so many horror stories from others during their kitchen renovations but with American Home Improvement Inc there was absolutely no worries, delays or excuses. Every promise they made was granted and we love the end result!!! I would recommend American Home Improvement Inc to all my friends and family with no hesitation. Thanks David and everyone that played a part in this.

We had a wonderful experience with American Home Improvement Inc and our painters! He responded and came out right away and answered all of our questions. All the painters were very professional and friendly. Our family of  5 was at home working and attending virtual school, and everyone was very respectful and safe coming into the home. And now our house looks so beautiful! I would absolutely recommend them and use them again in the future.

David and his entire team created an amazing kitchen. Sam was always around for advice. Installers were very professional. He was always keeping us updated our order. We are now getting built in for the family room made and built in for the bedroom. If you want quality work at a fair price this is the place to go to. American Home Improvement Inc went above and beyond to assist us.

It was a pleasure doing business with American Home Improvement Inc. David and his team ran into some unusual challenges with our job but finished the work and made things right. After receiving several quotes for the job - I could tell that this company were true experts in what they do. Thank you to David and American Home Improvement Inc crew!
They did amazing work. Staff was very friendly and skilled. I will tell everyone I know about them and will use them again in the future.

Great service from the beginning to the end. I am very happy with the work that was done. Will definitely go back to get my bathrooms done and will recommend American Home Improvement Inc to all my friends 100%.

These guys are as pro as they come. They were awesome. Their work was skilled, clean and they took their time to ensure everything was done perfectly. They were a pleasure to have around and did a fantastic job. Would hire again in a pinch.

David and Sam did an amazing job on 2 bathrooms for us. They protected our floors and left a clean worksite every evening. You select your vanity, tiles & accessories and Sam does the rest, picking up everything and making sure you are happy throughout the job.
David is a wizard in all aspects of the reno. They all go above and beyond and I look forward to using American Home Improvement Inc again.

We are so happy with the work we had done. Sam was phenomenal!! Great communication and excellent attention to detail!! Thank you so much American Home Improvement Inc, and a great big thank you to Sam!!
American Home Improvement Inc did a great job on our new kitchen. They took my vision and new kitchen floorplan, and made it real. All in all, a great end product and a positive customer experience.
Thank you David and your hardworking teram for making our two bathroom renos such a great success! We appreciate the guidance and love the new look and comfort of our bathrooms.
David and his team were amazing! Showed up early and worked through until the job was done! Knowledgeable and took the time to make sure we were satisfied with the job. Professional!
American Home Improvement is a very good remodeling company. They work very fast and with accuracy. They are very polite and very professional.

Booking AHI for painting was very quick, they give a quota and you send them a deposit and book a date and colors. It took 2 days to paint 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living rooms and closets and it looks like a new condo after painting. I highly recommend them!

Excellent work painting my entire condo including the kitchen ceiling, inside closets, all doors, trim and baseboards. The painters were courteous and very accommodating. I would definitely recommend Home American Home Improvement Inc.
We called AHI in to help us fix up our house - there was minor work on the second floor. Problems have been resolved quickly and efficiently.

My wife and I could not have been more pleased with the work completed by American Home Improvement Inc. Project manager provided splendid service from start to finish and administration of our account was professional and courteous. I'll have no hesitation in recommending them to friends and family!
Great company. On time and on budget. They take tremendous pride in their work and stop at nothing to get it done properly. Wouldn't look any further for Reno guys. This is the company to use.

We are so happy with our Reno from American Home Improvement Inc. They were quick, clean and friendly and our project manager Josh went above and beyond to complete our Reno. We would highly recommend them if you are looking for a high quality basement renovation!

David and his team at American Home Improvement renovated my entire basement last summer and did a fantastic job. I recently called American Home Improvement to explain a minor leak that I noticed underneath my laundry sink and a crack in the drywall. They were both fixed right away. This is what I appreciate about them, their promise and delivery in ensuring that their customers are completely satisfied. David  el is a man of his word and I say with confidence through my own experience that he will continue to treat you as his customer even after the project is completed.

They did a complete overhaul of our guest bathroom. from the time they submitted the original quote until the project was complete they provided quality service, and genuine assistance. answered all of our questions quickly, and delivered a perfect outcome. Would use them again.

American Home Improvement Inc delivered on quality of the work and the promise time of 3 weeks completion was kept. They were professional and easy to work with. The project manager David took it personal to ensure customer satisfaction. The architectural and technical planning was collaborative and each we were kept up to date as the land unfolded. It is important for anyone using this company to do your own research on prices as they are a bit pricey. Overall they worked well and on schedule.

American Home Improvement Inc just finished our basement renovation and we are very pleased with the results. We chose them due to their reputation for high quality and being under budget. Ben was very knowledgeable and professional and he was always available to answer questions. He managed the various contractors and got the project finished on time. We would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone.
David was an excellent project manager. He was up front, honest and accurate with everything that he told us.

With my overall vision to guide them, American Home Improvement Inc. took my preferences and tastes and with the assistance of their professional designer, turned what used to be an old ordinary condo unit, into a stunningly luxurious designer masterpiece. It is truly a transformed space, and a sight to behold. it is just beautiful. I absolutely love it!

Created a living and storage space in our previously unfinished basement. New floor, walls, ceiling. Very professional service throughout the entire project with excellent communication of schedule, changes, etc. Our project manager, Alan was extremely friendly and definitely went above and beyond to help guide us through the entire reno project. We are looking forward to our next project (upstairs bathrooms) with American Home Improvement.

It's been a pleasure to work with American Home Improvement Inc. Ben is very involved, a great communicator and trustworthy. If I send him a text or email he always get back to me right away. I've hired other companies in the past and have had a very disappointing experience! I have recommended American Home Improvement Inc , Inc to friends.

We decided that we were going to remodel our house.  We received a few bids and decided on American Home Improvement.   We are remodeling our kitchen, all flooring and two bathrooms.   Our contractor Jack is very detail oriented and has extensive knowledge.  The sub contractors were courteous and worked around our schedule.  I was always asked at the end of the day if there was anything else that I wanted done and they responded to my needs.  They always cleaned up after they were completed for the day. The craftsmanship was outstanding.  Jack was very patient with us.  Some of our decisions took a little time. Plus we had the work done during a worldwide pandemic so supplies were short but he still finished on time and on budget.  I highly recommend American Home Improvement and especially Jack.
Very professional, the site manager and crew are very courteous. The office staff was very helpful picking up the decor. I strongly recommend them to anyone who wants to get to basement renovated.

Excellent support from the quote from American Home Improvement. Highly recommend this company to take away your renovation concerns and get it done in a timely manner with very little mess or fuss. They helped us through the design process, selecting vanities, faucets etc as well as mirrors and colours. They were so professional and friendly - They did it all including demolition, plumbing, electrical, installation of tub, faucets, toilets etc as well as tiling. They were very easy to work with and did a great job.

American Home Improvement Inc completed the project on time and made sure to stay in communication throughout the process. Ben was a great point of contact for our project. Looking forward to finishing the rest of the project ourselves.
I cannot say enough good about this company's handling of my complete bathroom renovation. From beginning to end, they did an amazing job, on time, and on budget.

The American Home Improvement Inc experience was great, from quoting the job by David, to coming by map out, and Nick who did the work framing in a wall and closet for a second bedroom, finishing and painting. Great job, I would recommend this group to everyone. Thank you.

We contracted American Home Improvement Inc to help us with a full kitchen renovation, including removing a wall, new floors, new counters, custom cabinets etc. Overall, we were very happy with the end result and quality of work.

I cannot day enough about Gerhard and his team Nadia, John and Elvis! This is a team that works with the utmost integrity and takes so much pleasure in their craft. My bathroom is perfect. They never ended their day with making sure everything was spotless. I truly felt like they were part of the family and miss them. Their workmanship is impeccable and my washroom has made my family and friend a envious! Thank you so much and I would use them again and again without hesitation! Can not wait for my kitchen Reno now!

Everything came together perfectly and we couldn't be happier. The kitchen is beautiful and all the materials and designs are just like we dreamed they would be. Thank you American Home Improvement Inc and David!

We have a complete remodel of our house in La Canada Flintridge in July 2020 - four bedrooms, three bathrooms, den, living room and kitchen.  Our Project Manager Neev was very professional, organized and provided a lot of ideas and resources for us to get to the design we wanted.  Neev was able to navigate through the workplace COVID restrictions, ensuring that only the necessary employees are on site with proper PPE and social distancing.  Neev made sure we were on track to procure what we needed. Neev was able to orchestrate the project despite the pandemic-imposed supply chain limitations that impacted delivery of the important construction materials (hardwood floors for the entire 2,800 sq. ft. house, tiles, etc.).  We were further impressed at how transparent and dedicated Neev was despite of competing projects.  AHI and Neev is highly recommended.

American Home Improvement Inc renovation company in the valley. A professional outfit that really cares. They managed my kitchen renovation flawlessly completing on time and exactly on budget. Great job.

I loved the approach, I loved the educational background, I loved the professionalism. Absolutely top of the line tradespeople and suppliers, excellent workmanship and crew, and outstanding management capabilities. Go with them or never go home!
Got to work when the hurricane hit us and they were able to dry a lot of it up and get us in our house quickly!
Everyone was professional, courteous and highly responsive. We love the work and would highly recommend American Home Improvement Inc to all our friends and family.
Exceptional and we love our bathroom. Many thanks to David for help with the design. Everything turned out beautiful!!!

We were very happy that we chose American Home Improvement Inc to remodel our master bathroom! David is focused on customer service, working with us and the materials we chose to get beautiful results. He gave us a fair estimate and followed up in person with each stage of the job to make sure we were happy with the results. We are very pleased with our new bathroom and definitely recommend American Home Improvement Inc!
Thank you to the American Home Improvement Inc people for creating and updating our beautiful house that we can now create memories in our new home.

The work went fast and quicker than planned.  A very efficient crew showed up the first day and did preparation work.  The crew then cleaned up the coverings and moved all the furniture back into place. The painters were professional and hard working. I am very pleased with the outcome.  I recommend the use of American Home Improvement Inc to everyone.

American Home Improvement Inc is a great place to go to if you want exceptional home remodeling. David had exceptional communication skills and knew exactly what I wanted for my home. Very creative and brilliant minds and know exactly what the customer wants. Thank you, David for all your help! Would highly recommend this company to anyone!

David from American Home Improvement Inc did a fabulous job in painting my condo. He completed the work on time and with no variation from original the estimate provided by Ben. David also helped me with choosing the color combination. I am absolutely satisfied with his's work ethics, attitude and dedication. I will happily recommend American Home Improvement Inc to anyone.

We called American Home Improvement Inc for a kitchen remodel project. After talking to several other contractors we decided to go with American Home Improvement Inc and are so happy with their work! I love my new kitchen!  It was a pleasure to work with this team - they were very responsive, professional and easy to work with. I highly recommend them!!

We had our entire kitchen and our bathroom done with American Home Improvement Inc. It was a great experience from the initial meeting through to the finished product. David was our designer. He is extremely patient and very helpful! We had a few quirky design wishes, which he happily went along with and made happen!  Have recommended American Home Improvement Inc to friends who were also happy, and we’ll definitely use them again in the future!!

We re-did our kitchen and two bathrooms from American Home Improvement Inc. We had David and his super crew!  Very comfortable and confident in his skills and knowledge. We were impressed and delighted with our new house. Everything was clean and they even cleaned out the ventilation system! I am a hard skeptic when it comes to labor work, and I must admit that for once I was blown away and impressed by work done in my house.

American Home Improvement Inc did a great job on our new kitchen. They took my vision and new kitchen floor plan, and made it real. David sat with us for several sessions to complete the layout and problem solve where needed. He offered good suggestions as well. There were some hiccups, however when brought to their attention, they addressed issues promptly, so you do have to be your own advocate (which will apply with every company). All in all, a great end product and a positive customer experience.

American Home Improvement Inc completely gutted our master bath down to the studs. They even had to replace much of the sub floor. We are so pleased with the results. Highly recommend this company. They took pride in doing it right and keeping me informed and happy!!

American Home Improvement Inc was referred to me by a relative that used their services for a kitchen remodel. Had the pleasure of working with David for the completion of my bar in the basement. David was very attentive and understood the vision I was trying to accomplish. We had a few concerns during the process but David was quick to rectify the situation. Overall, I would recommend American Home Improvement Inc.

My amazing experience with American Home Inc started before I even owned my new dream home.The scope ended up being popcorn ceiling removal, new flooring throughout, two brand new washrooms (one with walk in shower), all new lighting, kitchen enhancements and a full paint job etc. Very professional team! Thanks David for making it real! Will recommend American Home Improvement Inc all my friends!

The work done by Sam and David exceed all my expectations. Professional, polite, clean and thoughtful are just a few of the words to explain how happy we are with their work. From day one to the day they left it was always a pleasure dealing with them. The end product is better than we hoped. They are not the cheapest out there but I believe the price reflects their dedication and attention to detail.

I highly recommend AHI to anyone looking for a contractor you can trust. I hope they stay in business forever, we will use them for all future renovations.

I hired Hollywood Builders for a full kitchen remodel. Eli was able to look at photos of kitchens or parts of kitchens I like and came up with a design that was a great starting point. What I appreciated was how he was able to understand my style almost immediately. During the actual remodel, I was most impressed with just how quickly and easily any small mistakes (and they do happen) were rectified. The final product was just amazing! It looks great, but the best feeling was unpacking all my boxes full of kitchen stuff and finding that everything had it’s place, every drawer was used well, and there were no awkward or odd spaces that I wished I had done something different with. This kitchen is super functional and a pure joy to cook in and show off to my with family and friends.

We had AHI team to do a complete renovation of a penthouse apartment, including the entire kitchen, two bathrooms and doors. They did an outstanding job.They consulted with me every step of the way and had some very good ideas. We couldn't be happier with our new apartment. I would highly recommend American Home Improvement for any kind of  apartment renovation/construction work.

American Home Improvement Inc is courteous and professional. I had a great impression from Sam's on-site visit, his apparent expertise in painting and the quick turnaround of a quote. Sam took the time to recommend and test samples of colors on the walls for me to choose. Sam and Benjamin were excellent on the job, very professional and responsive to all my requests. The completed job was of high quality and exceeded my expectations. They finished ahead of schedule and on budget. They cleaned up very well and left the place spotless. Thank you again American Home Improvement Inc! And the crew for a great job!

Got a full bathroom remodeling done by American Home Improvement Inc Inc and I'm loving it. They provided me with a catalogue at first but I didn't quite like them so I gave them ideas and they got the 3D model ready which looked absolutely fantastic. And after confirming that they started working here which was done very smoothly. And now the completed product looks absolutely sunning and I love it. They are great to say the least.

I am SO happy with my renovation! I had two structural walls removed, a complete kitchen re-do as well as new floors, lighting, baseboards and ceilings throughout the main living space of my house. David , Sam and the guys were phenomenal--they came in on budget, three weeks ahead of schedule, and everything was of the finest quality. It was a real pleasure to work with them, so much so that they will be renovating the other half of my house this summer. If I could rate them 6 out of 5, I would!

Sam team are incredible! Don't bother looking anywhere else. They are worth every penny and they do a fantastic job. They went above and beyond on the job we were quoted and then noticed our main entry walls were a little beaten up....came back the next day with a quart of paint and spent extra time doing touch ups. We have very high expectations and they always meet them.

American Home Improvement Inc provided a very high quality result for our bath remodel project. They were easy to communicate with, providing input when needed while still adhering to our rather detailed vision. Once started all work proceeded steadily and without delay. Work areas were kept neat and adjacent rooms well protected throughout construction. Cost was very reasonable.

American Home Improvement Inc team went the extra mile and did all the other extras for me within the time frame they were given. They only added couple of months more for doing all the other changes which we couldn't leave for later. They helped me with picking all the finishing and consulted me about trying new ideas and textures, which I was hesitant about at the beginning, but since I was familiar with their work and design, we agreed to have it done the way they designed and we love everything now. I will definitely work with them again.

Sam and his team did an amazing job in creating our small builder kitchen into a Wonderful/Awesome Kitchen and made us a beautiful bar. I would recommend their services to everyone I know due to their excellent and efficient team. They listen to your needs and provide an optimum solution to make you smile.

American Home Improvement Inc was recommended by a friend & they did not disappoint. David got back to us quickly and came by for a quote shortly after. He worked with us to decide the best colors, and his crew was punctual, polite and efficient and the work was excellent. So much so I hired them again a few months later to do another room in my house! We were very impressed.

Great team to work with. After taking several quotations from several companies, we finally decided to go for fresh home innovations since their quote was the cheapest. The entire process was easy going, the crew was really professional. I would definitely recommend working with American Home Improvement Inc.

Very pleased with my new kitchen. Very professional company. David did a great job recommending and designing it. Installation team were very professional and paid lot of attention to details. Prices are Also reasonable! They are also really nice and friendly. We will be working with them for sure in the future. I highly recommend American Home Improvement and David for anyone looking for trustworthy, carrying, and good contractors!

Thankfully American Home Improvement Inc came in and gave us a lots of great ideas and design and started the work within a month. Again their work made my home look fantastic. Words can’t describe how happy I am with how beautiful everything has turned out.
They were great to work with, painters were especially impressive of all the trades. Would highly recommend!

With numerous general contractors and home builders available to choose from, we selected American Home Improvement Inc again to begin construction on our new location. Price, quality, attention to details, and lead time were all concerns of ours. David & Sam were able to fulfill all of our anxieties.

The company was very professional, stayed within the budget, specifications, and timeline agreed upon, and responsive. We were kept abreast of the process in each stage. We'll definitely rehire them for future projects.

Even thinking of remodeling our kitchen was enough to drive me up the walls. We finally decided to pull the trigger and get estimates. After multiple estimates we where over the moon when we found AHI! David, the project manager, took his time and reviewed all the details with us. He made sure to never to make us feel rushed or pressured into buying anything. From when the job started to when it finished everything that Davidsaid would be done was done. There where some hiccups, some delays, but we where prepared for it all. Overall, I will recommend Davidsaid and AHI Builders to all my friends, family, and clients!!

They redid our kitchen and both bathrooms. A complete refurbish of these rooms. All new cabinets, floors, counter tops, painting, and reset necessary electrical components. We would certainly have them back. Great job.

They remodeled 3 of my bedroom including the master bedroom and the kitchen. The house now looks beautiful and the sense of space by them was awesome. I really love how the house looks like now. They are the best!

Working with American Home Improvement Inc was a completely problem-free process. The excellent customer service, as well as the high level of communication that the employees maintained with me allowed us to concentrate on other things instead of getting stressed over the renovations and whether or not everything was going according to plan. Everything looks so much better than it did before. Thank you so much for a job well done.
We are very pleased with the work done thus far. David is a pleasure to work with. I'd recommend him to anyone!
Excellent work for the price. Job was completed a day early. Kenneth was very courteous, professional, and a diligent worker. Would recommend him to my friends and family.

I had been recommended American Home Improvement Inc from a friend. I had been telling her about me and my wife's experiences getting estimates from contractors for our kitchen. She said she had worked with Benjamin and AHI in the past, that they were father and son owned and that they do great work. I decided to give them a shot. I'm happy, my wife's happy thanks to Benjamin and AHI.

American Home Improvement remodel our home. We upgraded our kitchen and bathrooms, installed hardwood flooring and repainted the interior and exterior of our house. We were so impressed with their attention to detail, and how well organized the construction company runs. The entire project was handled professionally and the final result was a reflection of our taste. Our kitchen and bathroom remodel came out better than we expected. During the work that they did at my house, I could see that they are detail oriented, hardworking and skilled. They did the work remarkably beautiful. My old kitchen was demolished completely and they installed new plumbing, cabinets, lightings and appliances while in the bathroom they replaced the tub and shower while installing new floor, hardware and vanity with double sink. During the work, I noticed that Daniel was very honest and fair with me while having excellent communication skills as well. I didn't experienced any hidden charges or additional extras. With my past experience it was hard to find a team who knows their work so well and that honesty is their main factor. I would definitely work with them again!!!

After three weeks, just got started. I'll let you know. I will update the rating when the work is completed.  While I would have liked to have more work done, the work Micky did was more than I thought was possible, on my budget. He was always very professional and kept me up to date. I don't know if it was the time of year that delayed the work, but I'm very happy with the end results.

After interviewing several contractors, we hired AHI to remodel our master bathroom, guest bathroom, and laundry room. Within hours of initially contacting them, AHI sent a project manager, Neev, to our house to generate a quote. From the outset, Neev was detail oriented, picked up on issues that other contractors had missed, and sat down with us to generate a quote on-site. AHI’s quote was comparable to other bids, so we ultimately chose them for the project because they seemed the most service-oriented and capable of delivering what we wanted. I’m glad we did.

Neev was very responsive, communicative, and organized throughout the project. He helped us work through a couple of issues that arose in renovating a 100-year old house without nickel-and-diming us.  His foreman, Tal, was very hands-on and helped us settle some design issues, and the entire crew was polite and respectful of our home. Despite some setbacks, the team finished on time and we are thrilled with the work.

Shawn was wonderful. He came out same day for a quote and was available soon after for another project. He was respectful and great at communicating the steps along the way. It was better than I could imagine! Thanks!
Micky did a great job for a great price and I would use his services again!! Everything went really well.

A general contractor that is experienced, professional and great to work with! These guys really know what they are doing!

We would definitely recommend AHI to anyone undertaking a kitchen remodel and bedroom or your next remodeling.

This contractor is highly recommended! He was able to fix the problems of another contractor. Most of all he can do many many things with a high degree of quality. This is HIGHLY recommended handyman! Thanks Precision Contracting for all the great work you have done in my home and will definitely hire again.

I was quite pleased and happy with the work that Micky did for me and will be contracting him to do more work on my home in the very near future. Please continue to keep him on your list as he was courteous, timely and did excellent work!!

American Home Improvement Inc made my apartment absolutely new . I love my new dark hardwood and walls that are looking like a brick now . Bathroom -. Overall guys did an excellent work . That was exactly what I paid for .

American Home Improvement decided to remodel my kitchen, anticipating the value of my condo to increase. I interviewed 3 contractors and American Home Improvement was the only company I invited over to my condo for a follow up meeting and agreed on a labor price and signed the contract. The job was completed in 30 days, work was up to par as expected. I knew i was in good hands from the beginning of the job.  I've been meaning to write this review for a while because this company deserves it, thank you American Home Improvement.

American Home Improvement Inc has helped us turn our house into a beautiful, warm home.  We cannot thank them enough for their hard work and commitment to improving our home before our baby arrived.  Not only were they prompt, trustworthy and reliable, their work was outstanding and exceeded our expectations.  We highly recommend them to anyone.

American Home Improvement Inc has excellent quality of craftsmanship and customer service. They were like a breath of air. They were attentive to our needs and always followed up with to make sure that we were happy. I would recommend this Co.

I only have the highest praises for Neev, his company and his work. From the beginning, Neev displayed so much warmth and sincerity towards us. From the first consultation, he gave tremendous time and detail to what we could anticipate if we were to hire him for our project, a full bathroom remodel. He was never in a rush, so open to conversation, and actively listened to what our expectations were for our project. Neev always carried himself with utmost professionalism, while establishing and maintaining a personal relationship, with constant, open and timely communication. The entire process was incredibly smooth. Neev gave us direction each step of the way, allowing us to choose our style and shop within our budget. Everything was done is a timely fashion and the project was finished so quickly! Every person involved in the project was professional, and we did not feel that our privacy was invaded at any point. We could not be happier with the final result of the bathroom. We would recommend Neev to anyone looking to do any remodeling or reconstruction, and would definitely work with him in the future! Thank you Neev!
The installers were very professional and polite. My home looks brand new and definitely added to the total value. I would recommend them for any home owner. I love the way the they designed.

American Home Improvement just finished a painting job for me and they were great.  It was a difficult job with a lot of detail work on an old building and they stayed until it was perfect.  Everything was checked over by someone with an eye for detail and it passed with flying colors. I would definitely American Home Improvement.

We chose American Home Improvement  for a large kitchen and bathroom project that took 2+ months. It was a fantastic decision because the crew treated us like family, were incredibly communicative, and professional, kind and did a fantastic job. Even when they did the initial demolition, they left our house swept and ready for us to walk through. It's a best case scenario for having contractors in your house everyday. When it comes to design they are fantastic, and helped us make decisions that really improved the look and feel of our space. We couldn't be happier with the final outcome!

We were very pleased with American Home Improvement Inc!  Our home needed foundation repair along the entire front of the house as well as replacement of the entry stairs which also meant rebuilding a portion of exterior wall and re stucco.  Benjamin was easy to deal with and did exactly what he said he would do.  The contract and payment schedule was clearly spelled out.  They started the job when they said, his workers showed up every day on time, cleaned up after themselves every day and they finished within a day or so of scheduled completion.  I was extremely impressed with how efficient and how well-calculated they were with their time and scheduling. They were attentive to our needs and always followed up with to make sure that we were happy.I would recommend to everyone.

Excellent work, completed ahead of time and was very competitively priced. They did a major repair on our kitchen & bathroom. Two walls taken down, a window put in, plus a lot of other work on the house, including electrical, moving a gas line, and redoing floors.  I recommend American Home Improvement without hesitation.

Benjamin and his team exceeded our expectations for our renovation. Our home had lots of challenges that other contractors couldn't overcome! Benjamin and his team not only figured out how to work out the challenges, but transformed our home into a beautiful place. We are so grateful for their attention to detail and design. Thank you American Home Improvement Inc and Benjamin  
for a great experience.

Thanks to American Home Improvement Inc for our amazing kitchen! In addition to our kitchen, they also performed painting, plumbing, and some general contractor work all at a reasonable price. My husband and I found them very easy to work with and very professional. We would recommend them to anyone looking to have their kitchen or bath remodeled.

I needed to add a shower in my parents room and David and his crew came through.  David listened intently to my parents needs and offered creative and practical solutions to the limited space available.  For the shower addition, he was able to skillfully make it so one could roll a wheelchair right in, with no step at all.  A slight slope was made for wheelchair access and water drainage. David offered to assist me in choosing tile, fixtures, and grab bars for my parents.  They look beautiful.  He had to deal with many different personalities at my parents home and he was patient and professional through the whole job.  His crew was always prompt, friendly and cleaned up after themselves. He finished the job in just a few weeks. My parents are so happy with the finished project.  We would definitely use him again.

Very pleased with our bathroom remodel!  They have done the job in no time, with careful cleanup when they were done. Installation then went forward with no delays, no waiting for materials or available crew. Nick helped with selection of beautifully coordinated tile, which was installed with meticulous attention to detail.  Excellent communications and supervision throughout the whole project.  And the price was reasonable.  We would hire them again for our future need and highly recommended Nick and AHM for your next construction!!

Shawn and his guys did a unbelievable job on my bathroom. My bathroom was all were old tile from the 80's with a leaking shower. Now we have white marble with amazing borders. When I was searching for company's all the construction company's I contacted gave me a horrible vibe from the start. I decided to invite 2 contractors to my house and Shawn was one of them. He suggested different options on expanding my bathroom and changing the layout at an affordable price. I felt very comfortable with him and his crew during the job and feel very confident with the quality after. The premises was kept clean during the job which was agreed upon in our original meeting and the job was completed on a timely manner. I had mentioned to Shawn I've always wanted a rain shower so he decided it was a good idea to surprise me with one as we did not agree to it on the original contract. I owe it to this company for such professional and quality work. I recommend Shawn and his crew for any of your remodeling and/or construction projects.

I will hire this company again. They did work for both my neighbors and they referred me them. They did my exterior painting, windows, bathroom vanity and tile. The job exceeded my expectation and the time of work was 2 weeks from start to end. I will be calling this company again

I recently contacted 1oak remodeling through a friend as she just remodeled her kitchen. I also just went through a big renovation and was not in the mood for another one although I urgently needed to repair my driveway and landscape the front of my home. They set an appointment with me and guided me through all the steps and procedures. My job finished in 1 week!!! They had a full crew working everyday to make my dreams come true. This company is really 1 of a kind! Thank you for all your help!!

Shawn from AHI did an excellent job.  I recently hired them to remodel my 80 year old Mother's bathroom.  My intention was to accommodate handicapped accessible usage to an older home.  Most contractors that I contacted prior to the remodel wanted to sell an elaborate over the top remodel to a room that I had already laid out with my ideas and intentions.  Those contractors that came out, came as a team and wanted to sign a on the spot 1 day only sale price, otherwise the price would go up.  After contacting them, I was listened to, told them what I wanted and they proposed a reasonable solution.  There was no pressure or "sales" attack.  Having dreaded doing a job like this while meeting with several shady contractors, I was pleasantly surprised with the fact that they took care of everything.  No surprises or additional charges, etc.  Just a competent, professional and thorough job from a very happy customer.  I would highly recommend Shawn and American Home Improvement your remodeling needs.

I awarded American Home Improvement Inc my Wiltshire home renovation and am very pleased with their service. Very clean crew and they are perfectionists!!! Love their work and their collaboration with my Designer. Thank you Jose!

American Home Improvement in Los Angeles! They understands quality and good building practices. From start to finish their attention to detail is excellent. The work site is always well organized and clean. Michael did an outstanding job overseeing the construction project. I had a room addition built and completely renovated my entire house, including remodeling my kitchen and all four bathrooms. All of the workers were friendly and fantastic at their specific trade. They were easy to communicate with and made an effort to keep the site safe (I have a toddler). They came out, was very nice and Michael and his team was able to complete the remodeling in less than a month. All the materials were selected from his vendors and Michael was able to get us a nice discount. During the whole remodeling, Michael visited us often and informed us about the progress and any problem that came up and what solution can solve it. His honesty and professionalism proved itself during this work and we are thankful for that. I would recommend this contractor to anyone that values quality and detailed work!!!

I hired American Home Improvement Inc for a whole house remodel. We pretty much broke down all interior and exterior walls and reconfigured walls to create an open floor plan. I believe they have before and after photos on their profile, not sure if the photos are up yet but boy was it a transformation! Throughout the process, I learned so much about construction. Never realized how many tedious decisions are needed in order to remodel a house, starting with kitchen cabinets, counter tops, blinds, color of paint, floors, on and on and on. Overall it was a great project, and I would hire these guys to work for me again in a heartbeat. Most important thing to me is being able to stay true to my preset budget.

I had my house renovated by the and I loved the time I spent working with them. The staffs are very nice and open to any suggestions and accept the help if given. I had a great time with them and they did the job very good too. Definitely recommend them.

They remodeled 3 of my bedroom including the master bedroom and the kitchen and I couldn't be happier because of how good they did on their job. The house now looks beautiful and the sense of space by them was awesome. I really love how the house looks like now. They are the best!

Their crew is amazing. They did my kitchen and bathroom, and I couldn't have been happier with their job. They were very nice and friendly, they kept the workspace clean and organized which helped everyone in that situation move around the house with more comfort. They know how to make their customers happy and provide good servicing with their tools. Working with them has been awesome for me so I'll recommend them to anyone needing a remodeling.

I called them in for my home renovation and they sent someone to check things and give an estimate . The think i was more concerned about is if I would get the kind of look i want from them. But to my surprise they provided me good quality design which was spot on with my expectation on the remodeling. The team sent to my work was very friendly. Their service is very good.I will definitely call American Home Improvement Inc if i want another redesign.

I needed a garage conversion and I heard that American Home Improvement is right company for that job. They respond quickly to my quote and gave me best possible offer and I hired them. The project went perfect, on time and within budget. The result was as I expected, excellent. I highly recommend American Home Improvement, they are truly professionals.

My experience with American Home Improvement couldn't really have been any better. They did a wonderful job on my front porch. This is my second project using them and i would not hesitate to hire them again. Highly recommend them.

I am very pleased with the work Done by Sibay, I hired this contractor to remodel the kitchen in my new home because I didn't have enough counter space and I bake a lot.

Only set back was that there was a door that was accidentally scratched when the counter tops where being installed but they fixed the door a few days later. My sister is hiring them also for her bathroom and I hope she has just the same experience as I did.

Working with Shawn was great, after visiting their location and meeting the staff I felt very comfortable with my decision to remodel. I got American Home Improvements to renovate my house, and they did it so good! They came in and completed the job fast. But there was no decline in quality of the job despite them being fast. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a renovation.

American Home Improvement did our bathroom remodel. This company deserves 6 stars if that was possible! I usually shop around before I make a choice. I can say in confidence that I can totally recommend them for either small or big jobs.  The crew were very professional, and on top of their work and especially their prices are very compatible.  They went above and beyond what they promise!

I can only say that American Home Improvement has been the greatest company in the field of construction in terms of no hassle. I appreciated everything about working with them. American Home Improvement remodeled my father's bathroom and it came out great.  Our project manager, Avi, was responsive to our needs and made excellent suggestions and made sure everything went as smoothly as possible.   We liked working with him so much and loved the work that they did that we are already in talks for another project.

American home improvement helped me remodel and completely make my home energy efficient and made it affordable for my family to do so with a energy efficiency financing option. I was also able to upgrade my electrical panel and will be having solar panels installed in the next few months.

I hired American home for a remodel of my guest house and addition of a master suite, I couldn't be happier with the work they did. My project manager Shawn was always available to answer my questions and the work turned out better than I imagined.

I love my new outdoor kitchen. People from American Home Improvement were great to work with. They wrere professional, honest, respectful and they really cares about customer satisfaction. Highest recommendation, will work with them again!

Excellent job! They recently remodeled my bathroom, it was full remodeling and they did everything as I wanted. Eli was my project manager and he was very helpful and patient. I am more than satisfied with work provided from this company. They recently remodeled my garage and everything went smooth, they used high quality materials, finished on time and within my budget. I highly recommend American Home Improvement for any type of home remodeling!

I had a complete renovation of my guest bathroom and partial renovation of my kitchen. I am thoroughly satisfied with the results and grateful to my contractor, Sam Shecter, for making the process smooth and anxiety free. I can recommend American Home Improvement without hesitation.

Thank you for beautiful patio you built recently for me. The workers shoved up on time, they were very nice, professional, worked quick and hard every day. They finished on time and the price OK, no added some extra costs, they were honest about everything. Great work guys, thanks, will recommend!
American Home Improvement designed my kitchen. I already worked with them and I knew that they are very trustworthy company. They did excellent job, completed on time and I am completely satisfied.

We replaced all cabinetry, tile and fixtures for the entire bathroom including moving the tub and creating a new shower area. Their mobile showroom really helps you make decisions, even on the minor details, and Eli helped us get ideas and ensure that our design choices would work together (for example making sure that all the plumbing fixtures were compatible). We also requested some unique features (like a rock river effect in the tile/grout leading from the shower to the bathroom door) that we had an idea for that resulted in a solution they helped design. The team was professional throughout and clearly worked together well. Work was done on time and within budget. The cleaning crew they had come in at the end was world class as well.

This was the most amazing experience remodeling a kitchen that I think you could ask for!  Neev was incredible with the timeline, what to expect, when to expect it and even completed the project early!  It is a big undertaking to not have a kitchen for awhile and it was completely worth it!  The work is impeccable, I could always reach Neev and he was always willing to work with me or explain if I didn't understand what was happening next.  The best experience!

They built an outdoor kitchen at my place. It was done fast but the quality is top notch. Very well organized, pleasant and professional workers and highly recommended company. I am sure I will work with American Home Improvement again!

My experience with American Home Improvement couldn't really have been any better. They did a wonderful job on my front porch. This is my second project using them and i would not hesitate to hire them again. Highly recommend them.

I already seen work from American Home Improvement at my neighbors house, he was very satisfied and recommended me this company a lot. I needed to replace roof on my house and they gave me very reasonable price. The project went great, so simple and fast and result was excellent. Thank you, will also highly recommend this company!

I hired American Home Improvement for room addition. I liked how they were professional from our first meeting to the end of the project. The job they did was excellent, good quality, on time and fair price. Highest recommendation!
The outcome was better than I expected. They really kept eyes on every single detail. Fantastic team, very respectful and professional. Thanks for a new beautiful bathroom!

My friend recommended my American Home Improvement and when I saw how many positive reviews they have I sent a quote. I got response very soon and estimate next day. I needed a garage conversion and I heard that American Home Improvement is right company for that job. They respond quickly to my quote and gave me best possible offer and I hired them. I found this company on internet, they have many excellent recommendations so I contacted them because I needed my master bathroom remodeling. They answered quickly and very detailed. The project manager Eli and his team did great job and I am very satisfied with my remodeled master bathroom. Now I see why this company have so many great recommendations, I also highly recommend American Home Improvement!!

Excellent and trustworthy contractor. I hired American Home Improvement for my kitchen remodeling, it was very important project for me because I already remodeled my kitchen and wasn't satisfied at all with work provided from previous contractor 2 years ago. This time I was looking contractor with many excellent recommendations and I also heard for them from my friends. The project went OK, some issues were resolved instantly and with no change of price of ending time. The most important, final outcome was amazing, my new kitchen looks stunning! Thank you American Home Improvement!!

I am so happy I found this great contractor. I needed to build an addition, pretty expensive project and interviewed several contractors. American Home Improvement gave me most realistic offer and when I saw their recommendation I decided to go with them. Eli was our project manager and he handled everything so easy. He was nice and helpful, informed me about working progress all the time. The project went OK with no issues or extra costs. The outcome was perfect. Will work with American Home Improvement again, that's for sure!

It was a time for a new roof on my home and I went with American Home improvement for that job. Eli and his team did amazing job, they made it so simple and with no mistakes. The price was reasonable and my new roof looks brilliant and my complete house looks much better now. Thank you American Home Improvement!

American Home Improvement built an outdoor kitchen on my request. I am so happy I went with them because they were awesome and did outstanding job. Everything went well and I can recommend this company high enough!

American Home Improvement remodeled my 2 bathrooms. My wife had some special requests and this guys provided all she wanted. The price was fair, they did excellent job and price didn't changed at the end of the project. I can't ask for more!

Moti and his team did a really great job for me. They added an addition to my house, it was 1 big room. I got recommendation on American Home Improvement from my friend and they also have many excellent reviews so I contacted them to see what options would they offer to me. I was very satisfied with their answer and I hired them. As I said before, Moti and his team were great, made complicate project pretty simple. The quality of work was at  highest standards so they deserves highest recommendation!

I am very pleased with my master bathroom renovation recently completed by American Home Improvement.  Neev, the Senior Project Manager and Tal, the foreman, worked to keep me posted as the job progressed.  Any problems were solved to my satisfaction.  There were a few delays so the project took longer than expected but it looks great. The day to day trade workers were very respectful. professional and hard workers.  I would recommend this company to others planning a home renovation.

I’m not one to typically post a review, but after our recent experience with American Home Improvement and specifically our project manager Neev Kugel, I felt obliged to comment on their phenomenal work.  We contracted them to remodel our kitchen as well as re-do the flooring in adjacent rooms and other related improvements.  I was extremely impressed by how professional Neev and the whole operation was from start to finish.  Outside of knowing we wanted to update our kitchen, my wife and I really didn’t have a clear vision on exactly how we wanted it to look.  We essentially put our faith and trust in Neev to deliver an end product that we would love and he didn’t disappoint.  At the start of the project, Neev brought in designers who were very knowledgeable, creative and receptive to our ideas to help create a contemporary and elegant design that both my wife and I loved.  From there, Neev developed the project plan and timeline that was consistent with the original estimate.  
Throughout the entire process, Neev was very communicative and would always clearly outline next steps so we knew what to expect.  This made the process much smoother and reduced the typical frustration that can come with remodels because we always knew the status of the work.  

Now this is not to say the project was completed without any snags.  As with any project, there were surprises that came up.  However, Neev always worked with us to explain the issue, outline our options, and would work with us to make sure we were happy with the final outcome. All of the workers brought into our home showed the same level of professionalism and quality craftsmanship.  Most importantly, the final outcome of the remodel was outstanding.  Not only was everything completed on-time and on-budget, but it turned out absolutely stunning exceeding our expectations.  And as the say, the devil is in the details, and it was the details where the quality of the work came through.  It was clear that they do not cut corners.  The quality of the work was beyond reproach.  

In terms of price, we didn’t do much comparison shopping before going with AHI.  Neev impressed us when we initially brought him in so we didn’t get other bids for the project.  I can say anecdotally the price was very comparable to what some of our other friends paid for similar work.  And most importantly the price originally agreed to is was we ultimately paid, which is very important to me.  No bait and switch.   

All in all, I would highly recommend Neev and AHI if considering a home improvement project.

Excellent home remodeling company. They recently remodeled our kitchen and we really are very satisfied with the outcome. Eli was our project manager and he was very helpful. He also resolved some issued and made a project very simple although it wasn't at all. They finished the kitchen within promised time and we are very impressed with their quality of work. Thank you American Home Improvement!

American Home Improvement just completed our bathroom and patio remodel and we could not be happier. Neev Kugel was our project manager and he is an absolute gem. He made sure that we were informed every step of the way what to expect for the weekly schedule and always knew who was coming and going. His communication was excellent. He always got back to me, no matter how trivial my question or concern might have been.  As this was our first remodel, Neev helped us design, select and accent our remodel by leading us in the right direction. We absolutely love our tile and Neev provided a specific shopping list that allowed us autonomy to select our own designs, while helping us avoid unnecessary expenses. 

The crew of artisans Neev brought in to do the work were amazing. From the demolition crew to the tile guys, they were all professional and clean. They arrived on time and were courteous and helpful. They went out of their way to be sure we were happy with the results and had us view everything as it was completed to be sure we were satisfied. Anything that needed to be addressed was handled right away and to our complete satisfaction. 

As I said in the beginning, we could not be happier with the whole experience. Neev and his crew turned an old, outdated bathroom in to a serene and relaxing place to be. It turned out exactly as I wanted, as Neev understood my vision and guided us in the right direction. We would not have what we do today were it not for him.

I can only say positive things about my experience with American Home Improvement. My remodel was performed above my expectations by a very qualified and talented design and remodeling team. 

They stayed on track during the kitchen remodel and provided favorable results. My kitchen turned out exactly as my wife and I envisioned. My family loves it and spends more time in the kitchen now as a result of the beautiful design.

American Home Improvement has been phenomenal to work with. They lay out what your project will consist of at the start, so there are no surprises when the project is taking place. Their designers are skilled and experienced and also patient enough to listen to the input of the customer. 

This made me feel like I had involvement in the project that wasn’t overly stressful. Being a part of the creative process added to the experience. They ended up finalizing the kitchen remodel in just 3 weeks as we agreed on. This was an above average remodeling experience that consisted of everything I recommend others look for when doing business with a contractor. Transparency, professionalism, and timeliness.

I had many issues with my roof if recent time and I thought it was time to replace it. I already worked with American Home Improvement so I called them to send someone to inspect my roof. They agreed it was time to replace it and gave me several solutions. I accepted one of them and they were available soon. The crew came early in the morning on scheduled time, they worked hard and they were very quick because they are so well organized. The installation went OK, there were some issues but it was resolved easily. My new roof looks amazing thanks to American Home Improvement!!

American Home Improvement is definitely one of the best contractors I worked with. I hired them for a bathroom remodeling because I knew they are experts in that area. We agreed about terms of project, the price was acceptable and also promised time of finishing the project. Moti was my project manager, he really helped me a lot, he did everything to make sure I will be satisfied. The result was better than I expected, beautiful bathroom, I can't describe with words how happy I am that everything went great! Top contractor!!!

Do not trust this company.  The project started out well but quickly became a nightmare. This large company hires out contractors to get work and doesn't seem to check these contractors experience.  The guy that I learned later was a great salesman, but didn't know how to create a simple footing.  I had to correct his formwork! Then after he promised to prove himself, he failed again and the rebar was all wrong.
 I asked AHI for a new contractor.  They agreed and would keep promising to fix the same issue. 4 different people were sent out over 3 weeks and each one didn't speak to the previous one and knew nothing about the project. They all agreed that the work by the first contractor was not correct, but each crew also contradicted each other. It's like they didn't even know who came out before and I would have to explain what is going on.
 AHI would promise again and again to correct the issue and each time they failed. I have worked in the construction industry on large and small projects for over 10+ years.  I have never experienced any company with such a lack of communication and incompetence.  DO NOT HIRE AHI.

WONDERFUL KITCHEN REMODEL  AHI is an excellent company that strives to fully satisfy. American home improvement has completed several projects in our house including the remodeling of our guest bathroom, master bathroom, kitchen and living room area. American Home Improvement and our project manager, Elad, have done a gorgeous remodeling job on our open space concept kitchen remodeling. We must admit that we are not easy clients! As part of our remodeling project, we removed several load bearing walls and installed new beams within the ceiling, poured concrete footings under the house, installed new hardwood floors from the living room into the kitchen and matched the drywall on the walls and ceiling in order to achieve a perfectly flat client and everything went smoothly. During the work, we lived at the house and the workers sealed off all the spaces that were not part of the work so the dust that we were so concerned of… was kept to minimum. Elad also made sure to stick to the main budget and the promised timeline (which was very important to us). We were warned by some friends that these days it’s very hard to find a good company that will provide the same service as we got from American Home Improvement! We are looking forward to hire them for additional projects in the future!

We had several meetings with Shean from American home improvement regarding to the kitchen that we want to remodel and what is our vision and goals. If we summarized our remodeling project, we will say that Daniel is the person that you will want to manage your remodeling project!!!!! we can’t write enough about his personality and working crew. We hired Shean and his professional workers to remodel our master bathroom. I hired American home improvement to re-do my entire house that I recently purchased and planned to live in. "Exceptional, skilled, superb craftsmanship" are just the little good words that we can write here that can define our experience with American home improvement. American home improvement did several sections at my house including the remodeling of my master bathroom, 2 Additional bathrooms and paint the entire house. I hired American home improvement to finally bring the backyard of my house to life. The empty lot in the back yard was the same way I got it when I purchased the new house from the builder and all it had was just dirt. This project was pretty challenging because of the semi small space, shaped and slightly irregular. American home improvement was able to provide me with several estimates and options and all of this in order to help me get the ‘feeling’ of prices based on several levels of items and quality in hard-scape, soft-scape and lighting. This method of service allowed me to make better choices on areas to enhance or compromise in order to stay within budget. My past experiences with landscapers was not good and it made it harder for me to make a decision in hiring anyone to this project. My past experience showed me that whoever you hire, they will be either good at one thing or not that good at the other one, rarely can you find someone that will be goo in both AND mostly they never finish anything when they say they're going to. My experience with American home improvement was completely different and positive. Ben was especially knowledgeable about both hard and soft-scape and provided intuitively good recommendations. Sure thing but like any job, there will always be few problems, but Ben was fair enough and responsive, working diligently to come to a resolution we were both happy with. I was most impressed with the professionalism and hardworking ethic of the actual crew that did the work. They arrived on time every day, were polite and cleaned up after themselves each day. They take pride in their work and it shows. American home improvement did such a good job. I will hire them again for any future landscaping needs.

Based on several recommendations and help from friends about this company, I decided to go ahead and hire American home improvement to remodel my 2 bathrooms and kitchen. I highly recommend American home improvement to for any quality of home remodeling and dealing with creative, professionals and skilled people. We had a great pleasure to hire and allow American home improvement to work at our house and Mae and the workers for the recent kitchen and guest bathroom remodeling. The main points according to our experience with them were:

3. Price wise - They were a bit more expensive than the other bids we received but the effort and care they put into our project was well worth it. Sometimes you just have to go with your instinct and choosing with them was one of the best decisions we made.

We got in touch with American home improvement about doing several things at our house. Many thanks to American Home Improvement and mainly Mark and the actual people that were involved in our remodeling, for the excellent remodeling job that they did at our house. Shlomo did a wonderful job when we hired him and his people to renovate our house. We hired him to execute our designed plans that we did with another design firm. We were having Shlomo working at our house for the remodeling project that we needed to do for a while now. Each one of them took pride in his own trade which ended in a beautiful kitchen and bathrooms that we enjoy just by looking at them. We recently worked with Shlomo to paint my house inside and out. I purchased this house recently and the house needed to get a fresh look and makeover.
