A huge Thank You to Mark, Enna, the incredible office staff (Genesis and Vanessa) and to all of the skilled craftsmen at Horizon for creating a beautiful home for my family!

Horizon construction and Remodeling did a major kitchen remodel for us including removal of walls, fireplace, and reconstruct a large portion of our ceiling.  They literally transformed our kitchen!  
After checking out many others, we decided to choose Horizon Construction and Remodeling because of all the great reviews.  After meeting the staff, our project manager David Eskin and reading all the positive reviews we knew we made the right decision.  The staff is wonderful.  Very caring, respectful and honest.  Our kitchen turned out  beautiful.  We are very happy with the outcome!

Demolition was right on schedule and the crew was excellent, very fast and left the job neat at the end of the day. We did however encounter a set back which caused a long pause after demolition.  This lengthened the job quite a bit and added additional expense and inconvenience (we feel) could have been avoided with a more through inspection (pre-demo). 
All the staff at Horizon are great to work with.  David our project manager is terrific.  He is easy to work with and very helpful.  He provided suggestions that were very helpful and added to the beauty of our job.  There were times he could have lost his patience because of my indecisiveness but never once did!  He’s a true gentleman.
Caesar our cabinet maker is a master at his trade.  We love his work and are so pleased with our cabinets!
Something notable that you may not find in many other constructions companies.  With Horizon, once the project ends, they treat you with the same kindness as the day you signed the contract.  

This company shines in Customer satisfaction!

We recently had our 2500 square foot home remodeled by Horizon Construction & Remodel, which included the kitchen, master bath, flooring, lighting, paint, fireplaces, millwork, plumbing and tile.  We contacted a total of four general contractors, all of whom were within the same approximate price range, however, after meeting with Mike Roppo, we decided to sign a contract with Horizon and we’re glad we did!  Mike was our Project Manager and he did an excellent job overseeing and managing the entire project from start to finish.  He is professional, knowledgeable, personable and made sure that everything was done right!  He was quick to respond to phone calls, texts, and emails and came by to check the work often.  We are retired so we were able monitor the work as it was being completed.  At times issues would arise, but whenever we expressed a concern, Mike was prompt to resolve it, making sure that all work was done to our complete satisfaction and that no corners were cut.  All of the contractors that worked in our home were very experienced and good at what they did!  We were especially impressed with Hector who painted the entire inside of the house, and Victor who did all of the tile and marble work in the master bath, kitchen, and fireplaces.  Also Ulyses (plumbing), Hugo (flooring), Caesar (countertops), and Tomar (electrician), were all excellent at their crafts.   The process of remodeling our entire home took five months and everything turned our beautiful!  Horizon Construction & Remodel is an excellent company that stands behind their work and prides themselves in customer satisfaction!

All workmanship and workers were very professional and very nice. 

They always cleaned after their jobs. We are very happy with the way our bathroom turned out. 

Michaelangelo Roppo - our project manager was very helpful. He spend 2 days shopping with me, picking out everything was needed for the remodel. And I DO MEAN EVERYTHING. 

i really did appreciate his time snd expertise. 

The ladies in the office are very nice. 

Enna Eskin helped me match colors and styles for cabinets and counter tops in Horizon's showroom. 

I will recommend Horizon Construction and Remodeling for any of your projects

Our goal was to remodel the kitchen, guest bathroom, and flooring of our home. This is the very first time my wife and I have ever took on a major remodel project. It was important to have a contractor that was honest , responsive, and did quality work within our budget. Since my wife and I work and are extremely busy with our kids, it was also important that we have project manager that would communicate with us and closely monitor the people working on our home regarding quality. We met with Eitan, project manager for Horizon Construction  and he took the time to understand that these qualities were important to us. He was also very honest about the project and did not overpromise just to earn our business. Eitan and his company made sure we knew they wanted to do what’s best for us and immediately we felt confident Horizon was fit for the job. His crews were very professional and would answer our questions and always cleaned up when they left for the day. Of course there were some hiccups during the project such as the fridge not fitting in the space and some kitchen cabinets needing to be moved around and adjusted. In the end, the things we requested got fixed and Eitan made sure we were happy. I would recommend Horizon to those that see the value of a project manager. Overall, the quality was good for our budget and I would rate Horizon a 4.7 out of 5.

I has Horizon Construction & Remodeling out to do a bid to remodel a guest and master bathroom because of their high rating on Angie’s list.  An appointment was made and David Eskin showed up right on time.  He gave me a detailed bid right on the spot in writing.  Horizon did each bathroom separately so I could always have a usable shower.  I had already picked out most finishes before I got bids.  However, after the backsplash I had picked out was installed, I hated it.  David was great and said they would re-do it no problem with whatever alternative tile I picked.  There were some issues throughout the process that came up but I really appreciated that David and his subcontractors always came up with a solution.  The final products are beautiful.  Now I have 2 spa-like bathrooms with modern finishes that I’m thrilled to show off.

We contracted Horizon Remodeling to remodel our fireplace and paint our kitchen, family room, living room and hallway.  Eitan Beznos managed the project and was extremely conscientious making sure all work was done correctly and completed as promised.  He met with us frequently to check progress and make sure work was done to our satisfaction.  When we asked for additional electrical work, he arranged for an excellent electrician named Tomer who did a fantastic job for us,
We would recommend Horizon Remodeling.  Work was well done and finished earlier than promised.

Horizon completed a 450 square foot addition on our house that included moving an exterior wall and reworking the roof line to add a bathroom and expand three bedrooms.  This project took place from July 2019 to November 2019.  Our primary criteria for selecting a construction company was familiarity with working with our city, timeliness, and quality of work  performed.

We are very happy with the final product of this project.  The finished work provided by Horizon Construction is beautiful and works well within our high end home. The craftsmen used for the detail work were top notch, and the projects that needed to match existing finishes in the house look nearly flawless in their integration.  We did not have any problems with permitting the plans or with passing the inspections with the city so there were no hold ups time wise because of inspection issues.

When any hiccups did occur, as they occur in any remodel or home project, Horizon was very quick to correct them to the best of their ability or propose solutions that would result in the same high end product we were looking for.  The customer service provided was quite good.

David is a great project manager and was very attentive. He made sure any and all concerns were addressed promptly and that questions were answered in a very timely manner.  He was great about working with me in regards to our timeline and making the process of living through the project as painless as possible.

In short, I am quite happy that we chose Horizon Construction for our addition project and would absolutely recommend them.

I decided to do a complete bathroom remodel, and after meeting with several contractors, I decided on Horizon Construction and Remodeling Inc.. I am very happy with my overall experience. My bathrooms look absolutely beautiful. Horizon gutted both bathrooms and replaced everything with new white porcelain tile, sparkling mosaic panels and backsplash, sturdy glass doors, chrome trims, and all new fixtures. They painted both bathrooms light grey with white trims, and replaced the laminate floors with light grey toned tile. I love the results and I am glad I decided to do business with Horizon.

I also had a great experience with Horizon’s customer service. They provide excellent service. Everyone I spoke with (demolition crew, plumber, office staff, contractor, owner) was professional, competent, and courteous. Initially, I was in constant contact with contractor, David Eskin. He was punctual, knowledgeable, and professional. In the second half of the project, I was in constant contact with Enna. She was professional, knowledgeable, and very attentive to my requests. Whenever I had a question or concern, I could text her and she would respond within minutes. That was important to me and I appreciated the expediency. Based on my customer experience with Enna, I can say she cares a lot about the reputation of the company and delivering great customer satisfaction. The project is now complete, and thanks to Horizon Construction and Remodeling Inc., I have two beautiful bathrooms.

My wife and I have added a master bathroom and walk in closet, as well as adding a new linen closet and floors throughout the house with Horizon Construction. We are so happy with the outcome and how our project manager answered any questions we had along the way. We feel confident that if any issues pop up in the future that we can call and they will send someone out to correct. We have referred Horizon to our friends and will recommend them in the future as we are so happy with the outcome of our house.

I contacted Houzz to search for a contractor to remodel our two small bathrooms.  I did not know where to start.  They put me in touch with Horizon and within a couple of days I was meeting with Eitan Beznos, their bathroom specialist. What impressed me most about Eitan was his friendliness and his desire to look after my every remodeling need. He was up front with the cost and the time it would take to complete both bathrooms. He recommended the best place to shop for tile and bathroom fixtures. He even took me shopping to look for vanities and helped me choose the size and design I was looking for.  Once the work was started the project crew became extended family, coming and going as needed. I was contacted almost daily by Eitan or Genesis Millan from the office to make sure I knew what was the plan for the day.  There were inspections at each stage of the project  and we still came in under the original time frame given.  I am so pleased with the  professionalism of the everyone who was a part of the remodel, the quality of the workmanship and the beauty of both bathrooms.

We are very pleased with the way our fireplace wall looks .
Each phase of the project was done by workers who were skilled and experienced. 
They did their job quickly and always made sure the room was kept clean.
The project was unique and changes the appearance of the whole room. 
We would recommend David Eskin our project manager and Horizon Construction & Remodeling Inc to anyone thinking of Remodeling any room in their house

My wife, Kathy and I back in late July contacted three contractors to provide us an estimate to remodel our bathroom’s toilet and shower area.  Eitan Beznos provided us, what we felt was the estimate and help.  For this remodel, we were under somewhat of a time constraint to try and complete the project by 9/3.  
Eitan’s crew started demolition as promised on the day as promised.  Eitan had Ron, and George come in for the rough framing, electrical and plumbing, which was completed within the first week along with the Hot Mopping.  Ron and George and the hot mop person did an incredible job completing on schedule or even ahead of schedule.
The main impact to the remodel, was from the city inspection crew.  While we were delayed a week before we could tile the shower and the floor, Eitan and Ron had their tiling crew work the Labor Day Weekend to try and catch up, which again we were held up for city inspection. Further delaying completion.  George came in to perform the finish work, even coming in late in the day, I am sure after putting in a full day on another job.  The custom shower doors that have been installed are beautiful. 
We have had numerous construction jobs performed over the years, (pool installation, patio install, room additions, etc) and Eitan was always available either by phone or coming by to check, and everyone who worked on the remodel was friendly, professional, always cleaned up and tried to help minimalize the impact of dust, smell and noise as much as possible.
I will definitely look to Horizon for any further work.

I met with David Eskin from Horizon Construction; he was very friendly and professional.  We discussed the projected and my expectations.  Within a few days, David had the estimate ready and we met for a second time.  When we met to review the proposal, David went through everything in detail.  

A few days later, I called David and told him that I would like Horizon to be the contractor for my project.  We then agreed on a starting date.  I told David I would be out of the country during the beginning phases of the project.  He assured me that wouldn’t be a problem and would keep me posted throughout the process.  

I really enjoyed going to their showroom to pick out the materials for the project, I felt like a kid in a candy store.  David was there through that process as well and offered suggestions if asked.  

Everything went smoothly for the most part throughout the process.  Some issues came up regarding the electrical panel, this was no fault of David’s, and he was quick to resolve the issues.  David was always quick to respond to my text messages or emails to address any questions or concerns I might have had.  

For the most part, the project came out better than anticipated.  Everyone who was involved with this project was always kind, courteous and eager to assist.  

Thank you, Horizon!!!

Shane P. Branham

We were very happy with the work done by Horizon
Construction on our remodeling project. We love our 1954
suburban home, but the two bathrooms were in serious need
of updating. Horizon started work and we immediately knew
we were in good hands. The workmanship on the floor and
shower tile was superb. In our master bath we had custom tiles
installed in the shampoo shelf that made our shower really
shine. The workers in charge of painting, vanity installation
and plumbing were very friendly and professional. We felt
very comfortable having them in our house. They answered
questions and communicated their progress to us. The overall
job was done in a timely manner and we were always informed
of any delays.
David the project manager kept us updated throughout the
entire process and helped us to realize our vision of a
southwestern style guest bathroom. He took care of all the
paperwork with our city's permit process. We were given
notice of any delays and he responded to texts immediately.
On one occasion, while we were shopping for vanities at a local
warehouse, he texted with us for over half an hour to make
sure we got the right one. Halfway through the project we
decided to re-pipe our entire house and David made that
happen. His plumbing crew had the re-pipe done in two days.
We feel confident recommending Horizon for your remodeling
needs. They respected our house and it showed in their work.
We can't wait to show off our new bathrooms to friends and
family!

We wanted to remodel for a long time.  Had interviewed several contractors. We didn’t know anyone here.  When we met David from Horizon we felt safe. He understood our vision and helped us clarify it. We liked that Horizon is 1 stop destination with a showroom, this is truly helpful in this process. We chose David Eskin with Horizon Construction and Remodeling, Inc. to and it turned beautiful. We Loved All horizon workers.  We had few communication glitches but those were resolved right away. David did a great job keeping his cool and listening to all our questions and concerns and was on top of it right away ready to explain and resolve. 
My only feedback will be in this area - to try and explain the clients more so less questions will arise. 
Overall we are very satified with our new kitchen and 2 new bathrooms and recommend Horizon construction and remodeling in Fullerton CA 
to others !

I contracted Horizon to do a remodel of a portion of the house that converted an old bedroom and master/bathroom, into a modern master with a large bedroom and guest bathroom. The initial budget was doubled what was targeted due to many unexpected expenses (some due to my request, others due to lack of foresight in planning).

The workmanship was of good quality generally but there were areas where attention to detail was not taken. 

The customer service has been the best part of working with Horizon. When problems arose with plumbing down the line, the company was responsive and helped fix the issue and even help with one that was due to the fixtures. They also did not charge for small minor requests (swapping faucet on an unrelated portion of the house).

Overall, I would say that the experience is positive.

Horizon Construction recently completed a fireplace remodel in my home.  This was our first attempt at any major work here.  They were very professional and did a great job.  There were times when they had to work around my schedule and times when workers remained until evening to finish a project.  
I appreciate the prompt responses I received from Mike and the office staff when I had questions. He made good suggestions and had explanations about the process.  As in another review, the cost was significant for a one-wall redo, but I’m very happy with the result.  
There’s a small adjustment needed in the recessed lighting, but I’m confident this will be finished soon.  Overall, I think they were professional and easy to work with.

While searching for a quartz counter top to coordinate with my existing beige flooring, I discovered Horizon.  They had what I wanted and secured a backsplash with a mosaic to complete the color scheme. Mark is a hands on contractor-owner .  He oversees every step of the job and there is little down time in the process.  The workers willingly try to accommodate customer requests.  If an installation is not satisfactory, it is corrected.  Horizon does an excellent job for the price charged. 

Arlene Hoskins

After poor experiences with previous contractors, we came into our next home repair project with reservations and a long check-list of characteristics we wanted in our next contractors, including responsiveness, professionalism, expertise, and follow-through.  Horizon was one of the half dozen businesses we solicited.

If cost was the only factor, Horizon would not have been selected.  While the company provided discounts, its estimate was triple the lowest bid and thousands more than another contractor we were considering.

We met Rey and Omri, and we were impressed with the way they addressed our concerns and exuded pride in the company’s reputation for high customer service and satisfaction.

We got what we paid for:
• Jobs were completed as scheduled (or there was sufficient communication and transparency during the few times complications arose).
• Horizon was responsive, both in its communication and follow-through with requests.
• Workmanship and attention to detail was excellent.
• The company handled minor incidental items without charging us extra.
• Half a year later, we contacted the business about a warranty issue.  • The company was prompt in its response, and the problem was fixed within a few days.

It is evident Horizon values maintaining positive relations with its customers.  If price is not the sole determinant, we recommend the company and will continue to keep it at the top of our list for future remodeling projects.

I bought a house last year and worked with David to remodel the kitchen, master bathroom and guest bathroom. David was professional and had great design ideas. He designed the layouts and helped me selecting the materials for the kitchen and the bathrooms. The transformation was amazing. The open floor plan between the kitchen and the family room makes the house looks incredible expansive. The projects were finished on time and passed all the inspections. The final results were exactly as my vision of my house should be!

As is common with many construction projects, we experienced several issues and it took longer than originally planned. However, David and Mark addressed and corrected all issues, even ripping out and starting over on several items when necessary. Despite the issues and timing delays, Horizon did come in on budget, and we absolutely love the new bathrooms and bedroom floor!

Horizon construction built a bathroom for me in my detached recreational space. The room was transformed from a simple and basic recreational room into a livable and enjoyable space that is perfect for single travels or couples looking to stay in a comfy and welcoming space while visiting our lovely state of California. David and his construction team finished the job in just over a month, on budget and on time. I would recommend Horizon construction to others looking room additions or things similar to what we had done to our home.

I found Horizon Construction on the Houzz app after several attempts to connect with a few other contractors. I sent an email on a Sunday and got a response the following Monday. The great communication with Horizon continued through my entire project of a complete remodel of my kitchen, guest bathroom and walk in closet. They also installed all new windows and tile flooring. My project manager was David and he was the best, made himself available to me for all of my many questions and decisions even while he was on vacation! Working with Enna and the others at the office were perfect as well. I couldn’t be more pleased with the outcome of my remodel. 

Best Regards,
Debbie Karmelich

Thank you Horizon for all your help making our guest/additional bathroom for my mother who recently moved in with us a place she loves.  David was very kind and understanding of what we wanted and the crews that came to work were very professional.  We look forward to having additional work done in our house by Horizon so all of our rooms can be just as beautiful.

Horizon did a terrific job on a complete makeover of our master bathroom (including the shower, jacuzzi, flooring, counter-tops, sinks, and cabinetry) and the replacement of all kitchen cabinetry, drawers, and sink.  This was a big project for us -- so it was important to select a contractor who was reliable, had all the right skill sets, and was committed to quality.  Horizon delivered on all fronts with flying colors!

We found Horizon through Angie’s List.  After reading comments on Angie’s List and on many other web sites such as BBB and Yelp, we decided to get estimates from Horizon and three other service providers.   After our initial interview with each prospective provider, we concluded that Horizon provided the most comprehensive services at pricing that was very competitive.    

Our project involved a variety of skillsets including woodworking, plumbing, electrical, tile installation, fabrication and cutting of counter-top surfaces, and finishing and painting.  Rather than hiring a jack-of-all trades, Horizon delivered highly skilled craftsmen in each field who completely embraced Horizon’s expectations for quality.

Our Horizon project manager David was instrumental to the success of our project.  David did a great job coordinating and supervising the work of each of the craftsmen.  David was very responsive and easy to reach when questions arose.  David was on site regularly to inspect progress and assure that the craftsmen met Horizon’s high expectations for quality.  On occasions when David noted items requiring special attention, the craftsmen were eager to respond.  David was also very responsive and attentive to all observations we shared as the project progressed.  It was clear that the craftsmen all shared Horizon’s deep commitment to quality.  The craftsmen were also very courteous and productive throughout the duration of our project.  

We are very pleased with the end-product and the process Horizon followed from start to finish (including design suggestions and assistance with surface material selections).  Thank you very much to all of the Horizon project team (including the back-office team) for a job well done! 

We wholeheartedly recommend using Horizon and will most certainly use Horizon for any projects we undertake in the future.

(Originally written about 3.5 months after job completion).  I must admit that we were highly cautious with our next bathroom remodel hire. Reason being was a previous contractor abandoned our master bathroom remodel after attempts to have them address valid concerns. That other contractor's license was eventually suspended after multiple consumer complaints were filed. Thankfully, working with Horizon Construction and Remodeling Inc on addressing a previous contractor's mess ups and then completing a redo of another bathroom in our home was a much better experience. The new remodel job that was Horizon's from start to finish was completed in a timely manner. With our older house, there were issues uncovered after the demo process that were not too much of a surprise. The issue extended our timeline and did add somewhat minor costs to the job. When questions or concerns were raised, Mike Roppo, our project leader, was responsive to address issues and provide explanations before the job moved forward. I must state that some of the worksite conditions at the end of a couple jobs were not ideal. For example, white residue was left on our hedges and some of our walkway from workers mixing materials - possibly grout. Also, workers left cigarette butts in our newly installed small rocks landscaping that couldn't just get swept out easily. Workers did clean up nicely for all interior jobs. Finally, after completion of both bathrooms, two more events occurred. First, Horizon came out and made repairs that surfaced, like settling cracks in the grout for example. This was part of their contract, but it was done in a timely fashion. Second, Horizon was helpful with our complaint to the contractor license board by providing a statement of the condition of the bathroom remodel that was abandoned. Overall, we would include Horizon on our list of contractors to work with again.

Sounds corny but it is true – When you deal with Horizon Construction & remodeling, you are treated like family. 
It’s my last major project and I have been putting it off for many years. Life happened and it is never the right time to remodel. But, we are glad we finally did it!
 They are very patient people and never made me feel indecisive despite the fact that I am. I doubt there are many firms in the entire country that are genial and comfortable and just plain nice. Also, they explain everything in as much or as little detail as you want and all those details are laid out in an organized and thorough fashion. Everyone there is super professional. They are a treasure.
Love my new house !
Thank you Horizon Construction and remodeling

We were impressed with everyone we interacted with at Horizon, especially our contact person named Mike.  They finished the project before estimated time and there were no extra charges for anything!  We would recommend this company to our family and friends.

Frequently a home renovation is not for the faint-of-heart. There are countless general contractors to choose from, some first-rate and some unscrupulous, and which one to hire is often the biggest unknown factor in a successful execution of transforming an idea into fruition. In my case I could not be happier. Mark Besnos, his wife Enna and all the team at Horizon were absolutely the best. Having done many a previous renovation on properties over the years, I can truthfully say that Mark's diligence and demand for perfection overseeing my project is something I've seldom witnessed before. He is more than a simple "hammer and nails" contractor: Mark is a symbiosis of one part architectural engineer with the aesthetic eye of an interior designer. With his immense help we were able to harmoniously blend the various colors of granite, travertine tile, cabinetry and backsplash, updating a tired mid-century ranch home kitchen into a Tuscan showplace.

Horizon Construction & Remodeling in 2018 lied about getting City inspections done, damaged my home and covered up the damage, and left dangerous conditions throughout my home, leaving myself and my family at risk. For example, just some of the things Inspectors found: sharp roof shingles unattached on my roof which could have fallen and cut us; they left exposed electrical wiring in the attic = potential fire danger; extremely hot pipes not insulated, which could have burnt us, and more. The City is making me remove construction Horizon did because they lied about getting approval. DO NOT HIRE THEM. They are a dangerous company. They also gave a portion of the remodel to another general contractor (not as a subcontractor) without my approval.  Horizon Construction (Mark Besnos) did not supervise this other contractor, who’s license has been suspended and is being prosecuted by the California Attorney General’s Office. All of this can be confirmed.  This was a big project and Horizon Construction & Remodeling took my money and have left my entire family devastated by the amount of damage they did to our home.

We just completed our remodel of two bathrooms with Horizon Construction. We are very happy with the final product. The work was completed on a timely basis with great communication regarding scheduling, problem solving and attention to any issues that came up. We did have a few issues that needed some attention, but they were completed to our satisfaction. I was very nervous when we first started the project because I am very detail oriented and was afraid the work  might not meet our expectations- but it most certainly does. 

David was our project manager and always responded back to any issues that came up on a very timely basis- always available via phone or email, even on weekends. The office staff was equally responsive, and that made this project so much easier to deal with. 

We did have a little delay due to the rainy weather over the last couple of months, but other than that, someone was here working pretty much every day since our project started the first week of January . 

 Very happy with our choice of Horizon and highly recommend them for your remodeling needs.

We chose Horizon Construction & Remodeling for our project.    They are a family owned business that provides outstanding customer service.  Our project was a kitchen and living room remodel.  Our home was built in the early 50’s with the center piece of the home being an indoor bar-b-que taking up most of one wall of a very small kitchen and a massive fireplace in the living room.  After weeks of delays and concerns from the city, an engineer and architect from Horizon were brought in to help finalize plans.  The final decision was to remove the massive brick structure.  The kitchen and living room were gutted, fireplace and bar-be-que demolished and a new wall was constructed.   We especially liked that everything we needed was on display at their showroom and the staff was extremely patient and helpful as we make our choices.  Throughout the remodel our project manager, David, and the office staff kept us informed as to what was happening and who was coming to work the next day.  Each day the crew working cleaned up and did not leave a mess.  David, Enna, Genesis and the office staff were always very professional and constantly checking as to how we were doing since we stayed in the home throughout the remodel.  We are extremely pleased with the job done for us by Horizon Construction &Remodeling and we highly recommend them.
Rick and Sandy Lewis

The team at Horizon Construction & Remodeling has given us the master suite of our dreams! My wife and I love our mid-century house, but the master bathroom left a lot to be desired. Our project manager, Mike, helped us maximize the space by borrowing from a largely unused kitchenette area and was able to include every single one of the custom cabinets, appliances, and fixtures we set our hearts on. Now we have a luxurious, spacious bathroom and a lovely bar area with plenty of storage that will be excellent for entertaining guests. Although there are always some complications in a remodel this large, the whole process went very smoothly and Horizon took care of us at every step - we were always left feeling our home was in the best hands. Thank you so much for helping us fall in love with our house all over again!

From the very first phone call I made to Horizon I felt valued as a client. The office staff was always kind and helpful. Our project manager, David, was easy to work with and was always responsive to any questions or concerns. He stopped by frequently to check the progress throughout the project and kept us informed of the next phase and work scheduling. All the tradesmen involved were professional, respectful of our home, great to talk with and did an excellent job. Any remodeling project can be stressful, but I believe that the service we received from Horizon made the process as smooth as possible.  We love our beautiful new kitchen and bathroom. I would highly recommend Horizon Construction and Remodeling for any home project and would certainly use them again.

Mark Besnos and his crew at Horizon Construction and Remodeling did an awesome job on all of my remodel projects in my home. I especially like that if there is something that you don’t quite like they will fix it for you right away. I recommend them because I love how everything turned out and I will use them again for my next project!

Horizon Construction did an awesome job on our Kitchen Remodel.  We put off remodeling for so many years but upon reading all the good reviews on this company we finally decided it was time.  The outcome was exactly how I envisioned it.  David, our project manager, as well as everyone in the office were always available to help us with any little (or big) question or concern.  We were always told what to expect at each stage and all the contractors were very professional and always kept the work area clean each evening.  All deadlines where met as scheduled and no "surprise" costs were incurred.   Thank You Horizon Construction and Remodeling

I interviewed multiple contractors to complete a full bathroom remodel for 3 bathrooms.  I ultimately chose Horizon because I knew they would be the right fit for the project I was undertaking.  They are a small family owned business that has the customer’s satisfaction in the forefront of their minds.   We agreed that we would complete the project in two phases.  We completed a hall and master bathroom remodel first with the third bathroom to take place after the first of the year.  
Both Horizon and their subcontractors are available to answer questions and assist with any decision making you may need or ideas to make your project have an outcome that you are 100% satisfied with.  The workmanship, timeliness and cleanliness of each subcontractor was impeccable.  I would highly recommend Horizon for your next remodel.

I started this bathroom remodel with a different contractor - but it didn’t go well. So I hired Horizon Construction & Remodeling and my bathroom is absolutely stunning. I will recommend them to friends and family. David my project manager was great, he always assured me that all will be taken care for me and I actually could sleep good at night. And I did ! I’m very happy ! 
Any questions that come out were addressed in a very timely manner. 
Which made me feel very comfortable. 
Now the project is complete it looks absolutely wonderful beyond my expectations 
My family and I really love it!

I interviewed three contractors and chose Mark Besnos and Horizon for an extensive interior remodel of my home – master bedroom and bath, guest bathroom, kitchen.  The project included removing a soffit ceiling in about half the house, installing a new support beam to eliminate a post, wainscoting in the living and dining room, hardwood flooring in the renovated areas (except the bathrooms), two new windows, and a new fireplace mantel.  Mark wasn’t the least expensive but based on his experience and our discussion I felt he would be “hands on” and would provide guidance during the course of the project.  Mark has excellent taste.  He was patient and worked with me and my cousin (who was consulting with me) very well.  He was earnest in trying to accommodate his visits to my work schedule.  A project of this magnitude is bound to encounter some challenges, and Mark was good at explaining them and presenting options, while giving me time to reflect.  The various trades who worked on my home were top notch, and when there were some issues Mark immediately took steps to correct, fix, re-do, what needed to be done. An example is the flooring.  There was a haze on the floor and Mark contacted the manufacturer and called in and paid (at his expense) a professional to inspect the floor and make recommendations.  Mark and his team were always on top of things, communicating often via email (my preference) and also texts.  The end result has exceeded my expectations.  I am thrilled with my new, open concept, home.  The kitchen is amazing, the fireplace is a focal point, and I absolutely love my master bathroom.   We had some fun with the guest bathroom as well.  Now I need artwork!  Bottom line . . . if someone leaves me a house in his or her will and I have to remodel it, I’m calling Mark and Horizon.

We love Horizon. We wanted to do an exterior remodel and contacted them. They were there every step of the way and always available when we had questions. They were on time and kept to their schedule. They constantly kept us updated on the project. Mark is great...he listened to what we were thinking and helped make it reality.  We really liked that Mark let’s you know if there are any problems and helps come up with solutions. They take care of their customers!  Enna was also amazing and was always available to answer questions. We will use them again for our next project!
Horizon did a wonderful job with our kitchen. They were clear communicators all along the way and went the extra mile to accommodate our requests. We love our new kitchen!

My wife and I made the decision to completely remodel our 55 year old kitchen which included removing a couple of walls to open it up to the dining room and living room. After deeply vetting numerous contractors and securing proposals, we selected Horizon Construction in Fullerton, CA. Mark Besnos, company owner, was by far the most detail oriented and considerate home improvement contractor we’ve ever worked with. Throughout all phases of the project, Horizon provided extraordinary workmanship in a very timely manner. Of course with any major project there are a few challenges. Horizon Construction remedied every issue with effective contingency plans for any problem they encountered.  Here is an excellent example of superior service: We selected and ordered quartz counter tops from MSI of Orange, CA.  When the quartz counter tops arrived and were installed, they had a number of finishing defects which Horizon tried to repair. Unfortunately, the defects were irreparable and MSI would not stand behind their product and workmanship. Mark and Horizon Construction however alleviated our aggravation by selflessly offering us a partial financial reimbursement even though the counter top finishing was not Horizon’s responsibility. 
From beginning to completion, Horizon Construction exhibited professionalism, pride of workmanship and a commitment to excellence. If you are seeking the finest company to successfully bring your remodeling dreams to reality, Horizon Construction is unquestionably the one!

We were referred to Horizon Construction from a neighbor that had recently hired them for a bathroom & kitchen remodel.  Although Horizon’s was quote was higher than previous quotes, we went with them based on the quality of workmanship we saw in my neighbor’s home plus their great online reviews. 
The first couple of weeks went well. We were told the job would take 4-5 weeks to complete. The first round of workers and inspector were on schedule. Around week three things slowed down.  The tile guy only worked between 3-5 hours a day. We ran into a couple problems with paint that resulted in “do-overs”.  Some of the mistakes made by the painters were somewhat novice. However our project manager was quick to respond and correct the issues. The job was completed at the end of week five.
At the end, our experience with Horizon Construction was a great one. The office staff and project manager were pleasant and attentive to our concerns.  We are happy with the work done in our bathroom and would consider using them again in the future.  I highly recommend Horizon Construction to anyone looking to do a remodel/construction in their home.

It went great! Enna ,David and the entire Horizon Group were a pleasure to work with. Expectations clearly communicated and met. Trades arrived when scheduled, on time and prepared. The few problems that came up were quickly resolved to our satisfaction. We are planning further work next year and will use Horizon Construction and Remodel again. We have full confidence that we will be treated as fairly and professionally as we were on this project

We contracted with Horizon Construction and Remodeling to remodel all three of our bathrooms.  Mark, Enna and the administrative staff were fully involved throughout the project providing updates, schedule reminders and addressing all of our concerns along the way.  While we were upgrading the two upstairs bathrooms, we had a family of 5 sharing a downstairs shower.  Mark was good about keeping the project moving forward and getting us use of the upstairs bathrooms as soon as possible.  During the demo work, we uncovered bathtub rust.  Mark covered the options and was able to work in the schedule a replacement with a project quick change order.  We also decided midflight of the remodel that the existing cabinets were not going to work.  Mark once again was able to provide options for us to address within our timeframe and budget.  As during any remodel big or small, issues and challenges will arise.  Mark and the whole Horizon team went out of their way to make sure my wife and I were extremely pleased with the process and end results.  We very much appreciated the communication, periodic onsite morning meetings and the breakdown of payments spread throughout the 4 month project that allowed us a little more control of the finances.  Overall, we appreciated the honesty, upfront discussions, and their dedication to details to make our bathrooms beautiful.  We would not hesitate to contract with them again.  Thank you Mark, Enna and the whole Horizon Construction and Remodel team.

I have been wanting to remodel my kitchen for several years and the opportunity finally presented itself.
Horizon was recommended to me by my neighbor so I decided to include them in the process of choosing a contractor.
All of the contractors provided about the same cost to do the remodel but my final decision went to Horizon. 
I choose Horizon to do the job because first impressions do matter and Horizon impressed me with their professional manner and responsiveness. 
When the job started I was again pleased with the scheduling and notifications I received from Enna and Genesis. Like most people, I am a busy person and I like to be informed and prepared. Being kept in the loop about the activity at my home was very helpful and appreciated.




During the remodel process my home and garage were cleaned up and neat when I arrived home, always a welcome sight! The kitchen was completed before the scheduled end date which was a great surprise. But most of all the kitchen is gorgeous! The workmanship is beautiful and the I couldn't be happier with the result! I would definitely recommend Horizon to anyone wanting or needing to start a construction project!

We want to thank Horizon Construction & Remodeling, Inc. 
Especially Enna & David for our BEAUTIFUL  makeover kitchen.
They were really helpful in helping us select our cabinets, counter tops and backsplash and the color combination for our kitchen.
David was great! 
He was here and checked each phase of the work and made sure all work was done satisfactory.
the workers were great in their preparation and cleaning up before leaving.
Thank you again Horizon, we are very pleased with the work done!

You can feel comfortable hiring Horizon Construction and Remodeling for your next house project!  I had to do lots of repair and maintenance on my Queen Anne Victorian home and Project Manager Mike and the folks at Horizon came through with flying colors.   I replaced the roof, cleaned and re-insulated the attic, added new floors upstairs, upgraded some electrical, repaired plater ceilings and painted the exterior with a three color "Painted Lady" look for the house.  All the sub-contractors were polite, fine craftsmen and always on time. Mike was great communicating  with me at all times.  This situation has not always been true for contractors I've interviewed to work on my house.  Usually, they come to the house, say they will give me an estimate, and never call back.  Horizon and their team did  high quality work on a difficult older home.

Horizon Construction and Remodeling recently remodeled my kitchen and I highly recommend their work.  They completed my project on time and on budget.

Our project manager, Mike, was a positive force from beginning to end.  Anytime I texted him he answered back right away, every time.  He was always on top of things and very sensitive to any concerns I might have.

The staff at Horizon was also great.  They kept me informed every step along the way as to what was going to be done next.  Each day after work was completed the workers left the area extremely clean.  They never left a mess at any time which I appreciated.

It was a remarkably stress free remodel and the results were exactly as I had envisioned.  I will definitely use them again for any project in the future.

I chose Horizon to do a complete kitchen remodel, add an additional 100 square feet and create a 9’ pass through between the kitchen and family room.  This entailed major construction – engineering, demo, footings, support beams, framing, insulation, electrical, plumbing, paint, floor tile, cabinets, countertops, and installing appliances.  
 
Mark Besnos, the owner, was the project manager and Enna and Genesis (back office) provided education and guidance throughout the entire project.  The approximate timeline given was three months; it was finished in two months.  Mark worked with me in building the kitchen in stages to ensure I was able to stay within my budget. 
 
Mark made suggestions along the way (which I appreciated) – I agreed with some and others I didn’t.  For instance, during construction, he prompted me to think about raising the ceiling – I’m very thankful I agreed with his recommendation – it worked out well.  There was never any pressure to do anything I didn’t want to do. 
 
Communication is always the key to success.  I was always aware of the next steps.  Whenever I had questions, Mark or Enna promptly answered.  They even answered questions and concerns while they were on vacation – they are dedicated to their profession. There were some small concerns or issues along the way – they were addressed and resolved in a timely manner which was greatly appreciated.
 
This has been an educational and rewarding experience.  A lot has to do with the relationship established with the client.  The Besnos family (Mark and Enna), from the beginning, have been friendly, patient, honest and trustworthy.
 
I now have a beautiful dream kitchen to enjoy with family.  Thank you Mark and Enna.
The Horizon team did an OUTSTANDING job at my home. We had a bathroom remodel which they basically completely redesigned and it looks absolutely amazing!!! So happy with the outcome and service!

We searched on all popular web sites to look for a recommended contractor.  Horizon beat out other companies and we met with Mark, the owner.  I explained to Mark what we were wanting and looking for.  Horizon was very timely and on task.  They always kept me in the loop of what I needed to do and what they were going to work on.  When I changed some of the design or wanted tile to be redone, Mark came right over and addressed the issues.  I liked how all of the workers cleaned up after themselves as well. All of Horizen’s employee’s were professional and friendly. Our kitchen looks great and functions so much better.  Our kids want to cook too.  Thank you Horizon.

Our dream to remodel our kitchen began a couple of years ago.   We interviewed contractors but none worked out or followed up with us.   We began to again search in the summer of 2017 and met with Mark of Horizon Construction as well as with other contractors.  We were especially impressed when we visited the Horizon  office to see cabinets and other materials.  Also, we were very impressed by Ena and the staff.   Mark had great ideas and helped us design a new kitchen for us. Work began in mid November (due to our schedule)  and progressed well with workers showing up on time almost every day.  Work included demolition, replacing all cabinets with granite tops and tile backsplash, creating an island with a sink which involved moving plumbing, widening of the doorway between the kitchen and dinning room, enclosure of a preexisting sliding door,  new floors in the hallways, kitchen and dining rooms and creating a new gas line and venting exhaust for the new range and other electrical upgrades.   The work progressed smoothly despite a few bumps in the road.  Mark made certain all work was done to his high expectations.   Ena and the office staff were always available to answer our questions.  Inspections went smooth and quickly.   The job was completed on schedule and to our satisfaction.   We highly recommend Horizon Construction and will not hesitate to call on them again for future projects.

The complete remodel of one of our bathrooms was just completed by Horizon Construction last week. The bathroom is gorgeous. I could not be happier. The project manager, David, was constantly on top of the scheduling and progression of the work. He visited almost every day to make sure everything was going to plan and always asked if we had any questions or problems. Any issues that came up were immediately addressed. Compared to many contractors I have dealt with, the communication was wonderful.  The quality of the work was top notch and the various tradespeople (plumbers, electricians, painters, tile-setters, etc.) were all very pleasant and helpful. They were always on time per the schedule or if there was a delay, we received a timely e-mail and re-schedule time. The job was completed on time per the original promise date. The clean up at the end of the job was professionally done. I would highly recommend Horizon Construction for any remodeling job.

Horizon construction and remodeling Inc. did our whole home meaning total kitchen remodeling (cabinets tile counters lighting), upstairs bathroom (tile flooring and vanity), all trim molding crown molding, wall repair, texture coat, painting everywhere, stairway new banister, carpet, vinyl plank flooring, back/ front doors, all electrical with new lights/ ceiling fans and interior doors. What a Beautiful job!! We couldn't be happier!! Kitchen looks like a model in a show room. The whole house is such a transformation that we feel like we're on vacation!! Mark and his workers were on time and so courteous. Horizon show room makes it so easy to pick out your products and it's not confusing. We would with no hesitation recommend Horizon  for All your remodeling needs inside and outside of your home. Thank You to All the Horizon work team!! 

Sent from my iPhon

Great service and professional workers! The company contractor and team were prompted on time, answered all the questions I had and performed the remodeling project in proficiency! Definitely recommended!

We met Horizon Construction & Remodeling Representative after meeting 2 other contractors and we must say we liked Horizon a lot.
The project manager was very knowledgeable and personable
He listen to us and made good suggestions and was always available for us
we honestly couldn't do this project without him!
It took longer than we planned because the remodel was done around the holiday season but it was worth it! The END product is beautiful 
We receive many compliments from family & friends
We appreciate the hard work - all workers were very dedicated and talented
We will spread the GOOD WORD ABOUT HORIZON!!!

We love the new bathroom! The old bathroom was cramped, damp and colored pink (the house was build in 1957). The only venting was the window. My father requires a full time caregiver and there was barely enough room in the bathroom for one grown man let alone two. Mark came up with an excellent floor plan and matched his ideas with our hopes and wishes. The bathroom was completely gutted. The plumbing for the shower (with shower head and hand shower) was added and the plumbing for the toilet and the vanity sink was moved. Three areas of lighting were added--over the vanity, over the toilet, and in the shower. A combination venting fan/light was installed. An additional electrical outlet was installed. The bathroom window was replaced. Floor to ceiling tile was installed for the shower as was a channel drain (the shower is 8 feet wide). The project was finished not only on time but 12 days early. The entry into the bathroom and the new shower can now accommodate a person in a wheelchair. Not only is it functional, it's beautiful in its modern palette of neutral grays, tans and creams. All work was professionally done and supervised by Mark. After the project was completed, Mark and Enna called to follow up. When there was an issue with the shower not draining, I made one call and Mark's workers were out the next morning to fix it. This was my first remodel project and on a whole it much better than I had hoped it could be. We are very satisfied and will be hiring Horizon for future projects.

We chose Horizon to refresh the exterior of our home based upon the good ratings in Angie’s List and Houzz.  They were very prompt in setting a time to meet with us.  Leo listened very well to what we wanted to have done and then he walked us through how they would go about getting the job done.  He detailed for us the many steps they would go through to prepare for the work that would need to be done for removing old facade, adding new stucco, painting, adding stone veneer and replacing patio fence.  He explained some of the extra steps they do that others skip, which are important for a long-lasting result.  Leo laid out for us the expected start time and timeline for completion.  Based upon some other estimates that I had received, Horizon’s cost estimate was very reasonable.  Their back-office staff was also very helpful to us in selecting the materials to be used on the job and working with us on scheduling.  Once the job got started, it progressed according to plan, and all city inspections were completed timely without need for any change to the work they had done.  The job was completed to our satisfaction, on time and on budget; they even did a few extra add-ons without charging us anything extra.  Job well done, thank-you!

Thank you!

Horizon did a great job with my room addition with bathroom and patio.  Now I have a great guest room for when my friends and family come to visit. 

I now start my day on my new patio enjoying my coffee in the shade.  Mike the project manager was wonderful to work with   He was helpful in helping me designing both the interior and exterior layout.  He had a lot of great suggestions and was very knowledgeable.

I will not hesitate to call upon them for any additional work in the future.

Mark and Enna were fantastic!  Mark has an excellent understanding of construction and the realities of renovating a home.  His recommendations reflect his extensive experience and his artistic flare.  We found that by listening to him, his ideas proved to be a better fit than our original ideas.  We are so very glad that we took his advice, especially regarding our kitchen remodel.  Horizon has an entire showroom of materials and other construction examples at their Fullerton location.  This made the selection of materials extremely convenient.  We also found that their material options were of very good quality.  We love the back-splash that we picked out in our kitchen!

When we first met Mark, he was 5 minutes early to our appointment.  Everyone we dealt with after the initial meeting was either early or exactly on time.  We never had to wait for anyone.  When a repair was needed or a concern arose, Enna resolved the matter very quickly, sometimes within the hour.  They were very up front about what was being done and they stayed on budget.  We moved out of our house for 2 months and they had us back in exactly on schedule.  No surprises.  Our home was very outdated and needed some serious attention and that is exactly what we got.  We would hire Horizon Construction and Remodeling again without question.

In October 2018 I met with Mike, Project Manager, from Horizon Construction to do a basic kitchen & wet bar remodel.  He was very easy to work with and explained the process very clearly. Horizon replaced all my cabinets, installed new granite counter tops, backsplash, sinks and faucets, and painted the room. This was to be completed in 4 weeks, but ended up taking a little over 5 weeks as there were issues with some cabinets, backsplash, and minor electrical problems. Every concern or even complaint I voiced was immediately addressed and corrected. They all are focused on providing excellent customer service and making sure their clients are satisfied. Enna, owner, contacted me recently to ask if there was anything else I needed, and this was a month after completion. Cost of the project was within the budget I had allowed and felt their costs are reasonable and competitive. Even with the extra week to complete the project, the result, is a beautiful new kitchen, island and wet bar. I may be remodeling another room and would hire Horizon Construction again as their concern for customer satisfaction stands out…

Work was done in a timely fashion, and the quality was excellent. Each stage of the project was 
managed well, all workers were punctual and did a good job of cleaning up after work was done. Work 
was completed ahead of schedule and we were very happy with the final results.

Project: Re-pipe whole house and install tankless water heater; replace ducts and install new AC/Furnace unit; remodel two bathrooms.

After speaking to three general construction companies, we decided to hire Horizon Construction for our projects. Their prices were reasonable as compared to the other companies, and we appreciated the detailed written scope of the project that they provided to us. Mark, Enna, and their office staff were very pleasant to work with; they also have a very nice showroom.

Overall, we are happy with how our projects turned out. Enna is great with communications. She always replied to our messages promptly to address our issues and concerns. We did have various issues with the workmanship and cleanliness of some of the trades that came to do the work, which made us felt that the project manager was not always attentive to what was being done at our house. We had to clean up a lot of the messes that were left every night when came home. Horizon could definitely benefit as a company, if they improve their ability to oversee a project more closely to ensure that things are being done properly by their sub-contractors. But, in general, Mark and Enna do care about the satisfaction of their customers. They are committed to making things right. They always made sure that we were happy with the end result. We never felt like Enna or Mark would just ignore us or our concerns. For this reason alone, we would recommend their company to others.

We loved the fact Horizon had a nice showroom where we could find everything we liked. It made all decision process much easier for us. 
Mark Besnos did excellent job, he planned everything very well. The communication was great and easy. Enna Eskin was helpful at office and over emails. We love our new kitchen it is just like we imagined even better ! This is now a perfect summer house for our big family 
Thank you Horizon !

Well, I wish I had something fun and exciting like a room addition or kitchen remodel to talk about, but our project was just a boring, complicated, extensive repair/renovation. For more than a decade, every time we had a major storm, we got flooding in our family room, and every time we thought we had fixed the problem, when the next storm came, the water re-appeared. We talked to several contractors, and they all had pretty much the same opinion. Since we couldn’t figure our the source or sources of the leaking, the only way to fix it for sure would be to completely remove and replace the stucco and paper from the rear of the house, and replace all the windows. This would also involve detaching and disassembling a large, wood patio cover, and then putting it back together. One contractor didn’t even want to take the job.

We chose Horizon due to a high recommendation from my brother who had used them for a kitchen re-model. The estimate and bid process was quick and smooth, and communication and scheduling with Enna and the office was great throughout. Mark was quick to address the problems, which were many, due to the fact that, as it turned out, our leaks were coming from more than one source.

The quality of the work, for the most part was excellent. In fact, the building inspector commented that the workmanship of the wrapping job was the best he had ever seen. My only complaint is that the work of the window installers was less than stellar, but all-in-all,  the final outcome was good. The color and texture of the stucco also perfectly matches the rest of the house.

We did a water test, and all looks good. We won’t know for sure until the next big storm, but I’m confident that we’ll have a dry family room. so confident, In fact, that we just installed new carpet.

Mark and team just finished giving our old house a face lift. Outstanding job! Mark gave us some great advice on how make the house look its best. His input/opinions matched our taste. Mark's attention to details and the quality of the work ensured the outcome was to our satisfaction. We would definitely recommend them and use them again on our next project. (New garage doors are on order...)

After talking to several contractors, we reached out to Horizon Construction for a bid. Mark came out to our house to discuss our project. After talking a while, Mark gave suggestions for changes to the blue prints. It took 7 months with our previous contractor/architect to get the changes made, but they were unquestionably worth the wait. Once we had approval from the city Mark worked us into their busy schedule right away. Mark and his crew worked every day to get our project finished in the timeline they gave us. 
Like most projects there were setbacks, budget changes, and other bumps in the road. However, Mark and his team worked really hard. They did a great job scheduling inspections to keep the job moving. All of the budget changes were because of things we wanted or added not because of his incorrect bid. When issues arose, his office staff was great at contacting us, communicating via phone and email, and answered questions quickly. 
Mark and Enna were a joy to work with, they were punctual, professional, offered good ideas, and allowed us to do some of the work ourselves. Mark is very particular in the way he expects the work to look, he treats his projects likes it is his own place. Mark and Enna always worked diligently to be sure we were happy with the products and services they provided. Despite skepticism from friends and neighbors, Mark was done a few days early. 
We would definitely recommend Horizon Construction to any of our family and friends.

The owner is stuck up and rude. Says he's the owner and is taking his time to come give us an estimate. Says he doesn't do small things and looked like he didn't want to be at our house wasting his precious time. The way he talked and acted throughout the process made me feel like our job was too small for him and we were wasting his time. When I called to book my appointment for a consultation, I was very specific twice about what I needed to be done and asked if our job was too small and the person who setup my appointment said their smallest job was $10k. So he should have already know the job details prior to coming. But when the owner showed up and realized we were small to him he didn't seemed like he wanted to waste his time on us. He quoted me $47k for doing my yard which I had bids from other contractors and the highest bid was $15k. I told him that and he replied that he will hire and attorney and open escrow with $10k and said if I can find someone to do the job for $15k he will give me $10k and if not I need to give him $5k. What he said was unbelievable. I said I'm not going to waste your time anymore and he said EXACTLY and left. On their website it says, "we are your friendly contractor and want to make it a delightful experience for our customers ". Well, our experience wasn't really delightful and the owner wasn't really friendly! Maybe if I had a million dollar home for him to remodel and the job was hundred of thousands he would've acted and talked differently because he did mention he was working on a $200k pool in Palos Verdes for a $15million home. It's fine if you don't work on small jobs but tell your customers ahead of time instead of coming into their home with no common courtesy.

Thank you for your reply. We did hire someone to do the job. But it’s not the price I’m talking about that is wrong with your company. I’m talking about your owner’s attitude when he came to my house. I think he should at least apologize for that instead of trying to write a response to this review to prove that there was nothing wrong with his attitude and the way he talked to a potential customer. I don’t appreciate it someone that I asked to come give me an estimate to act like the way he did. Thank you for wishing me good luck because I do feel the luckiest part was to not hire your company for the job!

"We did our research! Horizon construction company was great! The workmanship was beyond our expectations. Our kitchen turned out better then what we thought possible. If you're searching for a construction company for any remodel, give them a call, you will not be disappointed. Thanks to Mike our contractor, he listened to us and gave us great advise.  They even supported us with fixes after the warranty period, just awesome!"

We were looking around to get a kitchen and bathroom remodel. We met with several contractors but really liked Mike. He was professional, knowledgeable and we liked his design ideas and the quote. 

We ran into unexpected delays from the beginning and that set our timeline back out the gate (asbestos abatement). However, when the project got moving, it took off well. 
There were some other bumps in road that caused delays as well, most were unexpected. 

Overall, we give a four star rating.  Certain aspects of the process were great and others were lacking. 
The office staff was great and tried to be helpful and accommodating. We had been lead to believe that we would have a working toilet and work would be done around it since we only have one bathroom. We had made arrangements for the first few weeks and as we got closer to thanksgiving week and we were aware that little work would be done, it became a problem.  Enna made it work and got the flooring laid and the toilet connected before the holiday. 

The downfall of the process was either scheduling or communication or something.  When we made a change, no matter how big or small, time was added to the timeline. Although technically they finished within the timeline, there were days, on days, on days where little or nothing happened. One day someone came for all of fifteen minutes and then nothing for a week.  We had all the rooms painted and we have never known painting to take so long. The plumber was great. The electrician was great, the framer was great.  They all cleaned up well at the end of the day and the few times it wasn't quite right, Mike was on it and had it taken care of. 
 
Overall we are happy with the end result and would hire Horizon again.

Horizon Construction was such a lucky find for me! I inherited a house from my parents on Balboa Island that was built in 1933. As my parents aged there was a lot of deferred maintenance that needed to be addressed. I had several contractors come and give me estimates and “advice”, but no one took the time like Mike of Horizon Construction did to really find out what I wanted to do and give me realistic quotes.. He was able to preserve the charm and character that the house had, while making it safe and clean with modern amenities. It was a long (8 months+) project, but in that time the quality and care was always there, and my wishes were foremost.  I am happy to give the folks at Horizon Construction “Two Thumbs Up” and would urge anyone wanting a remodel to contact them.

Sincerely,
Suzanne S.
We are happy with the final results of our remodeled kitchen.  Eitan, our Project Manager was the best to work with.  Thank you very much.

Project: Kitchen update: Replaced tile countertops with granite; added backsplash; lowered the bar to counter height and expanded the peninsula.  Installed new sink, induction cook top and downdraft. 

Comments: After talking with other contractors, we chose Horizon Construction who did a nice job with our kitchen update. The workers and project manager were timely, knowledgeable, skilled and neat.  The granite looks awesome and the details around the windows were perfect. The range and the downdraft fit together just right. 

They were fast and completed our project ahead of schedule, a nice plus. It was important to them that we were totally satisfied and when an issue arose, they always had a solution.  We would use them for future remodeling projects.

Nearly 2 years ago Horizon came out and did a major remodel of our downstairs: kitchen, living room, baseboards & flooring, fireplace, etc. It came out beautifully and we were very happy with the results. Recently we were contacted by Horizon again, checking to see how we felt about the remodel at this point. Well, we had a few concerns (cracked cabinet door, uneven drawers, and a crack in the wall where the pantry was installed), which I shared with Enna and within 2 days she had someone out at our home repairing everything, replacing doors, etc. for NO CHARGE! I am impressed by the customer service of this company; its willingness to take care of us so long out from the job was never expected, but definitely appreciated!

Horizon Construction did a complete  master bath  remodel for me . They did a great job and stayed on schedule . Their attention to detail and finish work was perfect . When  there was a minor  problem Horizon handled it without question . I would highly recommend  and will use them for my next 
remodel needs   
David Sunde

Horizon Construction & Remodeling and Eitan the project manager were awesome!
I had several projects done: foundation support, stucco, fascia boards, interior and exterior paint and electrical work. 
All were done professionally and perfectly. 
When unexpected issues arose, they were handled quickly & past expectation !
I would definitely use them again

Enna, Mark and team did a great job with our full kitchen remodel. We knocked down two walls, did a large support beam and gutted the complete kitchen. Mark suggested we move the sink and re-profile the window, which turned out to be an excellent suggestion. We're very happy with the kitchen and can now entertain without being stuck in a very warm and small "box" separated from our guests.

Enna spent a lot of time with us near the end of the project to make sure we were satisfied and that everything was to our liking.

The bathroom is beautiful.  It was very stressful and I agonized over each decision.  Mike (project manager) and Robert (contractor) helped with decisions and obtaining materials.  Sol was a great worker.  Mike assured me that everything was fixable when I was catastrophizing.  I had to remind myself of that many times.  I'm so glad it's over!  I would recommend them.

My husband and I are so fortunate to have found Horizon Construction on the Houzz website to help us with our master bathroom remodel.  It was extremely important for us to feel that our contractor was listening, paying attention to detail, and caring about doing a great job.  We got all that in spades in working with Eitan Beznos, our lead designer/contractor, who became a trusted friend through every step of the process.  He consistenty monitored the progress and was in contact with us almost daily to ensure we were satisfied with each installation element along the way, take action to address any problems/issues, update us on what/when to expect next, and offer helpful advice on lingering decisions to be made.  He also even helped find the exact tile from a photo I had shown because he knew it would make us happy not having to settle for something else.  Our design concept for the bathroom really came to life, and it really is a showstopper.  We are amazed at how it looks now and are already planning to contract with Horizon again in a few months for our second bathroom remodel.

Our small, old bathroom was starting to have a lot of issues, so we decided a remodel was in order. We found Horizon Construction online and decided to request an estimate based on the reviews. After our first meeting with Mark, we felt comfortable with him and were impressed with professionalism and attention to detail. Their showroom office had many displays and samples that it made it easier for visual people like me and my wife to envision our design. Our bathroom project had a few twists and turns but Mark was very flexible and committed to customer satisfaction. Mark's workers were easy to work with, and the Horizon Construction staff was kind and willing to help with any questions, issues, or concerns we had. All in all, we are happy we got the bigger bathroom we wanted. I would definitely recommend Horizon Construction for home remodels.

We recently had our master bath remodeled by Horizon Construction.  This was our first experience with a remodel contractor and we didn't really know what to expect.  In our first meeting with Mark he made several suggestions that we decided to go with, such as putting in a light above the tub and adding an electrical outlet on the other side of the sink.  

We really appreciated the fact that Horizon had their own showroom and could make suggestions on combinations of tile, vanities and counter materials.  After going to the big box stores and looking at tile and counter top materials and still not knowing what we wanted we found Mark's input invaluable. 

The workmen all were very good at their jobs.  Steps were taken to protect the floors leading to the bathroom under remodel. Trash was removed in a timely manner.  

There were lots of items we needed to purchase in the first couple of days so that when the walls were rebuilt accommodations could be made for the water supply, drains and electrical.  Decisions had to be made along the way and we answered them the same day, so as to not cause a delay in the schedule.  There were a couple of issues that came up and Horizon addressed them as we went along.  

We were so happy with the result that we hesitated to use the bathroom for a couple of days after completion, we didn't want to mess it up.

Bottom line is we wouldn't hesitate to use Horizon Construction again.

I decided to have a load bearing wall removed, which sounds a lot easier than it is. Horizon was the only company I contacted that didn't waffle on giving me an estimate or insist that I must get "more" done in order to be taken seriously.  The office staff was friendly and engaging without being pushy and sales crazy.  I found Eitan Beznos, our assigned contractor, to be friendly,  ethical,  receptive, and always a calming influence in the midst of the project, which , as anyone who's had major construction done  knows, can be a real upheaval of a family's day-to-day life. All the workers involved were pleasant and efficient. I was impressed also by the respect and friendliness between the workers and  Eitan.  I'm very big on customer service, and, to me, a homeowner with a quirky mid century home that needs quite a bit of work, I feel like I've found a reputable company that I can trust and partner with to turn my home into the neighborhood jewel that it can be. I'm looking forward to having Horizon remodel my kitchen later this year.

When i decided to redo my kitchen, i was very nervous about who to hire and trust to do the work.
I'm an older widow with NO experience in all of this. 
after quite a few interviews, well, there was no other choice. 
It was HORIZON CONSTRUCTION & REMODELING all the way.
Michael R. was my project manager and really listened to me and was so helpful in all ways.
Robert and his crew was great. He was always there for me, a giant of a guy in all ways.
I couldn't be happier. They finished in 9 days
AND the price was reasonable. 
It turned out beautiful !
I highly recommend HORIZON!!!

Kathleen M.
Laguna Woods CA

I had a bathroom and bedroom remodeled by Horizon. They were reasonable on the overall cost when compared to other quotes obtained. Eitan Beznos did an excellent job overseeing this project. He expressed a sense of care and always wanted to make sure I was pleased with the work before moving on.
