- Mark, Enna, and Eli were all consistent and reliable. If they said they would meet us at the house at a certain time, they were there on time and ready. We'd be lying if we said they were perfect, but they really made every effort to do their best.
- Our area has a substantial list of HOA requirements. We never once had a single complaint from a neighbor or HOA the entire time, despite a lot of work being done. They hauled off their own trash so our little trash bin wasn't overwhelmed, and generally kept the place picked up. Thanks, Eli !
- Shortly after we started w/Horizon, my husband noticed that somebody had backed into the mailbox and asked Mark if he thought one of his guys had done it. Mark just looked at it, and said "Don't worry, I'll fix it." A couple days later, a new mailbox is there that matched the old one, all fixed up. No debates, just happened.
- Near the end of the project, my husband made a comment about how the drain plumbing was routed. A couple days later, it was fixed. Again, no big debate or issue, just happened.
- After our front door was refinished, the exterior had a green tint to it that we had not expected. It wasn't terrible, and perhaps we were the only ones who would notice. Mark asked how we liked it, and could tell from our first reaction we didn't really like how it looked. But, it was not a terrible issue and we formally told Mark and Enna, in writing, that we'd accept it as-is and not to worry resanding/finishing it only for a modest cosmetic issue. It looked fine, and quality was good, but we just had an expectation of a more brownish deep wood finish. A week or so later, they refinished the door anyway, and now looks perfect.

There are more little stories like that, but you get the point. We thought that Horizon was highly focused on Customer Satisfaction in the way they ran the project from beginning to end. They took care to do good quality work, sought client feedback in a constructive way, and addressed issues quickly and practically. They had to get some city permits in this project which they got without a big problem, and they passed all the city inspections without issue.

One of the things which makes Horizon unique from others we considered was that there was no middle-man handoff from the Sales rep to the person who actually manages the job. We worked with Mark, Enna, and later Eli throughout the entire project. We really enjoyed getting to know them, and we thought the continuity of the relationship definitely contributed to the efficient outcome.

In our experience with Horizon, we found them to be professional, ethical, skilled, and hard-working throughout the process. We would recommend Horizon to our own family members.

Thank You, Horizon. You are a great team !

Horizon Construction immediately responded to our request for a quote. Mark came out to the house, listened to our ideas, and helped us to plan a remodel that exactly fit what we wanted. He also helped with picking out materials that fit our budget.
Work started on time (once all permits were approved), and moved quickly, without any work breaks.
There were no issues in contacting Horizon, and any issues that came up during the project were quickly addressed. 
We would highly recommend the Horizon team (Mark, Enna, and Sam) to any of our friends.
Looking forward to doing business with them again.

Rescued from a nightmare!!!

We had a horrific experience with another contractor which left us with a bathroom that we couldn't use. The contractor lost their license and we were left with realizing we were going to have to start all over again.

Horizon came in a rescued us from our misery and delivered a beautiful new master bathroom! We were able to even get our guest bathroom a partial facelift too and we paid about the same for all of it! The work was done on time and their experts workers were very courteous and always left our house in great shape after a hard day's work.

We will recommend Horizon to all of our friends and family.

Greg and Joanna Busch

Complete remodel of all the entire downstairs and common area of upstairs of 3,100 square foot home. Work included 1) kitchen (design, demolition of old kitchen, new cabinets, granite countertops, plumbing, electrical, relocation of gas cook top and vents, stone flooring, baseboards, and painting 2) family room (design, removal of wet bar, new cabinets, granite countertops, new fireplace, wood flooring, baseboards, and painting), 3) living room (wood flooring, electrical, baseboards, and painting), 4) powder room (design, new cabinets, granite countertops, plumbing, electrical, baseboards, and stone flooring), 5) laundry room (stone flooring, baseboards, and painting), 6) refinishing of wood staircase and upstairs cabinets, and 7) carpet upstairs.

As you can see, this was a major remodel project. I wanted a contractor to oversee all aspects, work with me on the design, stay on top of the job, do professional grade work, and show up every day, all at a fair price. I got that with Horizon. You can go with a cheaper contractor but I doubt you will get all of these qualities. Mark spent a lot of time with my wife and I selecting cabinets, granite countertops, and flooring making design suggestions. He also made recommendations as the job progressed. Enna was in contact with me daily and was a pleasure to deal with. The job started the day they said it would and ended on time. I checked the work done daily. If there was every an issue or I was not happy for some reason it was corrected without discussion. Horizon even did some upgrades to improve the look of the job and did not charge for it. They did not charge any large up front fees instead I paid as each aspect of the job was started and completed. Mark did a final inspection at the end sending some workers back to do minor touch ups. I would highly recommend Horizon.

We recently had new wood floors installed in the entire downstairs of our house.  The job included demolition of existing tile and carpet.  They hauled away the old tile and carpet and did a wonderful job installing my new floors.  Horizon also converted my old patio into a new patio/sunroof.  They added walls around the existing patio and installed windows and a sliding  glass door and doggy door.  I had a wonderful experience working with Horizon Construction and Remodeling.  Mark Besnos and Enna Eskin were very pleasant to talk to and they responded to every call I made to them.  Mark was on the job frequently to be sure things were being done to my satisfaction.  His crew was very hard working and did an excellent job - they were on the job daily and always cleaned up prior to leaving.  I was amazed at the progress that was made each day.  The entire job took approximately 4 weeks and stayed within my budget.  I am very pleased with the final product.  My floors are beautiful and I love my new patio/sunroom.  I would very highly recommend them to anyone that had a  job to be done.  I definitely plan to use them again in the future.

Mark provided the second estimate on my kitchen remodel.  After making some recommendations and suggestions, we settled on a design, and Mark and Enna did their best to work within my budget while still providing quality materials and equipment.  

Enna held my hand through picking out my countertops and cabinets, and even guided me through the purchase of my appliances.   Mark came up with a great design based on my needs and what I had to work with.   Along the way there was some stress and misunderstandings, but both Mark and Enna worked tirelessly to make me happy and come up with great resolutions.    We were in contact every day either by phone or email, and Mark even rushed over on a Saturday when I needed my gas turned back on. 

I can't say enough about the finished product.  It is one of the most beautiful kitchens I've ever seen and it's mine.   Thanks Mark and Enna

Horizon Construction and Remodeling performed a complete remodel of two bathrooms, including expansion of exterior walls to increase size of bathrooms.
The completed work went beyond expectations. Top quality results. The workers were punctual, courteous and cleaned up after themselves. We enthusiastically recommend Horizon Construction and Remodeling for anyone seeking to remodel.
   We also recently added another job for this company, new railing and stairs. An awesome job again .

Horizon Constructions remodeled our guest bathroom, turning a tub into a walk-in frameless glass door shower, replacing the floor, the vanity and the toilet.  

Having had my kitchen remodeled with a different contractor, I was very impressed by the punctuality of Horizon Construction, Enna always kept me updated and in the loop of what to expect and when!  Also updated us promptly on any issues or problems.

Mark had a very keen eye for design and gave us suggestions on the materials for both the floors and the shower and also few other design elements.

Also, they replaced the glass door when Mark noticed a crack that both me and my husband missed!  We really liked the professionalism and the meticulousness that Mark and Enna showed.

It has been two months since the job was completed, but I encountered a recent problem with the shower door and contacted Enna about it.  She assured us when the job was finished that the bathroom was under warranty as well.  She is working on getting the issue addressed.  I love the follow up and the fact that they stand behind their work.

I would definitely recommend this company.

We had a bathroom from 1964 completly remodeled. The original bathroom was about 10 ft. by 4-1/2 ft. with a tub/ shower and dividing wall. We had the tub removed and one wall torn out and rebuilt to expand the room by 2-1/2 ft. We had the original window removed and replaced it with a custom size window which was built into the shower walll. This required structural wall modifications and outside stucco work. We moved all of the plumbing to allow for a large tile shower to be built. This required cutting the slab foundation and installing new drain plumbing for the shower, toilet and sink. New vent pipes were required and had to be installed in the new wall and thru the roof. The shower required extensive plumbing to allow for a cieling rain can, body sprays and a hand held head. We added a fan/ light which required venting thru the roof. The shower was tiled from floor to cieling and the remainder of the room was also tiled about 40" up from the floor. A frameless 3/8" glass door was also installed. Two recessed lights were installed in the shower cieling along with vanity lighting.

Horizon remodeled 3 average-sized bathrooms, and re-tiled a fireplace. The job included: Hot-mopping and floating cement on showers, installing tile on floors, shower, bath surround, and fireplace, installing bathtub, custom shower door and vanities, quartz countertops, sinks, toilets, faucets, fans and lighting, painting, installing baseboards, and bath accessories. 

When I first met with Mark Besnos, it was clear that he had an eye for detail. Mark had some great design ideas, and helped me pick out tile, cabinets. Everything was done very professionally; Mark drew up a detailed contract, and all changes were made with addendums. Mark also provided all of the relevant licenses and insurance documents without having to ask. In the end Mark made sure every last detail was perfect. 

Enna Eskin did an amazing job managing the project. She was always super friendly, knowledgeable, and professional, and was great about using email and text to keep in touch while I was at work. Enna kept me informed of what was happening throughout, and also let me know ahead of time when there were things that I needed to do. 

The work crews were friendly, and considerate. They worked very hard, and performed high-quality work. They did a good job of protecting my floors and furniture, and keeping the mess to a minimum. 

I love my new bathrooms and fireplace. Everything turned out beautifully, and was done on time and within budget.

Early in 2012 we took three contractors' bids for a master bath remodel for our home. In addition to a price we could afford, Horizon Construction gave us some good design ideas and a feeling that they would take good care of us. They weren't the cheapest bid, but we wanted to work with someone who got all the costs out there up front, without adding on later. We felt that's how they made their bid, so we selected them for our job. 

The project would remove the small glass shower enclosure and basically unused bathtub that were there from the original home construction, and also upgrade the vanity with a nicer piece and put a granite top on it. The old toilet would be replaced. The linoleum floor would be replaced with tile which would match nicely the tile of the new shower enclosure. Since we don't use the bathtub, we opted to have more open space beside a larger shower enclosure, and no bathtub. Horizon would also install the toilet, sinks and plumbing fixtures that we furnished for the job; mount new mirrors over the vanity, install new lighting, and paint the walls.

My wife and I didn't have firm ideas on the decor, so the consultation from Horizon was very helpful. We did a session at the building materials showroom together. Once we settled on the color scheme and materials, and the fixtures that we needed to furnish to them for installation, the demolition work began and was finished very quickly and cleanly. Horizon did almost all of the work during the daytime when my wife and I were both at work. They took good care of our house and securely locked it up at the end of their day when they left.

The floor and shower tile work was perfect, and the custom glass (nothing fancy, just clear but it's just what we wanted) was installed on time, and still looks great. Part-way along Horizon suggested we consider a unique tile backsplash around the vanity, using the same accent tiles that are in the floor and the shower. They gave us a special price and although we hadn't wanted to add to our budget, we took their offer. It's a really pretty blue aqua glass tile that is the key element to the whole decoration scheme. The look we got is a bit unique, and breaks from the cookie-cutter conservative approach of the original homebuilder. Very nice and more than worth the money. If we ever sell the home, we'll point out the very custom look of the vanity.

Horizon got the building inspections and everything got approved straight off. Once the painting was done there were just a few finishing touches to get, but Horizon finished ahead of the project schedule, which is nice if your master bathroom opens onto your master bedroom and you're actually trying to live there, as we were! My son was so glad that we didn't have to share his bathroom any longer. But the bottleneck was worth it when work was complete.

Incidentally, for the new toilet, which we picked up at Costco (remember, tight budget), we bought the AMDM IntelliSeat, an electronic toilet seat (if you don't know what it is, just Google it...once you have it, you can't go back) to replace the standard seat. Although Horizon didn't seem to have experience with that product, they installed it perfectly and we love it.

About six months after the project was completed and we'd paid our final check to Horizon, the motion-sensing light switch they'd installed in the bathroom began malfunctioning. It got to be too annoying so I gave Horizon a call to see if they'd fix it for us. They reminded me that they made a full warranty on all their work, and scheduled someone to come out and work on the switch. Their man came to our house and replaced the faulty switch with a new one, which now works perfectly.

We love our bathroom and are so satisfied with Horizon's work. They are friendly professionals who follow up, deal with issues and problems when they occur, finish ahead of schedule, and back up their work.

This project included total demo and reconstruction of 3 bathrooms. It included converting the master bath from a Roman tub to a walk-in shower with travertine to the top of all walls which had cathedral ceilings and a triangular window. and replacing toilets, vanities, sinks, and all fixtures. In the guest bath, the tub was replaced with a new tub and travertine on the walls. The sink, vanity and toilet were also replaced, adding an enclosure using 3/8 inch sliding doors. In the downstairs shower, old ceramic tile was removed and replaced with travertine. The toilet, vanity, and sink were also replaced. The floors in all bathrooms were removed and replaced with travertine.
 
In late September 2012, after getting an estimate from another company for our planned remodel of 2 bathrooms, a large master bath and a smaller downstairs bath, we made an appointment with Horizon Construction and Remodeling for an estimate. We had previously read reviews here on Angie’s List.
Mark arrived at the designated time, discussed with us our plans, then took measurements of the bathrooms. He also made suggestions regarding the project. He suggested that we meet with him at MSI to look at a variety of materials so he could more accurately provide an estimate.
After deciding to have Horizon do the project, we made an appointment with Mark to go over the contract, scope of work, and the payment schedule. It was determined that work could begin on October 3 but since demolition could only begin midday, We decided that early morning the following day would be best.
The demolition crew arrived as scheduled and the project was started. Demolition of the 2 bathrooms was completed in 2 days and work began on the remodel construction. Each segment of the project went smoothly. In the meantime, we went with Mark to select a marble slab for the countertops. We also met with the cabinet maker regarding the custom vanities and color of the stain.
Work progressed smoothly and ahead of schedule. Along the way, we made several changes. Enna was very helpful in accomplishing those changes and doing the paperwork involved. She is an invaluable asset to the company.
When the original project was well on its way to completion, we decided to go ahead and do the third bathroom since we had enough marble left from the slab to do the countertop. Also, the vanity in the upstairs guest bath was the same size as the downstairs bath which made the custom construction easier and more efficient.
Mark was here on a regular basis to check on progress, answer questions, and listen to our concerns. In some cases, he had noticed things that needed correction before we even brought them up.
Any remodel project, and especially one of this magnitude, is stressful. I know of several cases where projects lasted much longer than anticipated but that was not the case here. The projected completion date was January 10, 2013, however, work was completed December 15, 2012, which made our Holiday Season more enjoyable than it might have otherwise been! The master bath, which was converted from a Roman tub to a walk-in shower is amazing and the other two bathrooms are elegant as well.
Horizon Construction and Remodeling is dependable and you can expect them to do what they agreed to do. The quality of their work is good and everyone we encountered was responsible for their part of the job. My only admonition to you is that you make sure the scope of work that you sign off on includes all the things you discussed and thought would be there.
If you have a project in mind, call Horizon Remodeling and Construction and give them an opportunity to discuss it with you before you make a final decision. We are pleased with how our bathrooms came out and would not hesitate to call Horizon for another project

Completely restructured our fireplace, hard wood floor, added new railing, and installed surround sound
Remove popcorn. Install 4 skylights & 4 solar tubes. Install bamboo flooring & carpet. Install over 35 recessed lights & art lighting. Create a magnificent bar. Remove non-structural beams. Sand, prime, paint all doors & cupboards. Replace all molding. Remove all wallpaper & paint. Install kayak & bike racks.
They are incredible, I would give them the highest rating possible without a shadow of a doubt. They are professional and do great work every time we have had them out. Their communication is great and they are all perfectionists. I would recommend them to anyone in the future. I have never had a better experience. Mark has great vision for remodeling and always holds his work to a higher standard
Horizon Construction was outstanding to work with from beginning to end. Mark Besnos is a visionary who does exceptional work. Mark and Enna (owners) were in constant communication with continual supervision to ensure quality results.They transformed a tired 1970's condo into a beautiful living environment. We will use this professional contractor again in our future remodel.

It was a pleasure working with Mark and Enna and all of their crew members. Mark and Enna went out of their way to find just the right fixtures and French doors that  I envisioned for my new master bedroom. I am especially happy with the double doors that were hung on my new closet. I was very pleased with how much attention was given to the finest details and how quickly they were able to complete the construction.

We enjoyed working with Mark and Enna to remodel and update our master bathroom. Mark was especially helpful during the planning phase when he listened patiently to our endless questions and provided useful information and suggestions that helped us reach decisions about project materials and stylistic choices. After work began, Mark and Enna continued to be very responsive to us regarding scheduling aspects of the work and finalizing decisions about the details. Throughout the process, they stressed that the goal was to create a master bathroom that we would really enjoy, even if that meant occasionally changing our minds about details or adding new work at times. This was our first major renovation project, and we feel that Mark, Enna and their team did a great job guiding us through it and creating a great new room to enhance our home.

Our kitchen & Den was recently remodeled and everyone we dealt with @ SOD Home Group was nice, professional, and performed quality work. 
The entire staff was committed to ensuring that the experience met our expectations. Whenever we had a question or concern on anything they addressed it immediately. We would highly recommend SOD Home Group for your renovations.

From start to finish, SOD Home Group was phenomenal to work with, and they went above and beyond in designing and building the addition of our dreams. Everyone we worked with (our designers, our carpenter, production supervisor, office staff) were all so friendly, competent and professional. It was as painless an experience as possible, given that we remodeled our whole house while living in it.
They really pulled that off !

They did an excellent job! We are very satisfied with the price, quality, and professional installation. They remodeled the kitchen in a timeframe that they promised. I’m looking forward to starting the bathroom remodeling project in a few months. Everything in our kitchen matches the theme we were going for.
I would recommend them to anyone needing to update their kitchen!

We recently decided to sell our home and needed some work done quickly ( kitchen, bathroom and master bedroom). I contacted SOD Home Group and as expected, they made it happen. We had the teams out within a week. And, most importantly, the work was still at the same high caliber as it always is. They finished everything in 3 weeks. I will certainly use them again as I know they do quality job. We love our home so much that we feel bad to sell it now.

I am thoroughly pleased with SOD HOME GROP From design creation to the project manager I can not praise them enough for their professionalism and attention to detail. Once we agreed on the initial aspects of the job, work began. Our project manager was open to our ideas, provided many thoughts of his own, and made time on multiple occasions to go over selection of materials and to review the design. 
I tell EVERYONE I know how consistently fantastic this company is. Our room addition looks better than we ever imagined it could be!

We were looking for a  local reputable remodeling company to renovate our entire home. Thankfully, we came across SOD HOME GROUP Company, who proven to be an expert in home remodeling and interior designing. They did a fantastic job and gave our home a stylish and sophisticated look. We had a great experience with this company. Highly recommended! Charles Martin

They just finished to renovate our guest house and backyard  for us and it turned out great. Extremely professional. From the very beginning, he provided a line by line estimate so that there was never any confusion about what needed to be done. We never had to worry that he was going come back to us and ask for more money. Communication was excellent. I felt confident that I could reach them by phone or text at any time. When unexpected issues arose, they were quick to do everything they could to see that it was taken care of in a timely manner. Would absolutely recommend and will use again in the future.

This company is amazing. Their Crews showed up on time fully equipped and did an amazing job restoring everything. After the demolition and the removal of the our guest house they set the equipment up in a very clean and workable set up. They are very knowledgeable and very educational. They took the time to educate my wife and myself about every step and how every step was going to happen and the goals that had to be met before each step could move on. When they left the house each day it look they had never even been here. They were so meticulous with their clean up, it was amazing. I would recommend them highly to everybody!

Active participation, attention to detail and a relentless pursuit of both quality and timely project execution are just some of the attributes this team exemplifies! I have had the privilege of being awarded several projects over the years and have thoroughly enjoyed working with SOD Home Group Team! I look forward to even more successful projects with these professionals and your home could be their next masterpiece! Thanks a lot!

The renovations of our three bathrooms, kitchen and Guest House went great and the transformations were amazing! I HIGHLY recommend Christian ! He is timely, fair priced, easy to work with, meticulous and does great work. Nowadays , it's hard to trust someone in your house. I have to say he earned our trust even enough that we left him with a key to our house while we went on a vacation and came home to our beautiful home! We are very pleased!

Oren and his team were amazing and I could not give them a higher recommendation!! We had an attic project that involved a bathroom and bedroom, and creating a new room in an old, very tight space. Oren provided us a response via email, saw the space and provided an estimate within 2 days, then started the project and completed it within another 3-4 weeks! His work is beautiful, his estimate was right in the middle and far less than we were expecting (and he stayed right on budget!) and his team was extremely professional, timely and responsive to our questions. Could not say more good things about SOD HOME GROUP. This is exactly what we wanted!!

Oren is very professional and quick to get a hold with when you need things done. I work with him to fix some issue with my condo when i was putting it on the market. And still working with him on the house I am about to buy with the inspection issues. He gives very reasonable prices to fix the problem.

Our Garage conversion designer, was amazing. The only agenda was that we create spaces that fit us and our lifestyle, and that we be thrilled with the outcome. They never pushed us and always listened to us and responded to what we wanted. Honestly, he is the consummate designer and professional. SOD HOME GROUP gets a standing ovation.

Don't look anywhere else. To say that my job didn't go exactly according to plan would be an understatement and Mario and his entire team were pros from start to finish. Our job was a demo of our old guest house and rebuilding, designing and installing a beautiful new guest house under the watchful eye of Mario and the team. The consistent communication from Mario was also a huge plus as the home is a complete remodel and I'm rarely on site. Finally, remember that you get what you pay for; there may be cheaper contractors out there, but there aren't any better - take that to heart.

I can't thank SOD Home group enough. They were organized from the onset. Their presentation was better than anyone else that my family and I looked requested bids from. They were great through every step of the process. From demolition, to installing/building everything, to having it all completed. I enjoyed the process of it all. Awesome.

Oren from SOD Home Group , led our house renovation project over a period of five weeks.  Oren and his team were responsive, professional and accommodating of our requirements - from the initial estimate meeting up to the finish of the project. We even added items to the original scope, along the way, and they were still able to complete on time and on budget.  
As the project came to an end, we had to do a detailed quality check ourselves, but once we pointed out any outstanding finishes, they finished the job to perfection. We would definitely work with Oren and team again for any future renovation needs.

This started out as a project to make my mother in laws home ADA compliant, and we ended up updating the entire home. It seemed logical after discussions with Mario, and so we moved forward. The project was completed very quickly due to our timeline and the results are phenomenal! Working with contractor Mario was a pleasure. He is honest and hard-working and is a complete contrast to my previous experiences. Will use them for all my future projects.

After interviewing several companies for the room addition project, we hired SOD Home Group. We were very impressed with the vision, professionalism, and ideas from our sales representative Mario . We valued all the detailed and self-explanatory estimates and budget, including the schedule that was presented to us before we signed the contract. When the remodeling project started, we were updated daily via e-mails and additional visits by Mario. The people who worked at the house on the project were respectful of our house and they always cleaned at the end of each day. They also guided us with all the interior design with the selection of light fixtures, floor tiles, and paint color/style choices. At the end of the remodeling project, it addressed any detail that we needed additional attention on.
Our room addition turned out to be a success and it’s our favorite room in my home :)

Oren is fantastic! His team seriously saved my butt. I hired them, to remodel my kitchen and 3 bathrooms, and am so very glad that I did. They worked very hard to deliver on a timeline that was, I'm sure, terrible- but they really came through for me. He's gone out of his way to make a difficult situation less stressful. Oren is extremely professional and I would highly recommend him. He's clearly very knowledgeable, and has been very communicative. Seriously can't thank him enough for bailing me out of this mess

We had needed to replace our bathroom. We set up a meeting with SOD Home Group team. Oren was extremely professional. He explained the process and our choices and was very pleasant and professional. The project was handled very professionally - the workers were punctual and cleaned up after themselves daily. The project was completed on time for exactly what Oren had quoted in the estimate. He was easy to get in touch with if we had questions. The Bathroom looks amazing. This company stands by its warranty and its word. We were thrilled with the service we received them and would highly recommend this company.

Today, I met the designer who’ll be my right hand planning our kitchen and 2 bathrooms renovation. The designer was very informative and guided me in choosing my desired design and suggested us to think about how we’ll be preparing meals, and consider schedule before setting a date for work to begin. I am very excited for the results! Absolutely excellent customer service!

What a fresh breath of air speaking to Mario. His honesty and non sales approach to helping me understand the process
After thinking about an ADU for such a long time we finally started looking into it the last 5 months. We spoke to a lot of contractors and really felt comfortable with the knowledge and value this company had. We could not be happier with the result highly recommend!!!

We had a major large bath remodel....Every pat of the job from the virtual design to punch out was handled without any issues.  I was most impressed  how they did not nickel and dime me for minor changes. .  Special thanks to Mario who obviously have renovated hundreds of baths
Full bath basement project finished on budget. The crew was Very punctual, good quality work and cleaned up every evening when finished. Project turned out good and I would recommend

Absolutely the best ADU contractor ( well
At least we think they are ) . They did a spectacular job creating a 900 sqft 2bed, 1.5bath dwelling unit on my house earlier in 2021. From designing the floorplans to handling the paperwork and picking the right materials to the actual construction, I was beyond pleased with their knowledge and expertise at each step. The finished product superseded our expectations. I feel fully confident in giving a high recommendation for this company for your ADU project. You Rock !!

SOD Home Group went above and beyond and delivered better than what I could have imagined. They stand by their work and I will be working with them on my future projects. Thank you for getting our room addition done in time for the holidays.

SOD Home Group  is definitely one of the premier renovation contractors in CA. These guys aren't your typical contractors who show up in an old truck, 2 hours late, and do the job half-ass. They're pros. Seriously. Down to their branding, customer service and quality of work. You get what you pay for and SHG is well worth your money if you want the job done right.

We were quite pleased with SOD Home Group - from the initial consultation, changes made based on budget and preference, help with picking colors, patterns and materials. Everyone involved was pleasant and patient with us. 
The finished work looks great, and the few items that have required 'tweaks' post project have been handled quickly and cheerfully.
Will use them again, I'm sure!

It was a pleasure working with Oren and his crew, we would definitely call them again. They were in touch with us almost everyday letting us know what was going on and if we had any questions. All of the crews that came were professional, flexible and thorough, any issues were promptly taken care of without fuss. We ended up spending more than we had anticipated mainly because of Oren’s enthusiasm and the designs they prepared for us were outstanding, it was hard to say no. The finished work is beautiful, we are very happy!

as a woman, I appreciate how respectful Oren was when providing me with an estimate, going over the contract, and discussing the end results. Although I knew nothing about room addition, he did not make me feel dumb regardless of how many questions I had or explanations I required. He was thorough and transparent. He complied with my requests and made sure I was 100% comfortable with moving forward. I was impressed how quick and efficiently the team worked. After 10 bids and lots of reference checking, they were among the best in pricing, customer service, and job completion.

SOD Home Group completed a major remodel and home addition project for us.  We interviewed a few other contractors, but SOD stood out because of their fair pricing, confidence and professionalism.  We interviewed two other home owners who had used SOD in the past and they had great things to say about Oren and his group.  They transformed our ageing 1600 sq.ft. home into an amazing 2900 sq. ft. that is absolutely breathtaking.  Since this was our dream home being built, we were very involved in selecting materials for the project and the SOD team was very accommodating. They also worked well with other contractors like HVAC, fire sprinkler and sidewalk.   They executed the job to perfection while coordinating with the city for inspections. They did a great job with everything from the laying of the new foundation, framing, electrical, plumbing.  The best part was that they did an excellent job of finishing including flooring, painting, etc.  They were very responsive to fixing minor touch-ups even after we had moved in.  I would whole heartedly recommend SOD.
SOD Home Group folks worked on our bedroom remodel. The work was done on time and the quality was great.

I wanted to do a tech update and remodel to my home in Saratoga. The home was outdated for my style. The SOD Home Group team could handle everything. I had a designer that I wanted to use, but they didn’t pan out and SOD Home Group hooked me up with another designer who did an amazing job. They worked together well, so my experience was very easy. Oren kept me up to date as far as they progress. His experience as a General Contractor made me feel at ease. He really knows what he’s doing. We opened the space up and did a lot of updates, including the pool, which needed to be updated and repaired. The result is exactly what I wanted, and I didn’t have to stay out of my home longer than estimated which I was nervous about. Everything turned out great! Worth every penny!

We were considering remodeling our entire house for several years now and we just never had the money to. When we could finally afford it, we were so spooked about hiring a contractor. Every story we heard was so terrifying! Everyone we knew remodeled got ripped off, the contractor did a horrible job and had to redo the project, or simply took their money and never showed up. We went on a couple of different routes to deeply search and find the right contractor for our project. After meeting a couple of them, we signed a contract with SOD Home Group. They had great appearance online and when we asked if they can take us to a few of their completed and ongoing projects, Oren did not hesitate! Oren immediately agreed. We remodeled our kitchen, bathrooms, living room, dining room, backyard, front yard, and added a new laundry room. Oren’s crew was so respectful, clean, and always on time. Living in your home through construction can be a little bothersome and disturbing. Not to mention that you have no privacy but SOD Home Group crew gave us as much privacy as possible and also disturbed me as little as possible since we work from home (since this COVID started). The quality and craftsmanship they provided is just superb! If you are looking for an honest, and trustworthy contractor definitely call SOD home Group! Oren and the team made what we thought would be a horrible experience into a marvelous, easy-going! we’ll certainly be contacting them down the road for all my remodeling projects.

I took 5 estimates for our remodeling project that included the garage, kitchen, 2 bathrooms. SOD Home Group was by far the fairest bid and the most knowledgeable contractor. Oren was my project manager. Unlike one of the other contractors who completely disregarded my ideas, Oren listened to my ideas and helped me realize them. The project ran into some delays as Oren worked to clear through permitting challenges. Thank goodness that Oren was so diligent in resolving those challenges. Oren and I were in constant contact from the beginning of the year until mid-July, when the job was completed (and I mean constant communication, daily). The consistent communication was also very appreciated. At the end of the day, I felt I could trust Oren, and that is a truly rare thing. If you need help with any remodeling project, give these guys a call — they are good.

The best way I can explain my experience with this company is that everything was done marvelously. One thing Oren promised us from day one is that we will get custom work. That’s exactly what we received - custom remodeling in all matters of the project. Oren helped us hire a custom cabinet maker. They did custom kitchen cabinets, linen closets and our bathroom vanities. Next we needed custom doors and windows since our house was so old and we had to fit all sizes, so once again Oren helped us hire a custom door and window maker. Since we have a large space and the flooring runs through pretty much both top and bottom level and we didn’t want to rip out the old woods, we had to hire someone to make us new custom flooring to match the old one that they had put in close to 90 years ago. We also ended up redoing all of our electric lines, plumbing lines, drain lines and gas lines. Oren helped us hire a plaster specialist who could duplicate the plaster texture that they had done many years ago. He also could help us find the company to duplicate the old plaster base and ceiling molding. Because this was such an old house and large house, we had to get the right contractor to do custom remodeling work. Oren could find us all the local specialists who work in older homes and can duplicate the quality and craftsmanship of what they had used earlier on. We had a lot of woodwork which needed to be customized, not just installation, but also custom making the actual moldings from scratch. One of the best things about Oren was that he had the answers to a lot of our questions. But what I like most about him is that he didn’t get scared of a challenge and in fact pursuited head-on. If there was something that he didn’t know, he wouldn’t just say, well that’s not my problem. He would help us find the right person or company to do that. I’m truly grateful that we could find Oren and his company to help us renovate this property. The house looks marvelous but the best thing about it is that you can’t tell that it was done now it still looks like it was built 100 years ago. What Oren could do for us was that he gave us great ideas to keep the old charm of the house but still update the house where we have a smart home and smart thermostat and the ability to control a lot of different aspects from our phones or tablets. I truly believe that we spent a premium on this renovation. But it was definitely worth it because the house looks marvelous and the property values since we have done the renovation have gone through the roof. I’ve been through my share of remodels and almost all the experiences took more time, more money...you know the story. And then my mother’s condo had water damage, which was uninhabitable. I had 5 bids come back and chose Oren with SOD Hoe Group. He and his team are my heroes. Open communication, direct eye contact, honest opinions, quick problem solving, and most of all, they took care of us when COVID hit and the building shut down to all contractors. Even though we had weeks left on our schedule to get the job done, I could have the Board give us 5 days so that my mother could move back in and they made it happen with no changes to the original renderings. Oren’s communication was impeccable, with immediate responses to every question and request. The craftsmanship is PERFECTION! Thank you, Oren!!!

We started our complete remodeling project by remodeling the kitchen and bathrooms and because it went much better than we expected… we remodeled all the other sections of the house (front and back yard, pool, garage and more…). Oren and his team at SOD Home Group were beyond excellent regarding my home remodeling project. SOD Home Group made our long time vision come true. We have been dreaming for a few years about how we will design the kitchen, what will it have and how it will serve us. We wanted it to be and look no less than perfect. I highly recommend Oren, SOD Home Group! He is very knowledgeable, answered all my questions (and more), very professional, and responsive. Oren also had great ideas and recommendations on how to attain your dream home. He knows house histories, and why houses were built in a certain way! Oren, you are the best!

We are really proud and happy to give this rating and review to SOD Home Group based on our excellent experience with Oren, the team of people who worked at our house, and the company. We hired SOD Home Group to handle a large remodel of my home. Oren and his crew removed a large load-bearing wall and reworked my old living room and kitchen into an open concept floor plan. We had creative SOD home Group redo all of our home and due to the COVID-19, it took longer then we thought it would but the final remodeling work is stunning. Oren and his crew just finished the complete remodeling of our new home. SOD Home Group is the BEST home improvement company by far!! SOD Home Group did a major renovation in our home, removing two load-bearing walls holding the second floor, remodeling our kitchen, the downstairs bathroom, family room and the roof, a complete remodel. We contracted with SOD Home Group to totally update and remodel a large part of our house that basically included the hallway, complete Kitchen, guest bathroom and 2 additional bathrooms and bedrooms. We went over many estimates for our complete ADU project we needed to do since we work from home because of COVID. The Addition included: kitchen and a small bathroom. SOD Home Group was strongly recommended to me by a co-worker who stated that the company was exceptionally reliable and did a quality job. Oren and the guys at SOD Home Group did a stellar job on our big home remodeling project. We added a second story to our Los Angeles home, nearly doubling it in size. We are confident any issues we had with them would have been issues with most other construction companies. Oren and Ezra definitely made an impression on my wife and I, and we would be happy to work with them in the future.

We had a great experience working with SOD Home Group, our project manager Oren. The renovation was literally problem free (this is actually our second remodeling project so we knew that we will have some issues along the way but with this remodeling… all the problems were resolved fast and painlessly... we are very happy with how our remodeling project came out and we love using the beautiful and well-designed kitchen. We definitely recommend using SOD Home Group’s team and office staff because everything was made to fit our needs; it also went much faster than we thought it will be. We also loved that they were able to handle everything from A-Z including the cabinets, flooring, appliances and countertops and the price was reasonable for the quality of the products.

For a while, we searched for a company that can remodel our kitchen and master bathroom. Our past experience with construction companies was ‘OK’ and we learned from our mistakes. SOD Home Group was recommended to us by some people who we know and they were very happy with Oren, his work and his team. From the idea to completion Oren was creative, skilled and professional person to have. Our challenge was that we were at home during the remodeling and we were very impressed by the preparation work that they did before the demolition started! The communication, care and dedication from the team was amazing. We were not used to this style of support from them! The result of the remodeling is what we really dreamed about, plus!

Oren, from SOD Home Group, remodeled our kitchen and all the upstairs bathrooms. He did an amazing job which included all the design elements that we really wanted, and he also came up with many great solutions to our initial wishes, all with wonderful style. The new kitchen is stunning and very practical. Now that we finish the work with them, we can say that Oren and his team are very trustful people and they can make anyone remodeling dreams come to life. Thanks, Oren for your amazing remodeling job!

From the planning stage, to the completion of all the permits from The building & safety department the remodeling project of our house… the work that was made by our contractor Oren (from SOD Home Group) was much more than just ‘excellent’. The results of all the spaces at our house (Kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms etc..) ended with a classy, very efficient, super comfortable 3 bedrooms 2.5 baths house with stunning rooms and beautiful features. Oren is a truly master contractor and his way of work made us fall in love with him.

SOD Builders Group finished the conversion of our garage into a guest room that included a small kitchen, bathroom and living space. The remodeling project took 2.5 months and it was based on a daily basis work under the supervision of Oren and Odelia (from the office). Each stage started only after Oren personally visited our house and confirmed that the previous stage was complete. This way of work made our remodeling so easy, stress-less and easy. Shril on the other hands.... made sure that all the orders, delivers and invoicing will be no less than perfect and she made sure that everything will be ready for the teams at least 1 day before they will move to the next stage. 
Each week we had several conversations with Oren regarding the progress and we were in the loop at any time during the work.
we are very happy with SOD Builders Group and we will hire them again in the future.

We want to thank SOD Home Group for all the hard work that they did at our house AND while we were out of the house while the work took place. Issac met with us several times before the work started and he handled the project like it was his house... he made sure that the teams will arrive to work each day and that the daily and weekly tasks will be completed while he inspects them personally. More than that he always informed us with all the details, pictures and videos about the work progress. We highly recommend SOD Home Group for any home remodeling project!!!!

We used SOD builders to completely remodel an old house. It ended up being a big project, and SOD/Oren was great to work with. They are very dedicated to making the customer happy. And while there was some delays and heartaches along the way (understandably for such a big project ), we are very happy with end result. What is more, they even came back a year later to fix some minor issues that had cropped up. That is amazing customer care. Thanks to Oren and Team.

It's always a pleasure to work with SOD Builders. Oren's knowledge in the field is very impressive and he brings such an added value to each project. The SOD Builders team is a group of professionals, easy to communicate with and their attention to detail is impeccable. Oren's work ethics are rare to find nowadays; honesty, integrity, and quality. If he promises something, he will deliver on it. To say that I have been impressed with the level of service they provide their clients with will be an understatement. Our projects together always turned out to be a huge success with referrals from those clients. Therefore, I highly recommend SOD builders to homeowners who are looking to remodel their homes with peace of mind.

We really love the new bathroom that was remodeled by Oren and his workers. We worked with Oren from start to finish and by doing that, we had no hassle or many people to talk to about anything related to the project at our house. The old bathroom was too old and we wanted to have a new look by replacing and installing everything including the new shower and floor. From the moment we signed and paid the initial payment, Oren made sure to take care of everything and only informed us with the relevant information including, the arrival of any delivery or to go and select the materials. The new bathroom was completed after 3 weeks of work and the last week of the work was to fix and correct the minor issues that we had.

Our recent experience with SOD Builders was a long distance remodeling project relationship thing. We hired them for our project before we moved into the home (because we are out of state). As part of their work, they installed new floor around the entire house, totally remodeled the guest bathroom including some major upgrades to the master bathroom. Due to our situation, many of the design details were discussed and agreed over the phone and by emails while most of the remodeling work was even done without us visiting the house and seeing the progress. Oren definitely made this ‘almost’ stress and super difficult work entirely easy and nice. We had our total trust and confidence in them and the team that worked made us feel that we are in awesome hands during the process. The high quality work and the time frame that took them to finish the work…made us so pleased with the decision to hire them and we felt it right after we finally moved in. We recommend SOD Builders for their excellent services, high quality and also because they are truly a pleasure people and company to work with.

SOD Builders was hired to remodel our house that we just purchased los Angeles area. We are very confident to recommend them because many different reasons but for the sake of this review… we’ll just mention some of them. 
- They were very dedicated to provide us with the required results of the work.
-They were multipurpose and flexible during the work even if it was a small modification that we wanted to do.
- They were open and honest with us about how long specific stages of the project will take.
- They were professional when it came to the designs and layout of the remodeling. Our project manager (Oren), the designer and the office were very involved in our project making for a unified project.
With the points above… our project turned out to be a stress free construction project. The remodeling was the main thing that turned our house into a new property. We are so happy with the new our and we can’t wait to hire them again in the future for a pool remodeling project. We are fully satisfied with  the beautiful work executed by SOD Builders!

We had a townhouse remodeled and it included all the upper and lower cabinets in the kitchen, master bathroom redesign and remodeled & guest bathroom downstairs with new marble counter tops,  faucets, double sinks, wall mirrors & recessed lights on top of new layer of paint and electrical work.  The whole remodeling project final costs was much less than we originally budgeted and it was finished much faster than we planned. Our biggest concern was that we couldn’t be there physically to oversee the daily work because we live in another city and we relied on the experience, honesty and professionalism of Oren, his team of people.  They both kept us up to date on the progress of the work & each day they sent us pictures of the work that was performed each day. We are happy with the ideas that they came up with during the work and we would highly recommend them.  Many thanks to the whole SOD Builders crew for an excellent remodeling job.

SOD Builders gets my high score for being so skilled, honest and professional during the entire pool construction that we recently had at our house. We always talked about getting a nice pool, but we needed to have specific requirements before starting the work. The SOD Builders team made sure to stand behind certain standards prior taking on this pool project and this made us feel so comfortable and secure that we decided to hire them and moving forward. Within few months, Oren and the team had the pool construction complete and now it is really a proud project to see and use. We couldn’t asked for a better construction company than SOD Builders to design and build our dream pool. We highly recommend SOD Builders for anyone who is looking to bring a remodeling project to life.

When I decided to go with SOD Builders, Oren and his team including the office staff did a great work by remodeling our kitchen (I must mention that this was not an easy remodeling project because of space issues). The kitchen space turned out to something that is gorgeous and super functional. On top of that, Oren helped me with the selection of all the materials.  me and my family really love the overall service at SOD Builders. they always were there for me, always answered to all my questions even when I had a problem during the work, Oren sent someone at night to fix the problem. I must mention that all of my questions/concerns were always answered in a timely and professional manner. I highly recommend SOD Builders for any kitchen remodeling project.

We convert the garage into a guestroom that is 550 sq/ft in size. We hired Oren and his company at SOD Builders to do that after he was able to give us a great price on the materials and the labor. Oren was able to include all the items that we wanted to have in the space and this included a small closet, kitchen and bathroom. What we loved was the fact that Oren designed, estimated and executed everything including the paint colors and textures of the floor and he was able to bring us several samples with combinations of what we should do. The bedroom was remodeling was completed after 3 months and the end results are awesome.

Oren at SOD Builders did a perfect work with the 4 bathrooms project at our house. Oren was professional and very polite to us and he had a lot of patience towards his workers and the vendors that worked as well. The bathrooms that we remodeled (Master bathroom, 1 guest bathroom and 1 jack and jill) included a long vanity with 2 sinks and faucets, New stone floor with nice design, Paint and all the hardware that installed on the doors, walls etc... The bathrooms that we have included a shower and bath tub. All of them have been included in the remodeling and we love the new look.

We had such a wonderful experience with SOD Builders all the way from the design during the actual work  installation and final check list of our remodeling project with the team. Oren on the supervision side of the work were wonderful people when it came to ideas, planning and execution. The workers were superb and perfect problem-solvers. After the work was completed, Oren stayed in touch with us in order to be sure that we were very satisfied and happy with the complete work (kitchen, 2 bathrooms and the entry of the house). Highly recommend!

Oren at SOD builders came over to our house (we got his contact information from a coworker who just hired them for a large-scale remodeling project). he measured the kitchen and bathroom and took some pictures in order to generate a great design for the spaces. His design looks very nice and we hired him for this work. He brought also one of his workers to take a look and see if he would like to change or modify anything. 
the work was divided to sections:
1. demolition of the existing one
2. move some lights and outlets
3. patch and fix the walls
4. paint the kitchen 
5. install the cabinets
6. install all the lighting fixtures
7.install the counter tops, sink and faucet
8. install the appliances 
9. do some touch ups of the paint.
during the work, we had no issue with any of the employees. 
they did their work and made sure to move everything before work.

We used SOD Builders for a remodeling project recently and I cannot recommend them highly enough. They did awesome work at all stages of the remodeling project, from drafting to design to the actual work. On top of that, they were very friendly and nice people to work with. My remodeling project included: New kitchen, new hardwood flooring and paint of the entire house, in addition to some minor bathroom updates. From the beginning, the design team made me feel at ease with their wonderful suggestions and attention to all the detail. Working with them really felt as a collaborative effort. They very open to my ideas, implementing the good ones and explaining the differences. In addition to designing the cabinetד, they helped me select all the appliances, flooring, paint. The team was top-notch. They were friendly, skilled, hardworking and excellent craftspeople. The whole remodeling project was completed within our budget and just a little bit over time… but that’s because we added more things during the work. Were thrilled with how things turned out!

We had the pleasure working with SOD Builders and the team. Our remodeling ended up much better than what we wanted. The remodeling involved tear down a wall, brand new kitchen, 2 bedrooms, the back entry of the house and also the front entrance. The office staff, the designer and the working people were very personable and easy people. We had the vision for the front entry and Oren with his team were able to build a mock up so we could feel how the final look will turn out. They always arrived to work on time, worked with the budget and provided wonderful recommendations when issues and problems came up. We will hire them again for all of our future remodeling projects.

It was a pleasure to hire SOD Builders our big remodeling project at our main living house! We had no problems, issues, delays, of missing days during the work with any of the workers, supervisor (Oren) that worked at our house NOR with any of the office staff. The remodeling project that included the kitchen, bedrooms, bathrooms and garage AND the outdoor kitchen came out nice and perfect and within 4 months from the day we hired them and the day the work got started! We are very happy, lucky and fortunate to have SOD builders at our house.

We were happy with the estimate that we got from Oren about our guest bathroom, Kitchen, Garage and few other items at our house. Oren was nice to us during the remodeling and he communicated with us on each step of the remodeling. His workers and his supervisor came every day to work and they were nice people as well. Over all, The new bathroom looks good and nice and we are pleased with the quality of the work that SOD Builders did.

I have hired SOD Builders on major repair and renovation project for my damaged house that got damaged after a fire damage. The customer service and attention that I got from this company and mainly from the actual people that worked at my house was outstanding and I would highly recommend them with my eyes closed to anyone that need to any remodel any house that have this type of damage. Here is with my own words of why and what they did at my house that caused me to write this review and recommendation about them: 
a.Honest & ethical: From the first time I called them till the moment the final payment was done, I noticed that all they care was to make sure to do the work on the best side and not to try and find reasons to earn more and more money. During the work itself, there were additional problems that were found and most of them were taken care of without even letting me know or to try and charge me for additional money.
b.Budget – The work was divided to 2 sections... section 1 was for the first time they arrived to my house and tried to save as much as possible things. And the second time was for the complete work that needed to be done in order to make the house as a living house. In both things, the amount that was set, was fixed and didn’t changed and more than that. On the second stage, the budget that was set didn’t raised or included any hidden charges.
c.On-time: They give realistic timeframes and realistic quotes. They may not the cheapest or fastest, but you can be sure and confident that they're costs will be reasonable and that they will complete the job without any hesitation or concern when they promise and within budget.
d.Great working skills and extremely ethical working people: The people at SOD Builders were able to provide me with excellent ideas about the new repairs. Because of the damages, I have the opportunity to redesign the kitchen mainly and the first floor of the house.
e.Great people! The company assigned to my house several people that did the actual work and they were managed and supervised by Oren. Oren was the most serious person that we dealt from the company and all he cared was to make sure that the work is being done on the most perfect side and without any problem. The rest of the people were excellent people.

We were satisfied with our previous contractor who remodeled our master bathroom but this time he wasn’t available to do it due to some family reasons and we wanted to remodel the rest of the bathrooms including the kitchen so we started to make our research and to find a good contractor. Our neighbor hired SOD Builders recently and he showed us his remodeled bathroom and it was amazing so we asked for the phone number of SOD Builders. We called them and spoke to Christin who was very nice to us, she was able to schedule the meeting with Oren and to start the work within a week and a half after. The price was fair and we hired them. The remodeling project took 8 weeks, which was within a promised time frame. They did a very good job, and the quality of all the finished products were at highest level and it looks beautiful. We truly can’t ask for more. Very Professional contractor, We will recommend and hire their service again – for sure!

In one word,  WOW!
Oren Dagan and SOD Builders has far exceeded our expectations with their outstanding customer service, design team, and quality of work. They have been so wonderful to work within our home remodeling in Westlake Village. Their team has been prompt, patient, and professional in dealing with my wife and me in our crazy time. They have team, great eye for the most up to date trends and trades yet have been very practical in dealing with our budget and the fact we have four young children under the age of ten. The whole staff from top to field to the office has been great, and I would recommend them to anyone looking for the (one word) WOW experience.

We had the privilege to work with Oren and the fantastic team of SOD Builders as we were building our new home in Palo Alto. Their talented architects, project manager, office stuff,  design team, site emplyees, and subcontractors covered all aspects and details of our new home. They created a caring friendship and with us as their clients and worked with us to achieve comprehensive coverage of all the details from the initial building plans to furnishings and accessories. Their design team took the time to review our lifestyle and really listened to our likes and dislikes, their production team communicate to us throw the app on a daily basis and were always there to make us feel safe and confident while demonstrating an unmatched customer service level to "under promise and over deliver." as Oren told us in the beginning.  They carefully worked alongside our family in the decision-making process resulting in an experience that exceeded our high expectations in the quality of craft and overall design, but they also came on a budget! 
 
They worked tirelessly to place neat and clean, hang pictures, accessorize beyond belief.
Their concierge team kept surprised us, make us feel special and unique, and at the same time, they made sure we are safe and on our side. The experience was beyond belief and could not have been more seamless as every consideration of detail was checked and rechecked. 
 
 Oren, Michal, Kathy, Rose Tomy, Mario and the entire team of SOD Builders, took our fantastic house and gave the welcoming, warm feel of a family home that we can be proud of. Our family is forever grateful for all their help and will not hesitate to use them again in the future. Thank you, family!

We had an excellent redesign and installation of our kitchen and 3 bathrooms at our house and a complete makeover of the garage. The materials and final products used were high end and we are thrilled of the new look throughout our home. We really appreciate all the attention that was invested in all the details, the professionalism and the passion to accommodate our needs. We were treated with lots of respect and compassion as they always answered to each and every question we had AND they made lots of efforts to pleased us. Recently we called Oren to check and see if he can take care of an electrical problem that we had in our kitchen. Oren did not think twice to send his people and to provide us with a very fast service. We will call on Oren and his ‘Luxcess Home by SOD Builders’ crew again and again!

The company cancelled a scheduled appointment the day of without a call or email explanation, simply a calendar cancellation.  I was working from home in order to make the appointment. In the future a more considerate approach would be to call and explain the last minute cancellation then request for a reschedule.

Luxcess Home by SOD Builders is such a great construction company with outstanding customer service and very high-end standards. All of their workers are very professional, skilled and well-mannered while Oren always was there for us to answer all of our questions, comments, concerns and ideas. After we finished our remodeling, we can say clearly that we definitely won’t hire anyone else ever for any remodeling that we may do in the future while we will keep recommend them to our friends, family and who ever we know. Bottom line is that they were the greatest team that we can ever imagine to work or be involved with.

Great company to work with! Very professional and reliable people. We worked with Allen and his crew to remodel our kitchen and bathrooms at our house. Allen did a great work and we are very happy with our decision to hire them for our house. We highly recommend them to anyone who is interesting to do similar remodeling project as ours.

We hired Luxcess Home by SOD Builders to remodel our Kitchen and master Bathroom. Adam our project manager was helpful and useful during the whole remodeling process. The quality of the cabinets, flooring, paint and more… s very high and we are very satisfied with the complete remodeling project. Adam was very creative and after all the meetings that we had, he provided us with a printed estimate that included a timeline, price breakdown and total price with focusing on each stage of the process. All the issues that came up during the remodeling, Adam handled them in a timely manner and solved them. The remodeling project was completed on the date that he promised us. We love the new kitchen and master bathroom and are very happy with the new design and results that Luxcess Home by SOD Builders delivered us.

We used Luxcess Home by SOD Builders for 2 remodeling projects at our house. The remodeling projects were to completely remodel our master bathroom and to remodel the front yard of the house. The 2 remodeling project went one after the other and it show by itself how happy we were with the overall work and service that we got. Gal and his working team were easygoing, helpful and comprehensive. When there was a problem that came up during any stage of the work, Gal and the workers took care of it immediately and fixed it. If we have any additional remodeling work to do in the future we will call Luxcess Home by SOD Builders first.

Our house required a totally upgrade and Ehud AT Luxcess Home by SOD Builders was the one who came to our rescue. He gave us a new and beautiful house that we are super proud of. His ideas and visions were right on and within our budget. He even did some wonderful changes to our ideas that ended up being stunning. From the design stage, selecting the counter tops, paint color scheme and more.. all the way to the hardwood floors… Ehud and his team worked like no words can describe. We highly recommend Ehud and Luxcess Home by SOD Builders for any remodeling needs.

My husband and I had Allen and his group of skilled people worked at our house on the remodeling project of our new purchase house. From start to finish, the whole remodeling project went without any problem and efficiently. All of the workers that were fully involved at the remodeling project were very experienced, hardworking, and honest and with many years of involvement with Allen which is something very important about Luxcess Home by SOD Builders. Any problem, issue, concern or even idea that came up during the work, was taken care seriously and right away. We highly recommend Allen and Luxcess Home by SOD Builders.

We were in a need of a home improvement contractor man/company that can help us with design ideas for a house that we just purchased. We found Luxcess Home by SOD Builders because of the high rating that they have on several internet platforms. When we called them, we spoke to Avi who was very nice to us over the phone and we scheduled a meeting at the house for the following day. Avi came over to our house and after his inspection and understanding of what we want to achieve, he was able to give us a detailed understanding of what should we expect from this remodeling process. We are so happy with the work that he did for us that we know that we will hire him for any future projects. Thanks Luxcess Home by SOD Builders!

We have had the great pleasure of hiring Luxcess Home by SOD Builders team for our complete home remodeling project lately. As a home improvement company - we truly recommend them for any similar projects. Our involvement with them at our house for this type and scale of remodeling project was excellent and stress free. The working team and the project manager listened to our vision and ideas while focusing on how to improve them in order to get a much better results and functionality of all the spaces, while bringing their extensive expertise to our project. It was a true pleasure to allow them create all the beautiful spaces at our house. We are by far a happy clients that highly recommend this them!

We chose Luxcess Home by SOD Builders as our complete home project designer and builder. Avi was very professional, communicated and very experienced. We really loved the detailed design that Avi did for the house and also the overall remodeling. Avi was able to turn our old house into a new, traditional, up to date and classy look. The whole project was finished several months after it started and to our best satisfaction. From the time that the work was completed, we keep getting so many compliments. As part of the project, Avi met with us many times at several vendors to help us matching parts of the house with stones, light fixtures, paint colors and much more… all the sections at the house came out gorgeous, functional for our need and in very high quality. The most beautiful part of the remodeling, was the kitchen and bathrooms. As part of the work, we came across so many people at the house and we really enjoyed working with all of them on our remodeling project. We will not hesitate to hire and use CAN Partners for any of our potential next projects.

Excellent company!!!!!
Luxcess Home by SOD Builders were hired by us to do a total remodeling of our house. They handled everything that related to the remodeling (from the design stage all the way to the execution of the work and bringing it to life) very professionally including all the architecture plans. Generally, they really helped us organize it all. The working teams that were part of this work were polite and very experienced. We really liked working with them and we really felt connected to our project manager Allen. We found that hiring them and working with them was easy and straight to the point. We really love how our new kitchen, bathrooms and the rest of the work came out and we strongly recommend them. We must mention that this was our first time hiring this company. In the future… we will use them again.

Oren did several remodeling projects in our past houses such as new floors, bathroom remodeling and more… We were always treated as VIP and everything was done in a perfect way. For our recent purchased house, we needed to remodel our kitchen and living room. This remodeling was no less than our previous ones and we were not disappointed... Oren took care of everything that related to the remodeling, from the planning stages all the way to the execution of it. Each worker was professional and we didn’t have any major problem with any of them like many other people sometimes have. Oren was a complete pleasure person to work with. He earned our trust and business for any future remodeling projects that we will have. Thank you Oren for our remodeling and service.

I strongly recommend Luxcess Home by SOD Builders to any home owner or investor that is looking for any construction or home improvement company for their house or investment property. My recommendation is based on the honesty, professionalism, customer service and high quality of the work they do. But the main thing is the customer service that they provide which is outstanding. Our project manager Oren was very professional, hardworking, trustworthy, know how to solve problems when they raises and polite. We are truly in love with the remodeling work that they did at our house which made a huge change of our living.

Luxcess Home by SOD Builders was really a professional and great company to hire and work with. It was very easy experience for us! The skills, care, time, way of working, ability to solve problems as they raises and the overall attention to all the details during the remodeling project was appreciated! The final results of our kitchen and bathroom remodeling project was much more than we thought we can get and have! We write this review for Luxcess Home by SOD Builders to present our big recommendation and mainly for Avi and Sari who were both great people to work with as they did all they could to make us happy and proud of what we hired them for and we enjoyed our overall remodeling experience!

Luxcess Home by SOD Builders is the best home improvement company. We met and talked to Allen who came over to our house to check and to give us an estimate for us and to be honest… from that meeting… Allen was very nice and professional and he made us feel very motivated about the entire remodeling project. The work was to redo the whole house including the backyard (pool and Jacuzzi).  The completed work looks stunning and we are happy that we hired them for that work. We will absolutely recommend Luxcess Home by SOD Builders to anyone who is interesting in remodeling their house. Our tip is to have a detailed estimate (like what we got from Allen). Luxcess Home by SOD Builders service was absolutely excellent. We hired them 2 months ago to remodel our 2 bathrooms. I want to thank Gal and his team for the awesome remodeling job that they did at my house recently. I decided to hire them among several other companies due to the fact that they were able to give me the best design and execution for my dream remodeling project.
