We truly enjoy spending time in the kitchen and the breakfast area now. Thank You, Allen and crew!!!

We recently hired (Adam) SOD builders to do a complete kitchen renovation at our house which includes painting, replacing the existing floor with new marble floors (24”x24”) and to upgrade the electrical wires and adding outlets and switches. Adam was the project supervisor and he did an excellent job with his professional crew, supervision the project, managing the work schedule and handling the sub-contractors. As part of his work, he sent us a daily report/update. We both work full days during the week and we were thankful that we could lean on Adam for this remodeling project. He also quickly understood our vision and the style we wanted while he did the hard work by searching and finding all the accessories for this job (lighting, marble tiles, faucets, cabinet pulls, and more...) so they all will match and fit. During the work, he was cautious to our budget and helped us solving several scenarios of problems in order to make them fit into the budget. We know that the highlight of our work with Adam was when he found and designed the tile backsplash which came out stunning, and he found a way to make this tile work within our budget. We hope to do work with him in the future on our patio project!

We worked with Gal from SOD builders to remodeling our master bathroom. We were looking for someone that can guide and help us with good ideas and options and mainly to listen to what we want or need. Gal was able to deliver all of that and even more! At first, He met with us and listened to what we wanted to do and he gave us some great suggestions that at the end he was able to implement them throughout the entire remodeling. Gal communicated with us in an excellent way and he was easygoing even though we made some changes or we couldn’t make a decision. During the remodeling, Gal with his team came to work every day and on time, kept us informed and were patient with us. They worked on the master bathroom as if they were working on their own houses. It was a great practice and we will work with Gal again including recommend them to anyone we know. We are very happy with the end result and the process of getting there.

We hired Allen from SOD builders to remodel our master bedroom and bathroom in addition to a small remodeling of a Jack and Jill bathroom. Our special requirements do cost and it’s hard to find someone that can actually do it right, but overall Allen was able to achieve it in a realistic price considering the value of actual work and materials. Our 2 bathrooms and the master bedroom are gorgeous and we enjoy showing them to our family and friends. We would not hesitate to use Allen or any of his workers in the future. Great work and thank you.

We found SOD builders while they were working on a remodeling project in another house on the neighborhood. During that work, I approached the supervisor Allen and we asked him to see the work. The final touch was the paint of the house which gave us a brand new look of the entire house. The whole remodeling was done in a very professionally manner. Allen put a lot of attention to all the details of the work. Thanks to Allen and entire crew that worked including the office staff for making our house look great!

We couldn’t be happier with the remodeling job that was made for us by SOD builders, under the supervision of Ehud. Ehud met with us several times before we hired him and he talked with us till he understood completely our goals and what we were trying to achieve with our remodeling. Ehud really listened and helped us finalize our project so it will fit with our opportunities and budget. This approach of Ehud gave us more trust in him and it was different from other contractors that we met because their approach was too rough for us and we didn’t like it at all. Ehud was also very familiar with the city codes and regulations, which saved a lot of time in drawing up the designs and money as well. Based on our meetings with Ehud, the office staff was able to come up with a wonderful 3D design which included most of our things and all we needed to do was to give it few touches till it was exactly what we wanted. The remodeling team and the sub-contractors were also professionals and polite while they gave a lot of attention to our schedule and preferences. In general, the whole team deserves this great review for the quality of the work they did for us. Our remodeling project was now a large one, but the time and affords SOD builders put into it, made us feel as very special clients.

We recently hired Gal at SOD builders for a complete renovation of our kitchen, 2 bathrooms and master bedroom. Besides the fact that Gal not only finished the entire renovation on time and on budget, but the quality of it was more than wonderful and beat by far our hopes. Gal and the whole team including the sub-contractors were so skilled and available during the work and made it easy for us to stay living at the house while they were working. They were mainly careful with everything and they cleaned the working space daily and made sure it will be as safe as possible, not just at the end of the work. The most and important thing was that Gal answered each and every question or concern we had during the work and he always made sure that we were happy with each and any task of the work as they were installed. More than that, Gal and his crew were able to deal very professionally with any of the several surprises that came up during the work and they solved them always with minimizing our stress. We truly in love with all the remodeling that they did and with the fact that it was such an easy and stressful process that we are already considering how and what we will remodel in our next project.

Oren from SOD builders was hired to create our dream house. We renovated two bathrooms, added an additional bathroom & laundry room and installed hardwood floors in all the bedrooms. We worked mainly with Oren. Oren was always reachable and reactive. He was creative and unbelievable from the design stage all the way to the actual construction. All of their workers and sub-contractors were generous, respectful, hardworking people with high reliability. Their cabinet maker person did beautiful work and was a pleasure to work with. During the work, there was a mold behind the old cabinets and our concern was that it will cause a major delay with the work. Oren made sure to take care of it with one of his vendors and they were tremendously helpful by solving that problem and keeping the project on track. The mold problem was an addition in price but Oren was able to get us the best deal with the mold remediation. Now that the remodeling is over, we can say that a lots of extra things were done for us and without any additional charge. A lot of them were just being done without even asking us. Oren was able to finalize the remodeling under budget and a little bit early than expected. Our house was treated as if it was their own. We are very pleased with the remodeling they did in the interior aspect of our house that we are currently in advance stage to work with them on the backyard and pool. We highly recommend selecting SOD builders for any project.

We hired SOD builders to create an outdoor patio living space on our home. Oren and his workers were professional, organized, and very polite, offered a project plan, had an on-site project manager (Oren), and a team of well-seasoned, personable and talented sub-contractors who had worked together for years. They were trustworthy and communicated well throughout the entire project. There were never any surprises to the budget process and all was well-documented and shared throughout the progress of our project. We were able to work together as a team, sharing ideas, making any adjustments, and the results are a gorgeous outdoor space for my family to enjoy. We have great respect for Oren and Jacob. And, here is another example of how they stand behind their work -they just contacted us for a follow up even though the work has been completed few months ago. They wanted to have a walk through the addition to review any issues that may have arisen over the year since construction was completed so they could be fixed. I don’t know any contractor that offer such things to his clients. We will use SOD builders for all the other renovations we plan to do in our home. We know they will exceed our expectations on those too!

The house that we purchased is very nice and was not maintained for a while before we purchased it. The kitchen and the two bathrooms were too old and needed to have a complete renovation. Although we knew that beforehand (since the property was below value), we didn’t fully grasp the extent. Our main concern was that we had a limited budget for any of the repairs that we wanted to do. We were afraid that the repairs that we want to do will be too expensive and much more above the amount that we could afford. However, after investing a great amount of time in research, we realized the budget can be stretched right if we will find the right contractor. We have called a several contractors to come by and to give us a proposal for the remodeling of the kitchen and the 2 bathrooms. SOD builders was by far the best estimate for the remodeling.  It was a little over our budget, but we were happy to put up the extra money because we really liked the designs they gave us. Signing with Oren was very easy and after that was done, Oren was able to start the work immediately within few days. Oren, was on site nearly every day making sure everything is going well and according to the plan. The work crew came in each day and even when the weather turned bad and was extremely hot. We were surprised to find how neatly they made the remodeling site. Each day when they finish the work for the day they would clean up and prepare the space for the next working day. This made it really easy to walk around my house without bumping into things! They installed brand new marble counter tops in the kitchen, new cabinets and floor tiles. The bathrooms got a new coat of paint, double sided vanity and counter top. All of it fit comfortably with our budget. Everything looks new and even better than the rest of the house. Hopefully that will be remodeled soon too, and when it does I will definitely hire SOD builders again!

We hired SOD builders to perform a big remodeling of our home. The team and the sub-contractors that did the actual work, were professional, dependable and knew exactly what to do under the supervision of Oren and his foreman. The work went smoothly (at least as we know) and they were able to complete the work on time and without increasing the original budget (which to us it means a lot because it shows how professional this company is). Every job in that scale, has problems and issues that coming up during the work and as soon as walls are being taken down and to our opinion, the main key is to have a good company that can deals with them as they were minor issues or problems (and this can be achieved only by really professional ones). SOD builder’s staff and mainly Oren, were always there to respond and/or to provide a solution for anything that came across during the work. We are extremely happy with the final results of this project and we will recommend them to anyone who would like to do a new construction project or just to remodel any part of their house.

After meeting in person and interviewing 4 construction companies and general contractors, we went ahead and hired SOD builders to do a major remodeling project at our house. We selected Oren because he had a great vision for design while implementing our ideas and wish list into the actual remodeling. Oren was also gave us a fair price for that work and we felt that we are in a good hands. Oren was able to provide us a detailed budget and mainly to give us a good schedule time for our remodeling work based on what we wanted to have. During our meetings with Oren, he was able to help us decide about some difficult design issues. Our project foreman, Michael was very pleasant person to deal with. Michael and Oren were very communicative with us and were able to answer all the questions we had during the work and even before we start and while they were working at the house, we got from them a weekly updates on the progress of the project and of each stage of it. All the concerns or problems that came up during the work, were quickly solved. During the work, Oren brought to the house several subcontractors (like electrician, plumber etc…). All of them were nice people and all they wanted was to do their part on the best side and under the quality rules of Oren. The work was finished a little bit over the schedule time that was assigned by Oren but most important, it was under the budget! The house turned out to be so beautiful and much more pleasant to be in! We will hire Oren and his crew again and we will definitely refer them to anyone planning a remodel.

After questioning several construction companies to repair and renew our kitchen we were very impressed with SOD builders and are glad we hired them. Before retaining SOD builders, we questioned and appraised estimates that we received from other possible contractors. Most of them weren’t able to work around our ideas and visions for the kitchen design. There was something lacking in His presentation or they didn’t represent His companies or themselves as professionals who were willing to hear us. Most of the plans were designed on kitchen remodeling prototypes containing cabinets mounted in a straight line. They didn't grasp the concept of our kitchen and the end result we were trying to achieve. Oren Harel changed all that. He presented himself as professional, honest, dedicated to provide us with an excellence product. His work just proved to be very reliable by doing so. Oren was always willing to listen, take his time to really understand our ideas and to help us come up with the right plan for our dream kitchen. It was obvious that his professional history and experience gave him the ability to imagine our own ‘vision’. He had the ability to start with the end product in mind. The original contract was well prepared, well offered, fully clarified and easy to understand. His demonstrations were professional and each stage of the remodeling project was exactly as described. His performance to meet that end was evident in the working relationship that he had with his subcontractors. All the subcontractors that were working with SOD builders Construction in our remodeling, were outstanding, professional and open-minded for every step of the way. We easily came to trust on the SOD builders’ capabilities. Any question or concern that surfaced, Oren was able to take care of it immediately. If a change was required, we reviewed the amendment before signing the updated proposal. All these acts took place prior to starting any part of work. Oren was a huge asset to us. He was compassionate about our condition. He was always on time, showed up when he said he would. He called when he said he would. Oren was working hand by hand with all the subcontractors. And seriously involved with each day’s work and he always was on top of the daily construction needs or necessities. Oren was the kind of person who was welcomed into our home. He was forward-looking at all times. He was creative, trustworthy, very qualified and true to his word. Once we started working with him, we knew that we had hired the right company/person. He did everything he said he was going to do. He didn’t cut any corner. We would trust SOD builders with any project and without reservation, recommend the company to anyone.

I was very pleased with the work and service that was provided by Oren. Oren and his team of workers remodeled my master bedroom by replacing the carper, installing a custom fireplace, paint the room, and remodel the master bathroom by replacing all the tiles, vanity, fixtures and plumbing. Oren is very attentive to details and perfection. He did a great job by supervising his people on a daily basis. His total price was very competitive compared to other contractors and mainly there was no hidden charges at the end of the remodeling and his quality of work was exactly what I expected to get for my money! I will recommend him to family and friends as I have been getting a lot of compliments for the work he did. Before Oren start to work at my house, he brought many samples of materials such as tiles and paint and lots of pictures which made the process flow and very easily. Also, his staff were very consistent by making sure that all my needs have been met. He will be my first choice when I will decide to remodel my kitchen as my next project. Thank you Oren and SOD builders!!

Our kitchen was a bit too small and uncomfortable because of a separating wall that was between the kitchen to the dining area, so we wanted to make it bigger and lighter and mostly to have the feeling of open space that will enlarge the space since we have the long windows and sliding doors by the dining area.  This remodeling was set in my mind for a while so I needed to put it in action.  I was just afraid it wouldn't be what I have in mind but SOD builders remodeled it the way I really wanted and expected to have. The moment Oren took down the separation wall at the kitchen, the space become so much bigger with so much light. I also wanted to replace the tile with wood floor and on the walls to have a nice tiles as back splash. Oren was able to get a great deal for all the materials and the big light creamy color ceramic tile on the floor with a really nice design with some stainless steel appliances and light grey pieces on the walls. Everything was going to look way too nice comparing to the cabinets so new dark brown wood cabinets were done too. I love my kitchen now and will use them in near future for sure.

When we hired Oren from SOD builders, we liked that we dealt directly with the owners and no unprofessional salesman who work for commission and keep trying to push in order to sign the contract now and add as many items as he could knowing that we don’t know much about construction. After we met with Oren and his supervisor at our house, their attitude and their interest to know what we would like to have and how we imagine our new kitchen to look like etc.… we felt very comfortable and we scheduled the second meeting so we can see the design of the new kitchen and what Oren included in the new kitchen in regards to storage space and appliances. I must admit that this guys (Oren and his supervisor David) are definitely professional people and they have a great level of understanding and listening!!! The new design included all the features that we wanted to have and the total price was near the budget that we set at the first meeting. They total price for kitchen remodeling was about 10%- 18% less than all other 3 contractors that came to our house in order to do the same kitchen that we did with SOD builders. The job was done in a record time, so clean, so smooth exactly as promised.

I fully recommend SOD builders! Oren and his team completed two remodels for our home in Tehachapi. The first remodel included two custom bathrooms in 2014. The bathrooms were designed by Michelle (The designer in SOD builders); Michelle works on many projects with Oren. Michelle highly recommended Oren for top-notch quality. We found Oren's team to be extremely knowledgeable, professional, and trust-worthy. Although the project took a bit longer than anticipated, it was well worth the wait, as the results are impeccable! We worked with Michelle and Oren again in for this remodeling on a much larger remodeling which included gutting and totally renovating the kitchen, living room, and dining room, as well as new flooring and interior doors throughout the remainder of the house. Shawn, Oren's cabinet maker, custom-designed the quarter-sawn Oak cabinets - amazing attention to detail! Shawn, as well as all of Oren's team, are excellent craftsmen. Oren, the supervisor of our remodel, suggested we vault the living room ceilings --this was not in the original plans, however, these ceilings transformed the room without adding square footage. 
Oren's work is top-notch; you get what you pay for. Do it right the first time. We really love our new home, and we would highly recommend SOD builders and his team!

I wanted to take the time and to express my experience and appreciation of the work that was done with SOD builders. Few months ago, we decided that it was finally the time to remodel all the bathrooms at the house (3 in total). We search and looked either online or by asking our friends and family in case they know a company that is worth to hire. After several recommendations and good search results, we came across SOD builders and we were impressed by their online site and past projects. From what we saw and heard, we decided to call them and to get more information about what we want to do and to hopefully schedule a face to face meeting and to take it from there. To our house arrived Oren and he checked and saw what we would like to achieve and to get from the bathrooms and what is the budget that we can afford. The first meeting was very good and few days later, we got the estimate for the work and Oren asked to meet with us again in order to go over it and see what can be changed. Oren understood exactly what we wanted and he made us feel like I was in very good hands. He was firm, capable and skilled. We really love my new bathrooms and we hope to work with SOD builders in the future.

They took our $1,000 deposit and never worked on our deck or kitchen.  They were going to build our deck then remodel our kitchen for $80k.  It didn't happen.  They were to work on our deck prior to out kitchen.      It took over 1 month for them to respond to us at all after giving them our deposit check for $1k.    We kept waiting and waiting for a response, but we never received anything from Adam (our project manager).
Adam came to our house, he was a great sales person.  He convinced us that a SOD Builder is a fantastic company.  My wife had a great rapport with Adam during the initial interview/quote.  She mentioned I would travel to his home country (Hungry) for work.   He was excited and asked me questions where I went and how I liked it.  He seemed very personal and trust worthy, and I was sold.
I cut them a check for $1k on April 1,2016 for a deposit.  It was cashed on April 15th, 2016.  
Adam promised they would start immediately and he would personally be in charge of the project and be able to start the week of April 11th.  We were so exited getting a new deck and remolded kitchen.   They signed us up for Buildetrend.com.  This was a way for us to see the progress of our remodel.  I thought we were in the right hands.
We sent all the prints for the deck and permits to Adam.  The prints for the kitchen and permit were in progress.
We scheduled a time Monday April 11th, for the foeman to come get an assessment on the Demo of our deck., since Adam was the project manager, we thought Adam was going to be there too.  But to our surprise, only Damien (subcontractor) and another 2 workers were there. 
Damien asked for the drawings that we gave to Adam.  I was shocked, why didn’t Adam (Project Manager) give Damien (Sub Contractor) plans for our deck?  Our architect gave the official prints to Adam?  I don’t have a copy.  I ran scrambling thru emails looking for some type of schematic.  I finally found it after 20 mins of looking.  our Architect came by 10 mins after.  Our Architect was also expecting the Sub-Contractor to have the blue prints.  This was totally unprofessional.  There was no communication between Adam and the Sub-Contractor. 
After Damien left, we were told by SOD via Karla,  that Adam would “oversee” the project from the office.  He will never be on Site, only for emergencies.  The interview was the last time I talked to Adam or receive and email from our “Project Manager”.  This was not conveyed to us as the owners.  I wish he would have mentioned it during the quoting process.  We didn’t even get Damien’s email address.
Back to the story.  Now Damien has the plans, no work for the rest of the week. We try to contact Adam, to get pricing on the wood.  No contact from Adam from Tuesday Apriil 12- Friday April 15.  
Monday April 18th rolls around, no work has been done on the Deck, no contact from Adam for pricing.    We try to contact Adam or anyone from SOD, but nothing.  No Contact from Adam from Monday April 18th – Friday April 22. 

Monday  April 25 rolls around this is the 3rd week, NOTHING  has been done to the Deck.  NO contact at again from Adam or SOD.  Monday April 25 – Tuesday April 26th.

Tuesday night, April 26th I’m so frustrated, I email again,  thru builder trend and finally Angie’s list.  Pleading to get some answers from Adam.  All I want is our deck to be started.  
On Wednesday morning of April 27, 2016, I finally get a response from SOD, but they say   “I know that Karla and Adam are working on getting the pricing for you. They are just trying to collect all the information they need in order to give you an accurate price.”  Why didn’t they call us at all for those 3 weeks?  NO contact, ignoring our emails.
Later in the day, Oren Dagan contacts us via Buildertrend.com.  He says he wants to start the project next week, but he wanted to know:
•Do you want us to start working on the kitchen at the same time.
•Do you have the permit ready for the kitchen?Is your architect going to do that?
•Do you have the engineering (if needed) drawing for the wall removal?
•Are you ok with us starting the deck already, before the kitchen or do you want it all in once?
•Can you provide me with few days that i can send the carpenter over?
•Have you chosen your appliances, fixtures, hardware and etc for the kitchen? do you need any help or list of items needed?

WTF!! We talked to Adam about this way in the beginning during the quote.  He took lots of notes. He even itemized all these items on the agreement that we signed.   It’s like we are starting all over again! All they wanted was their deposit from us. 

We were totally frustrated.

Oren from SOD builders was our lead contractor for our complete home renovation. After the initial design that we got from the architect and speedy construction, Oren did a great job by helped us with design of floorings, bathrooms, light fixtures, countertops, marble and tile work. We know that it’s hard and rare to find a contractor that have the qualities and abilities that required to create the perfect project but also patient, supportive and highly determined to get the remodeling project done. Oren, the on-site contractor and supervisor, did an outstanding work. The rooms came out beautiful with open space, light and clearly creative while at the same token, fits to our style which is warm and personal. Because this was the first time we did a home remodeling, it was a big deal to us that Oren will be able to absorb our vision for our house in terms of its style, realism, beauty and potential. SOD builders was equal to the task! We basically love the new kitchen that Oren designed and implemented at the house, the high ceiling in the media room, the marble master suite, the light engineered wood flooring, the amazing molding and the guest bathroom. We know that many contractors or construction companies could built our house, but what SOD builders can offer is a passion for your home and a promise that they are equal to the task of fulfilling its promise in the absolute standard of honesty and integrity to which they clearly hold themselves.

I hired SOD builders to bring the backyard finally to life. My house is a new construction house and the lot was mainly dirt. This project was a challenging one because of the uneven space and I wanted to extend it by removing part of the hill side of the back yard.
 After spoking with an office personal from SOD builders, for the initial meeting that I had with them, I met with Oren. Oren was able to provide me with 2 designs including an estimate for each one of them in order to help me get few ideas of what I can do and mainly the cost of the extended lot. 
My main goal was to had an outdoor kitchen that will include:
-BBQ area with nice seating table and chairs.
-Rounded fire pit that will be surrounded by a stone bench with pillows.
-Grass area.
-Outdoor patio that will be inside/outside seating. This was my main goal in this remodeling and the most important task.
My main concern was that during the past, I did some remodeling work and my experience with them was not good at all. In one of the cases, the contractor just left the site in the middle and never came back to finish the work. Luckily enough, this was not the case with SOD builders. Oren was particularly educated about this type of projects and he provided great recommendations. Sure enough, there were some problems and issues, but Oren solved them when they arrived and without involving us too much with the solutions. This could only happened when you have all this extensive experience with what you do and love to do. I was mainly fascinated with the hard working and ethic of the actual workers. I can state that they always came to work at the house on time, they were polite and made sure not to leave a mess after each working day. SOD builders did such an excellent job and each time I hear a good word from someone that visit my house, I feel much happier about SOD builders and MAINLY Oren.

We used SOD builders, Inc. for our kitchen remodeling project. This remodeling included all the new and custom (upper and lower) cabinets with an island in the center of the kitchen that added so much beauty and functionality to the super strange kitchen layout. The quality of the wood cabinets is really great and high. Great thick wood, anti-slam doors, changeable shelves, modified doors, and even custom handles. Oren from SOD builders, Inc. installed all the counter tops that matched perfectly with the wood. The island that we did, was furnished with the under sink and wine cooler. The efficient recessed lights and the low voltage lights in the upper cabinets added so much functionality features to the kitchen which was excellent. The engineered wood flooring was installed by Oren’s workers in the kitchen after Oren helped me personally to get a great discount on from his vendor. And Last thing was the back-splash who also was installed beautifully. Oren is a remarkable contractor in the Los Angeles area. He provide outstanding customer service and deliver a great construction. He also have a very professional and great staff.  When I contacted Oren for the first time, I felt I was in good hands. He had an incredible attitude, and he arrived ready to the appointment. The remodeling project was managed in a fast pace and everything was remodeled with real knowledgeable specialists. Looking how the working crew was working on the kitchen was pretty substantial. They were very accurate, detailed and cared about quality. I was surprised to see the crew cleaning the site after finishing their daily work. At the end, we had a very good experience with Oren from SOD builders, Inc. and we are very pleased with the great work and final price. I highly recommend SOD builders, Inc. construction.

Oren and his team from SOD builders were fantastic people to work and deal with for the remodeling project that they did at my house. They remodeled my kitchen, 2 bathrooms and the 2 bedrooms. In the kitchen we remodeled the whole kitchen by replacing the cabinets, counter top, back splash, lightings, sinks, appliances and all the hardware. Oren and the designer were able to design the kitchen completely on a set of 3D designs and they were able to do it as close as possible to the real thing. This design was a great feature that allow us to see how it will look in reality. The bathrooms were also designed and planned by Oren and his office. The bathrooms were demolished completely and Oren redesigned it completely by replacing the shower (in one of them) and the bath tub and shower in the other one. On top of that, He installed all the vanities, faucets, lights, outlets and floor. The bedrooms were the easy ones because all we did was the new paint, crown molding, closet and carpet. Oren made sure that the rooms will be ready first so we can live in the house while the other spaces are being remodeled. We noticed that Oren has a great attention for aesthetics, functionality and beauty, He always keeps the resale value of the house in mind just and he kept mentioning that to us in case we will thing to sell the house in the future. His communications skills added a great amount of trust and happiness and even the suggestions that he gave us in regards to the whole remodeling were a good plus. They were very patient with us during the selection process of all the materials, and even coming back multiple times when our little ones prevented us from being as efficient as we hoped. We've heard so many bad stories of contractors that either left in the middle or did a bad job that caused to redo all the work again. This was certainly not the case with SOD builders and the people there, they were efficient and even surprises happened, they did the work without any additional fees. The only increase that we had was when we decided to increase the work around the fireplace in the living room. We will recommend SOD builders to our friends and family, and we will show their work s referrals. We usually don’t give reviews, but they were worthy.

I recently had the powder room at my house completed remodeled by Oren and his workers from SOD builders. The old powder room had so many issues and it was not functional enough to our needs. It was originally done by the original builder so Oren and his team had a few challenges on their hands due to the bad existing layout. Oren was able to address all the issues with the powder room by maximize the space and installing as many cabinets as he could and I am extremely pleased with the end results. His team of workers installed new drywall, fully sanded and painted the walls and ceiling with color combination that was recommended to me by Oren at one of our meetings before I hired them, they also fixed the plumbing and replaced some of the pipes, did a complete electrical work by adding several outlets and switches and installed the vanity, toilet, and tile flooring. Oren made sure to provide me each daily with any update on the project and he made sure I was happy with every detail and stage of the powder room. He was extremely patient and understood exactly what I wanted.  I am very particular about my home and I stressed to Oren how important it was for me to have every perfect. Oren understood and reassured me that he would make sure I was happy with the results. Oren and his team exceeded my expectations which is pretty hard to do. I recommend SOD builders for anyone looking for a quality contractor to remodel their home.  I will definitely be using SOD builders for future projects in my home.

Hiring SOD builders and working with Oren was a great and smart decision to do. 
We recently did our huge kitchen transformation. The job included the removal of few walls, ceilings popcorn being removed, new plumbing, new lighting and outlets with some smart home features etc...The interview process was very intense and massive. We feel we interviewed a fairly amount of contractors (7)! We talked and met a variety of people/companies, from small to large. We called to each one and spoke to them over the phone and did a research about them making sure that they have valid license, insurance and bond. We talked to few secretaries that couldn’t say our names correctly even and made mistakes with the appointment schedules.  When we called Oren from SOD builders he (the owner) answered...huge and big advantage on the rest. Some of the contractors that visited our house for an estimate would either agree to all of our requests by saying, "absolutely or of course" yes we can knock down this wall and not worry about support.  And some of them kept telling me how they wanted to model our kitchen, not listening to our requests or ideas... Oren was a very straight to the point kind of guy and without any selling stories.  He told us we could knock down walls but be sure about any support beams that would have to stay or replaced.  The first day we talked through the design and all the financing options.  Since it was our first big project, we honestly didn’t have any idea about how much it could cost. The demolition was quick and clean. It took them only 2 days to complete this task. The working team were very nice to us and we got to know a lot about them. They made sure to use plastic covers every day and sweep up at the end of every day and made sure our house was livable. We ran into some of the beam support issues we mentioned above.  Oren came up with a great solution that caused us to redesign the kitchen look. Oren came up with a suitable layout that worked for us.  This actually changed the focal point of the kitchen and we loved the new look with this change. The project took a bit longer than we thought it would but was within the time frame that Oren promised us.  We could've had it done in less time but we wanted to take our time and to make sure that we are comfortable.  The final kitchen is really stunning. We can see that there was a lot love, care, special touch and craftsmanship into the smallest finishing details. Oren was on site almost every day.  If it wasn't him, then his foreman was.  He was equally as professional and committed as Oren was.  Oren saw every step all the way through and ensured no detail was over looked.  There was even a few details we asked for at the beginning of the project that we failed to remind him of that made its way into the final product.  We were really happy to see this. There were several of small problems and things that needed to be addressed after the project ended, but Oren was there.  He popped in to make sure all was still good.  He does this because the house needs a chance to settle in a bit.  He addressed them no problem. OVERALL EXCEPTIONAL JOB by Oren and his team at SOD builders.  We will definitely be working with him again!!!

 Oren and the workers definitely won our business after meeting us at the house and worked around our budget and they delivered exactly the results that we were hoping to get from them. I have attached before and after photos of the fireplace and bathroom jobs, the work speaks for itself.

We found SOD builders, after being frustrated in the past from other contractors. From the initial meeting that we had with Oren, we were impressed. I am so happy I choose SOD builders for my bathroom remodeling project at my house. This is the second time that we use this company for a project at our house. We highly recommend SOD Builders!  Extremely professional, competent and hard working. His details and space planning expertise was good & complemented by Juan to help select finishes. This was also the first time I put my trust in others to select or at least to help us with finding finishes and materials. Their pricing for this project was reasonable and worthy, the project management and coordination was painless and the overall results are stunning.

My husband and I purchased our home in last year that needed of lot of remodeling.  The house was in a very bad condition and it needed to be fully renovated. From our past experience, we knew how the process was going but we were fully committed to finding the right contractor for this and to get this renovation project going and complete. It pretty sad to see that no one in my family, friends or neighbors were able to refer someone they had used in the past because they had such a bad experience during or after the remodeling. We interviewed pretty much a lot of contractors but we must say that Eran from SOD builders was the most honest and pleasant contractor we've met from all the other ones. From the very beginning he told us what to expect and what we need to do before hiring ‘A’ contractor. He initially told us we need an architect to change the structure and layout of the house. We tried to differ from his advice but we realized he was right about hiring the architect. We needed an architect to legally change the structure and layout of our house. Eran invested time to gain our trust by presenting to us some of his previous jobs for reference. His estimate (SOD builders) was not extremely low which means his work was not low quality but it was not extremely high either. it was in the middle!  We believe his price was very fair and reasonable for all the amount of work we required. Now after the work is completes, I can write that I am very happy we decided to hire him for this project. 
From the moment Eran took over this project, his team has made this process a lot easier for us. they completed the demolition of our home in 4 days which was impressive! They began by leveling out the floors and created the new layout of our home right after. They were knowledgeable, well experienced and they followed all the steps and stages in the plans. Everything that was on paper was coming to life right before our eyes and it was an unforgettable experience. The footing & foundation are very solid, the framing, exterior finishing and the interior finishing were remarkable and used great materials. Overall, his team are highly skilled contractors and I will forever be grateful for their talent and exceptional customer service. His team was extremely professional, respectful, hardworking and reliable individuals. They were always united, always on time and always available to answer our questions. It was such a beautiful, pleasant experience that I will always speak very highly of SOD builders and I will never trust anyone else other than this team to do work in my house or any other project I may face in the near future.

We had a great experience with Oren from SOD builders. Oren was able to do a good job at our house remodeling the master bathroom and bedroom of our kids with his bathroom too.
The bathroom in our kid’s room is jack and Jill that has a shower/tub with large vanity. The decision to work with Oren and his workers was taken after several meetings with him and his designer Michelle. Michelle was very creative with her ideas about what to do and Oren explained to us each step and stage of the remodeling. The materials were selected by Oren and he gave us several options after he learned what we would like to do and what type of styles we love. The work in the bathroom included the removal all the old tiles, bath tub and shower and install new ones with the design that we selected. The work came out very good and it brought a new life to the bathroom including the new shower handles, Paint, vanity with sink and faucet.
The master bedroom required more work due to the age of it. We wanted to have marble floor, and special tiles all over the walls, paint and some extra storage cabinets that will allow us to have extra space. Oren worked with his workers on this project on a daily basis and the remodeling came out very good. Oren was able to assign 2 teams of workers to our house and to make sure that the work will end according to schedule.

Oren, from SOD builders, is great general contractor I have ever hired. A close friend recommended him and I couldn't be happier. Oren first did some smaller jobs, like replacing all our toilets with water-saving models. He also fixed a serious leakage problem that we didn't know about because it was caused by the flooring people not putting in the correct toilet seal. The musty smell that we couldn't find is now gone. He finished a bathroom remodel, tearing out the vinyl shower/tub and replacing it with a Jacuzzi whirlpool tub. The bathroom was quite large and now looks even larger, not to mention beautiful. He and his workers on the tub and tile installation that was complex and time-consuming. I was especially happy that he was able to adjust what I wanted to do to keep me within my budget by suggesting different tiling pattern choices. We went with his suggestions and it is so much better than what we were going to do. We would highly recommend Oren for repair work and remodels, though we hope he doesn't get too busy. We have started a new to-do list for him.

This company (SOD Builders) proved to me how great they are! It’s hard to remodel a house especially when you don t know where to start from or what to begin with. I found SOD Builders on several places including a magazine and I called to their office and spoke to Sofia. Sofia scheduled an appointment with Oren and she also called me an hour before to confirm the appointment. Oren came over and after a 2 hours meeting, he was able to give me an estimate for the kitchen. He was so good of explaining the all the building and safety codes so I was pretty amazed with his knowledge .He didn't push me to sign anything like other companies did and he wanted to have another meeting with me in order to show me a design of the new kitchen. I liked that so, after the second appointment and looking at his new design of the kitchen, I decided to hire him. His team of demolition people, carpenters, framers etc... Was so knowledgeable and clean .This guys do know how to take care of customers and how to work clean and good. Oren was coming almost every day to check the work and go over the details with me again in order to make sure we don’t miss anything and that I’m happy with the current progress. The job turn out great .Oren made sure that I will not have to pay any other fee more over the contract. I would recommend him to all my friend. I am very HAPPY

Oren with SOD builders was the Manager that managed our remodeling project and his end results work and schedule was just perfect.  I know when usually you start a remodeling project of any kind, you figure the schedule to be very flexible and the remodeling project to always take weeks or months to finish beyond what the contractor says, but in my review here I would like to tell you that Oren and his crew of people finished on time.  All the workers worked every day and did not miss one day or late, and the work was without any doubt top notch.  I had, really, nothing to complain about.  Therefore Oren and SOD builders deserve this positive.  What I liked most in this remodeling was that Oren made sure that the workers will know exactly what do each day and that all the materials will be at the house waiting for them and not the other way around.

I had two bathrooms completely remodeled with SOD builders (Oren). Oren did a great & quality work and delivered 100% on budget. I was concerned about any hidden problems or charges at first, since I had some concern there were few leaking pipes behind the wall that might have caused an issue. Oren and his guys did a thorough probe testing before starting and making their estimates. Everything ended up very well and I got two beautiful new bathrooms, even though it was one week behind schedule but completely on budget which was great thing after all! Our experiences with Oren (The supervisor) and the Designer on top of the tradesmen were 100% positive. They took our need to leave in the house a fully functioning bathroom at all time and made it happen (I must mentioned that several other companies told us clearly that it will be 'impossible' to have it when I got an estimate from them - that was also more reasons to what SOD builders gave us and lived up to). I am very pleased with our choice and the results.

I have no complains about this company and the people that worked at my house. At my house, Oren sent 4 workers that came over and did all the paint work. They covered everything and made sure to move all the bulky items so they won’t get damaged. After they finished the work, they returned and arranged the items and then moved to the next area. Oren assigned to my house his supervisor Charlie and he visited the house several times during the work time and made sure that we are happy and that there are no problems. Most of the paint work was a sponge paint with 2 colors but the common areas were with a special paint which took longer to do. I'm very happy with this company and I highly recommend them for any paint work.

SOD builders just finished a full remodeling of our house. It all started with our meeting with Oren and Michele by measuring and understanding what we want to do. Michele came over several times and presented to us her designs and Oren was the person that tried each time to improve the space and to maximize the quality of the materials. The remodeling started with the Kitchen and bathroom at the same stage of work, while the work in the kitchen in process, Oren and his workers started to work on the dining room & laundry room. The plumbing and main rain replacement repairs work was done by several of his people and they did a great job in that part too. The kitchen that we remodeled was with oak wood and included an island, counter tops, new outlets and appliances.
The hallways contained several closets and storage spaces that were designed and installed by Oren and his people. All exterior windows and texture coated the exterior of our house. We had never before taken on anything like this and Oren walked us through every step of the way from permitting to code to design explaining what needed to be done in realistic steps. The crew of workers showed up to the house on time every day and did a very professional job in all respects. Any difficulties were taken care of immediately by either Oren or Avi. Many great ideas came from these 2 and also from Michel. The proof that SOD builders are great company is at the end results, as now we have a beautiful home with all the modern touches and for much less than other bids that had much less work involved. Everything that Oren said he would do, he did. I would recommend SOD builders for any size job you have in mind, they stand by their word.

SOD builders provided us with an amazing customer service throughout the process of the remodeling from start to end. Their prices were very competitive. It doesn't get much better than this. We were having foundation work done on my elderly mother's home in LA. We arranged this remotely via a friend that recommended us to Avi and Oren. Avi took time, care, and patience to make sure that the remodeling will be comfortable with the process and to answer each and every one of our questions. This alone makes us recommend them as highly as possible. Customer service of this level is very very rare today. The work that they did was managed by Oren. Oren brought his 3 men team and made sure they will do an amazing work and as fast as they could.  I would use this company again without any hesitation. I'd give 6 stars if I could.

we LOVE LOVE LOVE SOD builders. this is the THIRD time we are using them over the last ten years, each for progressively bigger and bigger jobs. they are so kind and on top of stuff and just get it done. they have a manager assigned to the task so you have someone you can always call and they have someone for everything. just whatever you need. and they do it right. 
whether it was little finishing touches or knowing just how to redo our old hardwood floors, what sink to put in, how to fix our cabinets, fixing the deck outside, making our outdoor area a beautiful patio space we now love, making beautiful built ins for us, interior and exterior painting, fencing, electrical, refreshing our kitchen so that now it is just gorgeous, all of it, just done perfectly. 
literally, i cannot say enough good things. i would never ever use another contractor. working with SOD feel like you have an uncle in the business that you can just call when you need help. and you know will be taken care of like family. 

HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

Great company and people to deal and work with! The main thing that I liked in this remodeling was the communication and the care that Oren showed me. He gave me the feeling that his is remodeling his own bathroom and he cared for every detail in the remodeling. The bathroom remodeling that I did, started with the selection of all the materials, color combinations and all the hardware that Oren will install in the bathroom. Oren planned everything pretty good and he made sure not to have any extra materials so the total amount will remain the same. At the end of the remodeling, the total price was the same as the original estimate and this meant a lot to me because I heard so many stories where the final price become higher due to extra items that the contractor add during the remodeling.

We had the need to enlarge the bathroom and to add a bath tub. We spoke to several contractors and companies about this project and we met with few of them. When we spoke to SOD builders. The person that we spoke with was very nice and polite. She scheduled a meeting with Adam. Adam came over at the time frame that was scheduled ahead by the office and he was the person that was able to give us a good quote for that and we were able to speak to some of his past. After we approved the quote and gave our OK to start, Adam sent his workers to start work. The work started with the demolition of the existing bathroom and adding the new frames. Then, all the plumbing and drainage was completed with the lighting. When all of that was completed, they did all the drywall and paint including all the electricity. The floor was one of the last items that they did and it came out great. I want to mention that we enjoyed working with Adam and his team of workers. They are nice and professional people.

We recently had a master bath and a guest bath remodel with SOD BUILDERS.
Their project manager Lance was very helpful in choosing the right materials and answered all our questions in every step!
The team was very friendly, respectful and cleaned every day the work was done...
Although some issues/extra fixes came up, they could finish project on time.
Best customer service from the office too.
Love our new baths!

This was my first remodel, and it was a large project for a small space. SOD was very professional from the beginning. I never felt nickel and dimed which is typical for construction companies in this market. The workers, project managers and management were very responsive and focused on making sure I was happy with the work. The quality of the remodel was excellent. I've gotten so many compliments from guests who have seen my gorgeous, new bathrooms.

Look no further! The construction team from "SOD Builders" saved my life after a stupid contractor disappeared leaving my house roof bathroom and kitchen un-finished ,he left trash all over and my roof was open,uncovered and literally exposed to the rain,wind and weather...
I found SOD Builders on HOUZZ and made a decision to hire them after interviewing Oren and Michelle ,
They were able to address the issues we had and found ways to help us to complete the work in minimum time and cost (!!!).
Me and my wife can't explain how we thank this company since they are our new angels!!!
Thank you ! thank you ! Thank you!
We are going to recommend SOD to anyone who need construction and home improvement work!

We've remodeled several homes, and SOD Builders was by far the best experience we've ever had working with contractors. 
We remodeled our entire home and added 800SF to the back of the house.
The build pool house (we can't wait to use it this coming summer). Either Oren or Adam was on the Job Site almost every day, the workman were courteous and cleaned up after themselves, and the job was finished ahead of scheduled and turned out beautiful. We could not give a higher recommendation. Excellent company to work with.

I've been waiting for awhile to write this review. I was genuinely hoping things would have worked out between us and SOD but that was not the case. To be completely upfront we never got to the actual building/construction part of our relationship with SOD. We worked with them for over a year and ultimately left with a sour taste in our mouth over the whole experience. I'm giving two stars because even though we didn't end up working with them their designer (Michele (sp?)) and some of their staff were great to work with. 

We wanted to do the following to our home:
Remodel master bathroom
Master bedroom - Install new flooring, paint, and sliding glass door/one window replaced (They quoted $10,000 for *just* this - FYI)
Stairs - refinished
Living - build a custom bar, resurface fireplace

We reached out to SOD through Houzz and they were prompt to reply. They sent someone out to give us a quote. Everything went fine, and we called a few times after that but never received the quote. After a few months (we were slow to follow-up too) they sent someone else out to give us another quote as it had been awhile since the first guy had come out to our house. That's when we started working with Michael and things went terribly from that point on. I mean very very terribly. 

Michael came out and did a walk through of the house with us. He was having a hard time grasping what we wanted and wasn't understanding our vision. On top of that we were having a hard time understanding him and what was included in their services. At this point we were becoming frustrated but Michael assured us everything would be fine. After a month we received the quote from him. It was extremely poorly written and we couldn't tell what was included and what wasn't. We had three separate phone calls with Michael and still couldn't tell what we were getting. We said we wanted to think it over for a few weeks. After a month we again contacted Michael and asked about the price difference between adding a bathtub to the master or not. He then told us we would need to pay him $5,000 for an architectural designer before he would do anymore with us. This set off major red flags for us. We were told before that design was included with SOD. Michael then said he was going to be out of town but he wanted to send his colleague, Ram, to our home to see it and take some measurements that he missed. We thought that was weird but agreed to call and set-up a time with Ram. After speaking with Ram it became VERY clear to Ram and to us that Michael hadn't work for SOD in over a month and Ram was very panicky because he thought Michael had told us when he clearly hadn't. The most alarming part was NO ONE FROM SOD EVER CALLED US TO TELL US. So, we almost signed a contract with some other company and didn't even know it....

At that point we called SOD and I feel like we were super reasonable since they never bothered to tell Michael's clients he had left the company. We just asked to meet with someone else. They sent their designer out to our home. She was great and really restored our faith in SOD. When the owner returned he came out and sent us a new quote. We were discouraged to see the same quote style from Michael and ended up having to have ANOTHER call with the owner to figure out what was included and what wasn't. We solved it by making a spreadsheet since about 10 items we asked for didn't show up in the quote AT ALL. After that we took their final numbers and compared them to what Michael provided us in his first quote when he actually worked for SOD and they were much higher. We approached the owned about the difference and he said - doesn't matter. I won't go down to that price. So, he wouldn't honor a price his former employee made and we spoke to SOD again. 

They never called us after that. They never made any attempt to do right by us even though they basically set us up with someone who tried to defraud us. I am honestly just 100% disappointed in the whole experience. 

I think they do great remodel/construction work if you can get past the poorly explained process, bad company organization, and lack of customer service. We didn't and we lost a year of our lives to it. I would not recommend SOD to anyone, and I don't think they care about what they did to us or how our project was handled.

I met with Eran from SOD last Spring and he had a lot of great ideas for my kitchen and bath remodel. Their bid was very competitive and I selected SOD to do the project. One of the key differentiation was that Eran did 3D renderings of the space and we went through several rounds before finalizing the scope of work. This was a great way to finalize all of the details in a visual way, which saved me on hiring a designer and undoubtedly saved a lot of rounds of changes once construction began. Throughout the project, everyone from SOD was incredibly responsive and Eran was my point of contact throughout the entire project. He's easy to work with, highly service-oriented, and always available by phone/text or email.

SOD has a large team with plumbers, electricians and provides full services - from counters to flooring and shower doors. The quality of the work was very high and they were also receptive to getting the smallest details just right. I was most impressed after the job finished when Eran and team went above and beyond to make sure that every last detail was taken care of.

SOD is an entrepreneurial, modern construction company and I would use them again.

I would definitely use SOD again for any future remodeling projects. During the initial process of getting bids from various vendors, they were not the cheapest or the most expensive, but they had the best customer service and that is what won me over. This being the first time I've ever done a remodel, I went over every detail of the bid and checked their referrals, licenses, insurance coverage, etc. Even before I committed, Daniel was super great at responding and answering all of my questions and putting me at ease. The process was painless and "pressure free" and I very much appreciate their approach.

Daniel was an absolute pleasure to work with and his team did a wonderful job. They were polite, courteous, considerate (they made sure to cover areas that they would be walking through, cleaned up the area daily, etc), and very accommodating during the entire process, especially with changes along the way. They remodeled both bathrooms at the same time from demolition to finish. It was hard living with both bathrooms being done simultaneously and seeing as how these were my only bathrooms in my home, my "must-have" was to have a working toilet during the remodel (showering could be done elsewhere, but a working toilet was deal breaker for me!). They not only finished ahead of schedule (total time: about 5 weeks), but they also did a few extra's for me i.e. installing a ceiling fan, replacing hallway ceiling lights. The results were remarkable and I couldn't be more pleased with the results. I've received many compliments on the work and have referred them to several friends and co-workers and will continue to do so.

I would not hesitate to use them again. When I remodel my kitchen, I plan on using them again.

I chose SOD for a complete kitchen remodel and plumbing upgrade. Working with the designer Michelle was a pleasure.  She had a clear sense of what we were looking for and knew just when to offer her opinion as we were sorting through the dizzying array of options.  When the building actually began, everyone at SOD was easy to contact, the crew always professional.  There were a few glitches, but they were minor, nothing out of the ordinary for such an extensive job. 

Early in the process, Oren, the owner of the company, told me that he would do whatever it took to make sure I was happy at the end of the job--and he completely delivered.  There was no request that wasn't honored, no small issue that was ever contested. They never made me feel picky, even though there were times I felt that way.  Oren called me a few months after the job was done to make sure I was happy.  When I mentioned a few minor issues that had come up (a cabinet door was sticking and the faucet had worked a little loose) he had someone come out within a day to take care of them. SOD didn't give me the cheapest bid (they weren't the most expensive either, for the record) but it's worth a little extra money to find a builder that does beautiful work and is willing to work with you to make sure you're satisfied.

Oren, the general contractor, gave us a bid that was reasonable and when he came to our house he brought his designer Michelle, who showed us pictures and gave us ideas about what could be done to our house.  Michelle was with us to help pick out tile, granite slabs, paint colors, and cabinet styles.  The job itself had one hic-up but was remidied by Oren.  The foreman/woman that was assigned to our job told us that if we had any questions we could call her day or night and she would be available.  This turned out not to be the case and Oren eventually let her go and we were given a new foreman, Robert, who was available whenever we needed help.
   Overall everything went well.  Oren had workers at our house just about every day and the workers were very professional in doing their jobs.  They even swept up at the end of the day so we wouldn't track dust into the rest of the house.  Our remodel started on January 6th and was completely finished by March 14th.  I have waited until now (6 months after completion) to see if anything went wrong before giving my review and I can honestly say that everything has held up well.  No cracks in the drywall, and no leaks anywhere.  Given all that was accomplished in just over 2 months I would say that Oren and his crew did a wonderful job.

I am extremely pleased with the job that SOD Builders did for me: a full kitchen remodel, including a complete gut and redesign of the room.   The quality of their work was top-notch, the workers were always professional, respectful, and friendly.   In particular, SOD's designer was very helpful in bringing my vision to life.

No project of this magnitude is completely glitch free, but SOD was very responsive to my every request.  This is not a contractor you have to worry about deserting you mid-job.  

The answer to the ultimate question "Would I hire them again for other work?" is "Absolutely".  Though it took a bit longer than I would have liked to complete the job, in the end I couldn't be happier with the results.  I will enjoy this space for decades to come.

We absolutely love Oren and SOD Builders, Inc.  After meeting with multiple contractors to remodel our entire home and we added 1500SF to it, Oren was a breath of fresh air.  He wasn’t pushy like most other contractors.  Instead, he was polite, knowledgeable, trustworthy and professional.  This project was our first re-model (pretty massive for first remodel) and we didn’t know anything about the process.  Oren guided us through everything from start to finish. He listened carefully to what we wanted, gave us suggestions, and showed us lots of examples on his computer of other homes he had remodeled and build.  Lance and Michelle went with us to stores to help us pick out everything in our home--appliances, tile, and counters. They built us all custom cabinets  He was patient and supportive, always offering his perspective and advice and helping us make color and style decisions.  He, Michelle (our head designer), and the rest of their team were all a pleasure to work with.  They were hardworking, polite, knowledgeable, paid attention to every detail, and showed true pride in their work.  Lesmi checked in with us every day, either by phone call or by email.  The crew cleaned up at the end of each day.  The team was so efficient that, despite us adding a few additional projects along the way, they finished the project ahead of schedule.  And, we are extremely happy with our new home.  It is more beautiful than we could have imagined and we are so thankful to Oren and his team.  We have already recommended SOD Builders to family and friends and are looking forward to having him redo our rental home in the near future.

We called SOD to start a kitchen remodel.  During the time they quoting us on the kitchen our hall bathroom's pipes exploded and we decided this project was more pressing.  We were glad that we got to work with this company on a smaller project before tackling the huge project of our kitchen remodel.  SOD did an awesome job with the bathroom.  We are extremely happy with our new modern bathroom. It is beautiful.  We always felt comfortable with all the specialists that came to work on the house. The work they did was top notch.  Any questions or concerns we had during the project were addressed quickly.  They also helped us to figure out design details, and since this is not my forte we really appreciated the guidance.  

We were so happy with the bathroom remodel that they are working on our kitchen now.  It is coming together beautifully.  I would absolutely recommend them for any project that you have.

We love our kitchen and what's even more amazing, we still love everyone at SOD.  Through every step of the way, we felt like Oren, Michelle and team did everything in their power to give us exactly what we wanted, or, as was often the case, something better than we could have imagined.   We are a bit clueless on the design front.  We knew we wanted a Dwell worthy high end kitchen that had warmth and natural stone elements while still being sleek and modern. We had no idea how to do this.  Michelle helped us design the kitchen, change the layout, reposition things, and redesign the kitchen again.  She helped us select materials, match stain samples, hardware, everything. And this "call me anytime and I will pick up or call you immediately" service is just part of the deal. It's how SOD operates. 

If there was ever anything that we were unhappy about, it was addressed immediately. I believe someone came out three times to make sure the wall of cabinetry fit into the soffit line perfectly. We chose an incredibly difficult tile to install for our backsplash. Each tile is individually cut and affixed to paper.  The tiler pulled out individual tiles that we felt were too dark or light or misshapen... dozens of them, until it looked perfect. They were very accommodating when working with the Miele specs for the custom panel refrigerator and even redid a panel when we saw a blemish. The cabinetry makers SOD uses are craftsmen and you can tell when you look at the end result and feel the substantial drawers and cabinets in your hand. The cabinetry and drawer hardware used is on par with what Poggenpohl and Boffi.  After months and months of hard use, I still get a little thrill every time the drawers soft close smoothly. 

When we were conducting our search we were looking for quality, excellent customer service and affordability. SOD provides all of these. NOT ONCE did we feel taken advantage of or overcharged in any way. Our quote did not change.  There weren't any hidden costs or fees.  In fact, we found that we were so on budget that we were able to splurge on our cabinet hardware and backsplash.

It has been nine months and we have not had a single issue with anything in our kitchen.  It is still beautiful, it still looks new and it is very, very user friendly.  This is a kitchen used and abused by children but appreciated by adults. 

We couldn't be happier and will use SOD again in the near future.

Professional, clean, knowledgable and punctual. They finished building our new roof before a week was over and did not leave a mess! 

I'd definitely hire them again.

I sent an urgent request to SOD builder to get a bid for my bathrooms and garage remodeling project due to the water damage at home. SOD customer service was really nice. After I canceled my first appointment, they were able to schedule a project manager to visit my place according to my time. The project Manager was helpful and professional. We got the estimates within 3 days.

I had a guest bathroom remodel job and met with approximately four contractors. SOD Builders came in with a cost that was within our budget. We broke the job up into two stages, the first was a demo of a 3x3 shower and build a walk in tile shower that can accommodate ageing parents with a grab bar, shower bar, soap shelf and seat. New tile was laid and our new shower was a nice combo of large tile, glass tile mosaic and stainless steel appointments and a seat. Oren and his crew took about two weeks for the complete job which also included installing a shower light fan combo, paint and trim. The second portion of the rebuild was the installation of a new vanity and placing tile where the old vanity once stood. This vanity was not made for a corner and SOD builders took the marble splash guard and matched it to another piece to create a corner vanity unit. We are very pleased with the work performed and the crew that worked on this job. We would highly recommend SOD builders for your construction / remodel jobs.

Services provided:
Completely remodeled the kitchen, updated 2 bathrooms, completely remodeled the master bathroom, relocated the laundry room, installed attic insulation, replaced all windows and interior/exterior doors, and installed wood flooring.

Details:
Oren and Michal, his designer, were fantastic to work with.  Oren and Michal both met with us to walk through our home and understand the project we wanted to do.  Oren's bid was competitive, but the biggest reason we decided to hire him is because we could see how passionate he is about his work and we felt that Michal's vision was a perfect match for the look and feel we were going for.

Michal was very helpful in the planning phase and helped design our kitchen layout and cabinets, as well as our master bathroom.  She was also extremely helpful when it came time to start picking finishes.  She totally understood our style and helped us narrow down design options.  In addition, she was not afraid to let us know when she felt that we may be making choices that we could regret.  We greatly valued her opinions and support!

We had bought an older home that needed a lot of updating and improvement, so the job was quite big.  Luckily, we were not living in the home during the remodel.  However, we stopped by to check the progress at least a couple of times per week and were always impressed that the workers cleaned up after themselves each day and stored their tools even though they knew we weren't living there.  Whenever we did see the workers, they were always pleasant and courteous.  

About mid-way through the project, Oren's foreman leading up our project left the company.  This caused some delays, but the new foreman, Hector, was even better than the first and did everything he could to help make up for lost time.  We had told Oren from the beginning that he could take his time because we weren't in any hurry to move in (we were living at my father's house so that I could take care of him until he passed away from cancer).  The project was completed about 2 months behind schedule, but we had added some work to the original scope and wanted Oren to take his time to make sure everything was done exactly how we wanted it.  

We have now lived in our home for about 3 months.  After we moved in we began to notice certain issues and defects and kept a running list of items to be fixed.  Oren sent his crew back out about a month ago and fixed everything on our list with great attention to detail.  We could not be any happier with our "new" (old) home!

We have worked with other contractors on smaller projects at our previous homes before and they always quoted us much lower, but the final bill was much higher and the quality of the work was lacking.  We paid Oren exactly what he originally quoted us and are very happy with the results.  We would highly recommend Oren for his professionalism, attention to detail, and passion for his work.  He is an honest person and demands the same level of honesty and quality from his crew.

I was impressed by SOD Builders commitment to satisfaction. We had lots of small details that we wanted to do right and Oren was absolutely willing to get all the little things done properly, and without a charge. The most impressive thing was that we agreed on a price at the start and Oren stuck to it even when it would cost him extra money to get right.

They did also a very good job of keeping my place clean, keeping things running while doing construction, and overall being very responsible and with a great regard to quality!

SOD Builders is a one-stop shop to my dream house.  With a complete team of project manager, designer, architect, licensed plumber/electrician, tile/floor specialists, painters, carpenters... they can put together pretty much any requests that you may dream up for your projects.  They did a gut renovation for me on an entire floor including demolishing and rebuilding a kitchen and 2 bathrooms, removing popcorn ceiling and smoothing out textured walls, updating all plumbing and electrical and putting in new hardwood floor.  SOD Builders provided high-quality work, expert advice and top-notch customer services.  The one thing the owner, Oren, said to me most often during the project was “whatever makes you happy, we’ll do it!” and they do!  They are very flexible to unexpected changes and always accommodating to the needs of the customers.  I picked out all the floors and tiles I wanted, and the project manager, Adi, helped me looked all over California to find the best prices for the materials.  When a part of the fireplace didn’t turn out looking like the design I had in mind, they immediately sent a team to rebuild the area to change it to look exactly like what I wanted.  For the bathrooms, we decided to put up tiles on all walls, we originally thought since all the walls were also newly built, installing the cement boards under the tiles would be sufficient enough, but Oren insisted on using the floating cement because he believes the method makes the bathrooms much more durable and provides better quality even though it was more costly to him and took longer to build.  There were many examples like these throughout the project.  I would highly recommend SOD Builders to anyone.

Services Provided: 
Combined a kitchen area with a breakfast area, pushed out an exterior wall, enlarged the opening between the kitchen and dinning room, gutted the entire area, redesigned the ceiling in a pyramid fashion to solve the problem that the breakfast area had a vaulted ceiling, installed two new large windows then built an unbelievably beautiful, entirely functional high end kitchen.  We were so pleased with the work we had SOD remodel two bathrooms, a laundry room and install new linen cabinets in a hallway.  They also installed a beautiful large garden window in the dinning room.
Comments: 
If you are looking for an honest contractor who can make your most ambitious dreams come true, look no further than SOD Builders.  I alrey had my own idea (I even had my own drawings) of how my new kitchen should look.  I interviewed several highly rated contractors but I selected SOD for several reasons.  I met with the Project Manager, the Head Carpenter and Oren Dragan, the owner, all of whom seemed completely confident that they could meet my every expectation.
